attributes.title: Ranked Season 14 is HERE!
attributes.overview: Ranked Season 14 is HERE! Are you ready? How far will you go?
attributes.content:
Are you ready for the new Ranked Season? How far will you go?  


WHAT’S WAITING FOR YOU THIS SEASON?


New Champion EXCLUSIVE Reward
Push your limits, defeat your challengers, and climb the ladder to glory. This season, those who make it to Champion Rank will earn an exclusive piece from our Chess-themed collection: the Golden Rook

Every season unlocks a new Chess-inspired skin, only obtainable through Ranked mode. Can you collect them all and complete the set?

Only the best will stand at the top! 


Only Abilities allowed this Season are:

  • Hug
  • Punch
  • Slide


Map Rotation


Wood and  Bronze:

  • Lava Land,
  • Rush Hour,
  • Block Dash,
  • Lost Temple,
  • Jungle Roll,

Silver:

  • Lava Land,
  • Rush Hour,
  • Block Dash,
  • Lost Temple,

Gold:

  • Lava Land,
  • Rush Hour
  • Laser Tracer,
  • Block Dash Legendary,

Platinum:

  • Lava Land,
  • Laser Tracer,
  • Block Dash Legendary,
  • Rush Hour Legendary,

Master and  Champion:

  • Block Dash Legendary,
  • Rush Hour Legendary,
  • Lava Land Legendary,
  • Laser Tracer Legendary,

Good luck everyone! We'll be cheering for you!

attributes.title: New Stumble Pass is HERE!!!
attributes.overview: The Stumbleverse just got a mega upgrade!! The Mech-A-Mess Season has crashed into the arena, packing elemental chaos, legendary collabs, and mech-powered madness into one explosive Stumble Pass. Think you can handle it?
attributes.content:
The Stumbleverse just got a mega upgrade!! The Mech-A-Mess Season has crashed into the arena, packing elemental chaos, legendary collabs, and mech-powered madness into one explosive Stumble Pass. Think you can handle it?

What's in the Stumble Pass

  • 6 Skins
  • 250 Gems
  • 200 Ability Keys
  • 28,500 Ability Tokens
  • 8 Prize Boxes
  • 4 Footsteps
  • 3 Victory Animations
  • 5 Emotes

and MORE!

Suit up, Stumblers, the Mech-A-Mess won’t last forever! Grab your Stumble Pass now, unlock the chaos, and show the arena who’s boss before the season powers down.

attributes.title: 0.90 Patch Notes: Unleash Your Inner Avatar
attributes.overview: Update 0.90 is one of our most epic yet. Two massive forces collide in the Stumbleverse: the legendary world of Avatar: The Last Airbender and the 5th Anniversary of Stumble Guys.
attributes.content:
Update 0.90 is one of our most epic yet. Two massive forces collide in the Stumbleverse: the legendary world of Avatar: The Last Airbender and the 5th Anniversary of Stumble Guys.

Become the Avatar in an all-new elimination map, Air Temple Tumble, where you'll master the elements and survive waves of chaotic Sky Bison attacks. Choose from powerful bending abilities like Fire, Water, Earth, and Air, each with unique effects that can turn the tide of battle.

Explore a full lineup of official Avatar skins like Aang, Toph, Zuko, and Appa, alongside themed victory animations and footsteps that let you truly bend the battlefield.

But, wait, there is more! We're also introducing Gust, a brand-new ability that lets you ride the wind, and Clocks, a new feature to track your run times like a pro.

Ready to soar? This beta is your chance to go full Avatar and experience the future of Stumble Guys.  Unleash Your Inner Avatar! Update now and enter the era of elemental mayhem.

New IP Collaboration: Avatar: The Last Airbender


For the first time ever, Avatar: The Last Airbender lands in Stumble Guys, unleashing a wave of elemental mastery and high-flying action. Join Aang, Toph, Zuko, and the rest of Team Avatar as you tumble through themed content and a daring new level that will test your agility, timing, and spirit.
Will you master all four elements, or get blown off course by the mighty Sky Bison?

 

 

New Level: Air Temple Tumble 


Welcome to Air Temple Tumble, an elimination level where agility and timing are everything. Leap across floating platforms suspended high above the clouds while waves of stampeding Sky Bison crash through the stage.


Players can harness the power of four elemental abilities to survive:
 

Fire: Blast opponents off balance with explosive force

Water: Surge forward to rocket to safety
Earth: Burrow underground to dodge incoming chaos
Air: Soar high and slow your fall to control your descent


The intensity increases with each wave, forcing fast reactions and clever plays. Can you master the elements and claim victory, or will the Sky Bison have the final word?

New Ability: Gust

Feel the wind at your back with Gust, a powerful new Epic ability that pushes players, objects, and even hazards forward.

What It Does

  • Spawns a burst of wind directly in front of you
  • Walking through it propels you forward with momentum
  • Works on cannonballs, bombs, and other interactive elements

In-Game Flow
- Activate Gust
- A wind burst appears
- Step into it for a strong forward boost
- The gust disappears after a short time

Upgrades
- Shorter Cooldown
- Longer Gust Duration
- Stronger Push Force

Whether you’re trying to escape lava, steal a win, or knock others off balance, Gust has your back.

New Feature: Clocks

Introducing Clocks, a simple but powerful new feature for those who want to take their performance to the next level.

What is it?
A visible timer displayed during your gameplay, which indicates the match time.

⚙️ You can choose when do you want to see it:

  • Toggle on or off in the Settings menu
  • Choose to display the timer:
  • In Race levels
  • In Elimination levels
    Or both


Track your run times, measure how long you can survive in elimination maps, or just feel the pressure tick down. Clocks put precision in your hands.

Level Removal: Monopoly

As part of this update, the Monopoly level will be removed from the game, as our licensing agreement for this collaboration has come to an end.

We appreciate the fun it brought while it lasted and thank all players who gave it a roll.


Cosmetics

Alongside our Avatar content, a full lineup of original and returning cosmetics has arrived to keep you looking sharp (or shiny, or sparkly) no matter how hard you stumble.

Emotes

  • Be Gone (Common)
  • Carrocket (Uncommon)
  • Clutched! (Common)
  • Mecha Thumbs Up (Uncommon)
  • Rainbow Lasers (Uncommon)
  • Venomous (Uncommon)

Victory Animations

  • Airbending (Legendary)
  • Waterbending (Legendary)
  • Earthbending (Legendary)
  • Firebending (Legendary)


Footsteps

  • Air (Epic)
  • Water (Epic)
  • Earth (Epic)
  • Fire (Epic)
  • Feather Blades (Rare)
  • Red Holo Trail (Legendary)
  • Red Laser Jet (Legendary)
  • Rainbow Sparks (Epic)

Stumblers

  • 5th Anniversary Mr. Stumble (Epic) - 5th Anniversary Celebration Skin
  • Aang (Legendary)
  • Avatar Aang (Special)
  • Toph (Legendary)
  • Zuko (Mythic)
  • Sokka (Epic)
  • Appa (Epic)
  • MechaCluck (Special)
  • Mechabara (Legendary)
  • Meowtrix (Epic)
  • Aurora Meowtrix (Legendary)
  • Cyberfang (Mythic)
  • Mecha-Sprinkles (Mythic)
  • Ironhare (Epic)
  • Kung Fluff (Rare)
  • Ryder (Rare)
  • Amber Rook (Legendary)
  • Azure Rook (Legendary)
  • Golden Rook (Legendary)
  • Corrupted Dynamitron (Special)
  • Fire Racer (Legendary)
  • Sir Valorion (Mythic)

Bug fixes 


We’ve continued polishing the game and resolving key issues to improve your experience across gameplay, tournaments, UI, and cosmetics. Here’s what’s been fixed in Update 0.90:


Gameplay & Level Fixes

  • Fixed an issue where the "Place in the top 5 in 5 race rounds" mission could be completed in Elimination levels.
  • Resolved a bug where the Bouncing Ball ability would deactivate after using Jump + Dive in Jurassic Rush.
  • Fixed an error that caused crashes during gameplay and Tournament rewards.
  • Addressed a bug where XP Road bar and level-up animations would not trigger correctly when returning to the home screen.

UI & Menu Fixes

  • The level thumbnail scroller in some menus no longer breaks or disappears.
  • Fixed the expansive widget collapsing each time the UI refreshed.
  • Resolved an issue where the game would redirect players to the main menu instead of the correct tournament screen.

Cosmetic Fixes

  • Corrected an issue where the Sharktooth skin did not reflect the selected skin tone.
  • Resolved a bug where certain skins failed to animate or transform during specific actions like taunting or double jumping.

Update 0.90 marks a turning point in the Stumbleverse - where elemental chaos meets five years of unforgettable stumbles. Whether you’re bending fire, dodging Sky Bison, or chasing faster times with Clocks, this update is packed with ways to test your skills and celebrate the journey so far. Gather your friends, unleash your inner Avatar, and step into a new era of Stumble Guys.

attributes.title: The ultimate CLUB SHOWDOWN
attributes.overview:
Here comes the ultimate CLUB SHOWDOWN 
We’re kicking off a two-phase tournament to crown the BEST Club in the Stumbleverse and yep, the rewards are shiny
attributes.content:
Alright stumblers, here comes the ultimate CLUB SHOWDOWN

We’re kicking off a two-phase tournament to crown the BEST Club in the Stumbleverse and yep, the rewards are shiny!

 

CLUB TOURNAMENT — AUGUST EDITION

TIMELINE

Phase One: Ranked Season Battle

  • Starts: Aug 14th (after Clubs launch globally)
  • Ends: Sep 3rd @ 6pm CET  time
  • Top 4 Clubs announced: Sep 4–11
  • Live Showdown: Sep 12–14
  • Winners revealed: Sep 15

HOW IT WORKS

PHASE ONE: Climb the Club Ladder!

  • Play Ranked and earn Ranked Points to climb the leaderboard
    • The Ranked Points you earn add up for your entire Club!
    • (e.g) If Jim earns 4,000 and Bob earns 6,000 the Club will have 10,000 total!
    • Ranked Points earned only counts starting August 14th! Points you earned before will not count. 
  • At the end of the season, we’ll take a snapshot of Club rankings
  • Top 8 Clubs qualify for the ultimate showdown
  • Didn’t respond in time? We move to the next in line! ⏱️
    • You must contact us on Discord before September 10th 

We’ll post:

  • Top Clubs on Discord, Reddit and all Socials

Rewards?

  • Top 10 Clubs get 50 Gems PER member!
  • Top 4 Clubs compete for big prizes (see below ↓)

 

PHASE TWO: The Showdown Begins

  • Top 8 Clubs nominate 2 champions each
  • 1v1v1v1 matches in custom lobbies
  • Each match contains 7 rounds of sweaty chaos 
  • Win 1st in the round to score 1 point for your club
  • Match goes to time? Rematch with more abilities enabled.
  • Highest scoring Club wins it all!
     

Streamed LIVE by our awesome CC/AMB hosts!

  • Sept 12: Club 8 vs Club 7 and Club 6 vs Club 5 -> Winners duel it out
  • Sept 13: Club 4 vs Club 3 and Club 2 vs Club 1 ->  Winners duel it out
  • Sept 14: Final match between 2 remaining teams
  • Sept 15: Champions revealed
     

REWARDS

TOP 4 CLUBS PHASE 2 (all members get this):

PARTICIPATION REWARDS:

  • Top 10 Clubs Phase 1 = 50 Gems per member

FINAL FOUR PLAYERS IN PHASE 2:

  • Finalists earn a golden in-game Club Champ Title until Dec 1st

 

Get your squad ready. Get those points. And may the most chaotic Club take the crown

attributes.title: Cosmic Chaos Update - Patch Notes 0.89
attributes.overview:
Hold on to your hats, Stumblers, because in this update, everything changes.
Patch 0.89 is all about playing together, climbing higher, and stumbling harder than ever before!

Introducing a brand-new social feature that brings the Stumbleverse closer than ever: Clubs! Team up with friends, build your own community, and unlock rewards by working together toward shared Goals. Whether you're chasing leaderboard glory or simply vibing with your crew, Clubs are your new home in the chaos.
attributes.content:
Stumble Together more than ever! Hold on to your hats, Stumblers, because in this update, everything changes. 

Patch 0.89 is all about playing together, climbing higher, and stumbling harder than ever before! 

Clubs Are (Almost) Here!
We’re getting ready to launch our brand-new Club feature — a social way to team up, complete shared Goals, and unlock rewards together! **But before it rolls out worldwide, we’ll be kicking things off with a limited regional release.

Clubs will first be available in:

  • Brazil
  • Indonesia
  • Germany
  • France

This rollout helps us test stability, gather feedback, and make sure everything’s ready for a full global release. Stay tuned — your turn to build the ultimate Stumble Squad is coming soon!

Team up with friends, build your own community, and unlock rewards by working together toward shared Goals. Whether you’re chasing leaderboard glory or simply vibing with your crew, Clubs are your new home in the chaos. But don’t get too comfy!

We’re also dropping two epic new levels to test your reflexes and strategy: 

Starship Stumble hurls you through a crumbling space highway in low gravity, while Graffiti Gravity Legendary brings falling chaos, double-height blocks, and shrinking arenas to a whole new level. 

For all our anime fans, the My Hero Academia collaboration is back, with a new flashy Skin for your collection! Step into the shoes of your favorite heroes (or villains) and stumble your way to glory with returning Skins and cosmetics inspired by the hit series. Ready to stumble? 

Let’s dive into the madness. 

______

New Feature: Clubs Stumbling is already awesome, but wouldn’t it be even better together? Get ready to team up with a Club, coming to the Stumbleverse in 0.89! You and up to 50 Stumblers can now create your own, personal Club! Form your community, complete Goals, and win more rewards together! Build your Club’s unique identity with a cool name, label, description, and customized badge. Win together and rake in the rewards! To prove you’re the best Club, complete Goals as quickly as possible. All members of your Club will win rewards as you progress. There’s even an exclusive Stumbler for the Clubs that finish all Goals in a season. Your Club’s badge will upgrade as you progress, so keep conquering Goals and show off your achievements! The better your Club performs, the more your Badge flaunts–unlock consecutive season streaks to really show off! Admire your Club’s unique identity with new username labels and panels in your profile containing your detailed stats. You can even invite Club members directly to your custom party or play with friends matches! Team up with a Club and stumble better, together! 

______

Returning IP Collaboration: My Hero Academia 

Class is back in session! The fan-favorite My Hero Academia collaboration returns to Stumble Guys, bringing back heroic energy, powerful cosmetics, and your favorite characters from U.A. Highschool! Suit up as Deku, Bakugo, Todoroki, and more as you stumble your way to victory with style worthy of a Pro Hero. Whether you’re team Class 1-A or plotting like a villain, this is your chance to show what being a hero really means. For those of you who are really taking it to the Plus Ultra level, there is a shiny new Skin: All Might in his Professor suit! This skin has a very dynamic feature: he transforms back and forth between his base and power form depending on how much power is put into the battle! New Cosmetic: Professor All Might [Special] Missed something the first time? Now’s your moment to complete your collection!

 ________  

New Level: Starship Stumble Buckle up, Stumblers! it’s time to take your stumbling interstellar. Starship Stumble throws you onto a collapsing space highway aboard a runaway spacecraft, where survival means quick thinking, low-gravity leaps, and serious pro moves. As the match begins, players speed into a debris field orbiting a dying planet. Waves of floating junk hurtle toward the ship, and it’s up to you to jump, dive, and weave your way through the chaos. Sounds easy? Think again. 

Once you clear the early waves, gravity takes a break. The low-gravity zone lets you soar to new heights. But don’t be so chill, it also brings bigger, more dangerous obstacles. Midway through, the stakes rise as the floor drops away, forcing players to land only on obstacles to survive. 

Every surface becomes a hazard or a lifeline. Want to really show off? This Level is packed with skill-based shortcuts and side clutch opportunities for the boldest Stumblers. Starship Stumble isn’t just about dodging danger, it’s about mastering momentum. Can you navigate the stars and make it to the end, or will you be lost in orbit? __________ 

New Level: Graffiti Gravity Legendary Graffiti Gravity is back, and this time, it’s Legendary. 

Step into a chaotic art-filled arena where blocks rain from above, the floor is never safe, and survival means thinking fast and jumping faster. All your favorite hazards return: Normal blocks that demand quick dodges, drill blocks that cut through the arena, paint balloons that splatter chaos across the floor… But now, a new double-height block enters the mix, shaking up your strategy with intense jump sequences and sudden arena splits. These mega blocks divide the battlefield, forcing you to adapt on the fly or be flattened. 

And that’s just the beginning. With larger, more unpredictable and randomized wave patterns, no two matches feel the same. Just when you think you’ve found a safe spot, the arena shrinks, leaving less room and more pressure. 

Oh, and did we mention Team mode? Team up with a friend, revive each other mid-match, and try to outlast the chaos together. In Graffiti Gravity Legendary, expect the unexpected, and then some more. Will you survive the storm of color, or be painted out of the match? ______ 

New Level: Night Dash You know the chaos. 

You know the blocks. But you’ve never seen Block Dash like this! Night Dash takes the classic elimination experience and launches it into deep space. The floor? Invisible. The skybox? A swirling cosmic void. And beneath it all? A massive, ominous black hole, ready to swallow any Stumbler who slips. Don’t worry: the mechanics remain untouched. 

It’s the same iconic gameplay you know and love: dodge the incoming blocks, time your jumps, and don’t fall. But the new look dials the tension way up, playing with your senses as you stumble across a transparent floor suspended in the stars. This is Block Dash… but in space. Welcome to the Night Dash. Try not to lose your footing, or your mind. _______ 

Ranked Season 13 This season, it’s time to strip it back to the basics. In Ranked Season 13, we’re testing a bold twist: no Abilities, just skills. 

Every dash, dive, and dodge will be powered solely by your instincts and reflexes, no special powers, no second chances. To make things even more exciting, we’ve updated the Level pool to suit each rank tier. As you climb the ranks, new challenges await: 

Champion Exclusive Reward Reach Champion rank, and you’ll unlock a chess-themed exclusive Skin, continuing the collectable-ranked series introduced in the previous season. This new piece adds to your elite set, and can only be earned by those who conquer the top of the Ranked ladder. 

New Ranked Exclusive Cosmetic: Azure Knight [Legendary] No abilities. No shortcuts. Just pure, unfiltered competition. Do you have what it takes to rise to the top?

Cosmetics 

Emotes 

  • Alien [Common]
  • Curious [Common]
  • Psst [Uncommon]
  • To the Moon [Uncommon]
  • Under Control [Uncommon]
  • UwU 64 [Uncommon] 

Footsteps 

  • Error Messages [Rare]
  • Chile Flag [Epic]
  • Dimensional Crack [Mythic]
  • Neptune [Uncommon]
  • Romania Flag [Epic]
  • Starfall [Legendary]
  • Stumble Space Agency [Rare] 

Stumblers 

  • Zorgo [Epic]
  • Astro Jackie [Uncommon]
  • Astrobara [Rare]
  • Peelsarian [Legendary]
  • Blinky 64 [Epic]
  • Captain Stumble [Uncommon]
  • Hug-o-bot [Legendary]
  • Droid [Rare]
  • Emerald Alien [Special]
  • Exo-lad [Epic]
  • Mechacheeks [Mythic]
  • Picklenaut [Legendary]
  • Space Ghost [Epic]
  • Rift [Special]
  • Rocket Rodeo [Mythic]
  • Gloob [Legendary]
  • Commander Chimp [Rare]
  • Stumble Racer [Legendary]
  • Azure Knight [Legendary] - Ranked Exclusive
  • Professor All Might [Special]  - MHA Collab return 

Taunt Animations 

  • Alienation [Epic]
  • Laser Salvo [Legendary]
  • Panic in Outer Space [Rare] 

Victory Animations 

  • Warp [Legendary]
  • Zero Gravity [Rare]
  • Singularity [Legendary]
  • Emperor of the Sun [Epic] 

________ 

Bug Fixes 

We’ve tackled a range of bugs and issues to improve your Stumble Guys experience in 0.89. 

Here’s what’s been resolved: 

Gameplay & Levels 

  • Fixed a bug where NPCs would mistakenly attack their own teammates in Stumble Rumble Teams.
  • Resolved an issue where footsteps remained enlarged after Shrink or Giant buffs wore off.
  • The elimination screen no longer shows a black background in the Night Dash level.
  • Fixed a visual glitch causing building VFX in the Block Dash Endless skybox to flicker.
  • Corrected a bug where the Shield didn’t consistently appear after respawning in Elimination Teams maps.
  • The Blimp asset in UGC maps now correctly includes collision. - Players can once again equip the Chicken Bomb ability without issues. 

Visuals & UI 

  • Fixed an issue where the wheel spin animation would play twice after receiving a duplicate reward.
  • The dynamic lobby background now loads correctly in the Stumble Pass. 

Events 

  • Resolved a bug where Stumble Rumble Teams matches did not end even after all opposing teams were eliminated.
  • Addressed an error that occurred sometimes when claiming Gatcha boxes in the Global LTC Meta Event. Thanks for playing, and Happy Stumbling!

attributes.title: Ranked Season 12 is Here!
attributes.overview: Are you ready for the new Ranked Season? Lock on and reach that Champion rank!
attributes.content:
## RANKED SEASON 12 IS HERE!

Are you ready for the new Ranked Season? Lock on and reach that Champion rank!


### WHAT'S NEW IN THIS SEASON?

**Champion Exclusive Reward**

Climb the ladder, conquer your opponents, and earn your place among the best. This season, those who reach Champion Rank will unlock the next piece of our exclusive Chess collection: the Royal Knight. Each Ranked Season brings a new Chess-themed skin — available only through Ranked play. Collect them all and complete your board... if you have what it takes to reach the top. 

Only the strongest will earn the full set!

### Abilities Configuration

To keep Ranked focused on skill and balance, only a select group of Abilities are enabled this season:

Hug
Shield
Slide
Slap
Chop
Rake
Shutdown
Bouncing Ball
Power Jump
Rewind 

### SEASON 12 MAP ROTATION

We’ve fine-tuned the level pools for each rank — every map in a given pool has equal chance of appearing:

- Laser Dash
- Laser Tracer

- Jurassic Rush
- Lava Land

<u>Silver:</u>

attributes.title: 0.88 PATCH NOTES – Stumbling into the Jurassic Era!
attributes.overview: We’re throwing it all the way back to the age of dinosaurs with our biggest collab yet: Jurassic World! From stampeding dinos and volcanic jumps in Jurassic Rush, to bending time with the new Rewind ability, this update is packed with prehistoric mayhem.
attributes.content:
Update 0.88 is officially live, and the chaos has never looked better!

We’re throwing it all the way back to the age of dinosaurs with our biggest collab yet: Jurassic World! From stampeding dinos and volcanic jumps in Jurassic Rush, to bending time with the new Rewind ability, this update is packed with prehistoric mayhem.

### Here’s what was already shared in the Open Beta Patch Notes:

- The Jurassic World collaboration and the new map: Jurassic Rush
- New gameplay mechanics like T-Rex Takeover, Tiny Dino Speedster, and Raptor Rampage
- The extended map Floor Is Lava EXTENDED — now with Team Mode
- The Legendary Rewind Ability and how it works
- Bot behavior improvements across multiple maps


### Steam Players: Split-Screen is Here!

It’s time to bring the chaos to your couch! With the new Split Screen feature on Steam, you can now grab a controller, invite your friends, and start a local party — no extra PCs needed!

Whether you're teaming up or sabotaging each other, up to 4 players can now join the fun on a single screen. Just plug in your controllers, launch a Custom Party, and let the stumble mayhem begin!

Get ready for local laughs, epic fails, and non-stop party action, all from the comfort of your living room.


### COSMETICS

**Emotes**

- Crazy Cluck [Uncommon]
- Dead Fish [Common]
- Jungle Stumble [Common]
- Sssick! [Uncommon]
- Thumbs Up BotaniX [Uncommon]
- S.O.S. [Uncommon]

**Footsteps**

- Ancient Idols [Rare]
- Aurora [Legendary]
- Dino Chase [Epic]
- Jungle Magic [Legendary]
- Lush Jungle [Epic]
- Molten Steps [Legendary]

**Stumblers**

- King of Dorado [Special]
- Totemite [Legendary]
- Primitive Cluck [Rare]
- Stranded Banana [Legendary]
- Cybermayan [Legendary]
- D-Rex [Mythic]
- Patriotron [Legendary]
- Tikalito [Uncommon]
- Shaomao [Rare]
- Mystic Shroom [Special]
- Shadow Beast [Special]
- Spirit of Hope [Mythic]
- Sir Hissington [Epic]
- BotaniX [Epic]
- Aurora Totemite [Mythic]
- Jurassic World Fan [Rare]
- Night James [Legendary]
- Golden James [Mythic]
- Inverted James [Epic]
- Golden Knight [Rare]
- Kindlekin [Legendary]
- Nightwing [Special]
- Golden Onijutsu [Special]
- Sunzo [Legendary]
- Fénix Dorado [Epic]
- Chocolette [Epic]

**Taunt Animations**

- Bushes [Legendary]
- Dance of the Jungle [Rare]

**Victory Animations**

- Boiled [Legendary]
- Fake Dino [Uncommon]
- Golden Blessings [Mythic]
- Rain-calling [Epic]


### BUG FIXES

We’ve continued polishing the game and squashing bugs to improve your experience in Stumble Guys! Here’s what’s been fixed in Update 0.88:

**General Fixes & Stability Improvements**

- Fixed an issue where the ‘CHOOSE’ button remained visible after claiming all grand prizes in the Banana Bonanza event.
- Resolved a visual overlap in the Epic Skin Wheel reward screen after multiple spins.
- Resolved a bug where an unknown error pop-up appeared after completing a Ranked match.
- Addressed overlapping UI elements for the “Recommended” tag in certain languages.
- Fixed an issue where empty space appeared after managing friend requests.
- Web: Fixed a scroll bug in the Shop after canceling a purchase.
- Improved memory usage caused by Tournaments feature in version 0.84.


**Gameplay & Level Fixes**

- Fixed an invisible collision in Lava Rush that caused characters to hover mid-air.
- Bots no longer get stuck on ramps in Icy Caramba and Icy Heights.
- The “Custom Pool” setting now correctly defaults to “Official Levels Only.”
- Fixed jittery water visuals in the Super Water Slide level.
- The elimination map was not appearing correctly in the Elimination Cup — now fixed.
- Event: Melee (Spatula) now correctly affects other players.
- Incorrect trophy count no longer appears in reward screens.


**Shop & UI Fixes**

- Fixed a visual issue where the multiple spins text layer appeared incorrectly in the One Stop Shop.
- The incorrect reward icon is no longer shown on the tournament reward screen.
- Offers no longer appear duplicated in the One Stop Shop.
- Fixed incorrect background visuals on some store offers.
- Steam: Discounted and original prices for Special Box now display correctly.
- Missing art asset fixed in the 'Gems Sale' offer in the For You section.


**Abilities Fixes**

- The Spatula ability now correctly activates in Bucket Mayhem gameplay.


### KNOWN ISSUES

We’re tracking the following issues and working on fixes in upcoming updates:

- Broken graphics on the Qualification screen after Night Block Dash.
- Web: Game may freeze if tab is backgrounded for ~20 seconds after round one.
- Characters may get pulled by moving objects in Battle Dash Teams.
- XP Road and level-up animation may not trigger immediately on return to Home.
- Golden/Silver skins and the golden hat ability appear dark in modified maps.
- “Invite Friend” toast notification not appearing in Custom Party invites.
- Pink patch briefly appears on animations after returning from One Stop Shop.
- Toast notifications don’t appear after completing a mission.
- Missing thumbnails in Featured Events and Dynamic Containers.
- Workshop: Game can get stuck in spectating after exiting a user-generated level.
- Steam: Pricing for discounted Special Box not shown correctly.
- Ability slots not visible for the host in Play with Friends lobby.

From split-screen mayhem to dino-sized surprises, Update 0.88 delivers the ultimate prehistoric playground. But don’t get too comfortable - even more chaos is already in the works. Keep your eyes peeled for what’s coming next... it might just rewrite Stumble Guys history.

attributes.title: The Stumble Guys Hot Drops Summer 2025 is here!
attributes.overview: Ready for the most chaotic, unpredictable, and rewarding summer yet? Introducing the Stumble Guys Hot Drops Summer — a month packed with surprise giveaways, running July 1 through July 28! That’s 4 whole weeks of gem grabs, token tosses, ability key craziness!
attributes.content:
# The Stumble Guys Hot Drops Summer 2025 is here!


Ready for the most chaotic, unpredictable, and rewarding summer yet? Introducing the **Stumble Guys Hot Drops Summer** — a month packed with surprise giveaways, running **July 1 through July 28!** That’s 4 whole weeks of gem grabs, token tosses, ability key craziness!


**But here's the catch… you never know when or where the next Hot Drop will hit.**

# What Are Hot Drops?

Think of them as surprise mini-giveaways that pop up on our social media channels at random times, on random days, in random places. One moment you’re scrolling TikTok, the next you’ve snagged 100 gems. Maybe you reply to a tweet and boom — Battle Pass in your pocket.

# How to Join the Madness

**Follow us everywhere** — seriously.
Hot Drops will be scattered across:

- [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/stumbleguys/)
- [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@stumbleguystt)
- [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@StumbleGuys)
- [X](https://x.com/StumbleGuysGame)
- [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/StumbleGuysGame/)

… and who knows where else?

-------

Hot Drops Summer is our way of saying **thanks** — and keeping the summer vibes rolling with surprises around every corner. So turn on those notis, and we’ll see you online.

attributes.title: Ranked Season 11 is Here!
attributes.overview: Are you ready for the new Rank Season? How far will you go? Better be ready to drop some amazing plays!
attributes.content:
# RANKED SEASON 11 IS HERE!

Are you ready for the new Rank Season? How far will you go? Better be ready to drop some amazing plays! 

### WHAT'S NEW IN THIS SEASON?

For Season 11 of Ranked, we’re making a key adjustment to improve matchmaking and the overall Ranked experience:

- Smaller Matches, Tighter Competition - Ranked matches now feature 12 players instead of 16.

This change speeds up matchmaking, especially during off-peak hours, and creates more consistent, competitive battles. With fewer players, each match feels tighter, more strategic, and more skill-based, just as our top players have requested.

- Rank Points (RP) rewards have also been rebalanced to match the new 12-player format, ensuring your climb remains fair and rewarding.

- Party Size Adjustments 

With the 12-player format, Play with Friends now supports up to 3 players per Ranked lobby (down from 4).
This helps maintain balanced matchmaking and ensures fair competition across all parties. It’s still the perfect way to climb the ranks with your duo or trio squad.

- Champion Exclusive Reward 

Those who make it all the way to Champion Rank will unlock a brand-new exclusive skin — Champion Knight will be your badge of honor that will showcase your elite skills!

### Abilities Configuration

To keep Ranked focused on skill and balance, only a select group of Abilities are enabled this season:

- Briefcase
- Shield
- Speed Gel
- Punch
- Spin
- Sticky Bomb
- Bouncing Ball
- Dice Roll

### SEASON 11 MAP ROTATION

We’ve fine-tuned the level pools for each rank — every map in a given pool has equal chance of appearing: 

<u>Wood, Bronze and Silver:</u>

- Factory Fiasco
- Laser Dash
- Block Dash
- Jungle Roll
- Bombardment (Wood/Bronze only)
- sh-ARRRRGH-ks! (Silver only)

<u>Gold:</u>

- Factory Fiasco
- Laser Dash
- Block Dash
- sh-ARRRRGH-ks!

<u>Platinum:</u>

- Factory Fiasco
- Laser Dash
- Block Dash Legendary
- Rush Hour Legendary

Master and Champion:
- Factory Fiasco
- Block Dash Legendary
- Rush Hour Legendary
- Laser Dash Legendary

We’re aiming to keep the Ranked grind smooth, competitive, and rewarding. We’ll be keeping a close eye on how this change plays out. Thanks for climbing the ranks with us! Good luck everyone!

attributes.title: Exclusive Creator Bundle - MTM SAMU
attributes.overview: Get ready to rumble, Stumblers! The MTM SAMU bundle is now live in Stumble Guys! Dive into this exclusive interview to get to know SAMU better!
attributes.content:
### MTM SAMU Has Entered the Arena!

Get ready to rumble, Stumblers! The MTM SAMU bundle is now live in Stumble Guys! Dive into this exclusive interview to get to know SAMU better!

**- Can you briefly introduce yourself to our players?**

 I'm MTMSAMU, the first content creator to ever upload Stumble Guys!
 
**- How long have you been a content creator/streamer?**

Since the beginning — I started playing Stumble Guys when it only had around 30,000 downloads.

**- What is your biggest accomplishment in Stumble Guys as a player?**

I reached World Top 1 in both trophies and crowns back when hackers didn’t exist.

**- What do you like the most about Stumble Guys?**

Its gameplay.

**- What is your favourite skin/emote/etc?**

For skins, I’ll go with the dragon — I used it for a long time. And for emotes, definitely the punch.

**- What is a good memory you have from Stumble Guys in your life?**

So many! A lot of nostalgia from the golden moments of Stumble Guys.

**- Favourite IP introduced into the game?**

Hot Wheels.

**- Can you share what initially drew you to create content specifically for Stumble Guys?**

I always liked TV shows like Takeshi’s Castle, and this matched that vibe perfectly.

**- Could you describe one or two of your favorite pieces of content that you’ve made for Stumble Guys and what made them special?**

Without a doubt, I loved hosting creative map contests the most.

**- What advice would you give to someone who wants to start creating content for Stumble Guys?**

Be original.

**- Why did you pick these items for your curated bundle?**

They represent me 100%.

**- Where is the bundle available and for how long?**

It will be available in the shop for around 2 weeks.

**- The link to your main channel**

https://www.youtube.com/@MTMSAMU

**- What is your creator code?**

My creator code is SAMU.

Don’t miss your chance to play as one of the legends of the Stumbleverse!  The MTM SAMU bundle is only available for a limited time, so head to the shop and grab it while you can!

attributes.title: 0.87 Patch Notes - Plunder Party!
attributes.overview: In this update, we’re cranking the madness up a notch with Extras, a brand-new game mode coming to events that gives everyone a set of wild powers to open your way to victory.
attributes.content:
# 0.87 Patch Notes

Think you’ve seen chaos? You haven’t seen anything yet. In this update, we’re cranking the madness up a notch with Extras, a brand-new game mode coming to events that gives everyone a set of wild powers to open your way to victory. These mechanics are designed to shake up the rules of play. And the best part? Everyone’s powered. Everyone’s dangerous.

But it’s not just the gameplay getting a glow-up. Several iconic levels are getting a sleek visual rework, with polished environments and upgraded effects that make the chaos look better than ever. Same wild fun, now with even more shine.

Ready to power up and stand out? Let’s stumble into a whole new dimension of fun.

### Levels Polish

Some iconic levels just got a serious glow-up! We’ve upgraded effects, lighting, and polish to make the chaos feel more immersive than ever. These levels have been optimized to improve their performance. Gameplay is unchanged—only visuals!

**Updated levels:**

- Bombardment
- sh-ARRRRGH-ks!
- Sharkmuda Triangle,
- Jungle Roll

### Changes to MrBeast Content:

As part of the 0.87 update, we’ve removed the Workshop MrBeast-branded content from Stumble Guys due to the expiration of our licensing agreement.

This includes de-branded assets previously used in Workshop maps. As a result, some existing Workshop creations may look and feel different than before.

We understand this may be unexpected for some players and creators, and we appreciate your understanding as we continue to evolve the game and its content.

### New Feature: EXTRAS!

![unnamed (9).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_9_cdb15d0e90.png)


Introducing **EXTRAS**, a brand-new way to experience events with a powerful twist. 

This feature adds unique functionalities to your gameplay, similar to abilities, but designed to keep things fair and fun for everyone. 

Whether you're surviving in elimination levels, or punching your way through the chaos in race levels, EXTRAS are activated for all players in selected events, bringing a fresh layer of strategy, unpredictability, and pure Stumble madness. 

Some events will let you equip your own abilities, with EXTRAS adding even more tools for chaos. Others will level the playing field by disabling personal abilities entirely. Everyone will compete using the same set of features.


It’s not about picking the best power, it’s about making the most of what everyone’s got. Let the experiments begin!

Let’s take a look at the first EXTRAS we are introducing in this version:

![unnamed (10).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_10_93ad63b376.png)

Need a lift? Activate Geyser Gust to blast yourself 
high into the air with a burst of upward energy! 
You’ve got 3 charges to use. Stack them to stay airborne 
even longer. Whether you’re on the ground or mid-jump, 
launch upward in style with a mini geyser that follows 
your every move. Perfect for big escapes or high-flying stunts.

![unnamed (13).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_13_8074c7ccb6.png)

Build your own path! Walk the Plank lets you drop 
platforms beneath your feet, on the ground or in 
mid-air, giving you new ways to cross gaps, reach 
shortcuts, or help your squad. Each player gets 
2 charges, and anyone can use the planks you place. 
Link them together for epic tricks, sneaky detours, 
or pure platforming chaos.

![unnamed (12).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_12_547702d8d3.png)

Release the Crab Attack! Lob a cranky crustacean into 
the fray and watch it scuttle side to side, 
knocking back anyone in its path, friends and foes alike. 	
The crab walks until it hits a wall or a player, 
then flips direction and keeps going. 
Punch it, kick it, dodge it... just don’t get crab-smacked!

![unnamed (11).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_11_660d642b70.png)

Like it or not, It’s party time! Drop a Dance Fever zone around 
you that forces nearby opponents into a groovy 
dance break. While the music plays, anyone caught 
in the area slows down and loses access to their 
own abilities. Keep moving and the disco follows you.
just beware, your dance floor might get crowded fast!

### Abilities Balance Changes

As part of this update, we’ve made a few balance tweaks to existing abilities to keep the action fair, fun, and unpredictable. 

- Invisibility: Duration at max level slightly increased to help you stay sneaky a bit longer.
- Shield: Buffed slightly to match the improved invisibility timing.
- Briefcase Silence: Effectiveness slightly reduced, so it’s no longer stronger than Shutdown.
- Dice Roll: Slightly increased cooldown and a small reduction to max speed. It is still wild, just a bit more manageable.
- Banana: Tweaked cooldown and stun time at max to better balance its impact.

### Cosmetics

<u>Taunt Animations</u>

- Parrot [Legendary]
- Swashbuckling [Epic]
- Telescope [Rare]

<u>Victory Animations</u>

- Crab Dance [Uncommon]
- Forbidden Treasure [Legendary]
- Mount the Cannons [Epic]
- Swab the Deck [Rare]
- Trident [Rare]

### Bug fixes

We’ve been hard at work squashing bugs and improving your experience in Stumble Guys! Here’s what’s been fixed in Update 0.87:

<u>General Fixes & Stability Improvements</u>

- Promotion tags now correctly show up on static offers in the Shop.
- The “Place in Top 5, 3 times” mission now appears correctly in the Special Missions section.
- Characters no longer overlap the offer titles in the Shop.
- The corrupted star visual effect no longer appears when leveling up in the Stumble Pass.
- Resolved an issue where cooldown for free spin offers did not reset after creating a new user.

<u>Gameplay & Level Fixes</u>

- Fixed a bug where the Chicken Bomb ability only affected the direct target and not players in its area of effect.
- The purple jar from the Chicken Bomb now correctly breaks and creates its area of effect on single tiles.
- Fixed invisible barriers in the Acid Pool map that were affecting gameplay.
- Players no longer get stuck on blocks in the “Block Dash Remastered Giant” and “Block Dash Teams Giant” maps.
- Resolved an issue where bots in the Laser Slide level got stuck and failed to finish the match.
- The pink patch no longer appears on the victory screen in elimination maps.
- The green laser’s kill area has been reverted to its intended size.
- Fixed a bug where the player could avoid yellow tiles by transforming into a chicken.
- Bombs now correctly appear in both “Stumble Up” and “Stumble Up EZ” levels.
- Fixed a missing explosion animation on wooden platforms in the “sh-ARRRRGH-ks!” level.
- Players can no longer jump unusually high in Workshop event maps.
- Players are no longer able to exploit Ranked mode by disabling Wi-Fi.
- Fixed an issue where water from fire hydrants in “Special Delivery” didn’t affect players on the other side of horizontal lasers.
- Resolved a bug where the camera clipped through walls in the “Abduction Avenue” level.
- Players no longer get stuck in the right-side grass area during gameplay on “Jungle Roll”.

<u>Abilities Fixes</u>

- The Hug ability no longer causes characters to slow down over time with repeated use.
- The Shutdown ability now properly greys out after being used.
- Fixed an issue where the Rake ability could go under the floor at the spawn point in “Cannonball Climb”.
- The Block Throw ability and its variants now show the correct visual effects in gameplay.
- Max-level abilities now correctly display their golden border in Custom Party and the Customize menu.
- Abilities and emotes no longer appear banned in Workshop maps after visiting a Ranked mode with banned abilities.
- Disabled abilities can no longer be used with custom key bindings in Ranked With Friends mode (Steam only).

<u>Custom Parties & Social</u>

- Fixed an issue where a negative counter appeared in the HUD when starting an elimination Custom Party with 4–16 players.
- The SFX of the Old Fart skin no longer carries over to other skins after creating a party.

Update 0.87 brings fresh chaos with new powers, slick visual upgrades, and tons of gameplay fixes. Dive into the action with Extras, explore revamped levels, and show off your moves with the latest cosmetics. It’s all about bigger moments, bolder stunts, and better battles. See you in the stumble!

attributes.title: Important Update
attributes.overview: Important Update: On November 6th, Stumble Tokens will be replaced by Coins. Tokens will convert automatically, and related add-ons will be removed. Get ready for a new in-game currency experience in Stumble Guys!
attributes.content:
# **Important Console Updated** On November 6th, Stumble Tokens will be replaced by Coins. Tokens will convert automatically, and related add-ons will be removed. As part of the transition to Coins, all add-ons offering Stumble Tokens will be removed from the store and will no longer be available.
Also on November 6th, Ability Keys and Tokens will be available through in-game and console purchasable add-ons.

Keep Stumblin!

attributes.title: New Stumble Pass Just Dropped!
attributes.overview: The brand-new Stumble Pass is now live in Stumble Guys, and it’s packed with exclusive skins, hilarious emotes, and a colorful lineup of cosmetics you won’t want to miss.
attributes.content:
New Stumble Pass Just Dropped! Here’s Everything You Need to Know!

The wait is over! The brand-new Stumble Pass is now live in Stumble Guys, and it’s packed with exclusive skins, hilarious emotes, and a colorful lineup of cosmetics you won’t want to miss.

### Kick Off with Captain Justice

Right at the start of the pass, you unlock the epic Captain Justice - a true hero in black and red armor, ready to dive into the chaos with style.

### Unlock Skins, Animations, and More

This season’s Pass is bursting with a wide range of stumblers and customization options, including:

- Masked Hood skin (Rare) 
- Cyberio’s Circuit footsteps (Epic) 
- Odachi skin (Uncommon)

### Progress & Prizes

Activate the Stumble Pass now and show the world your true superhero form on the battlefield.
See you in the Stumbleverse!

attributes.title: Ranked Season 10 is Here!
attributes.overview: Starting with Ranked Season 10, and based on a popular request from our community, we’re shaking up the Ranked experience with the introduction of season-specific ability pools
attributes.content:
Are you ready for the new Rank Season? How far will you go? Better be ready to drop some amazing plays!  

## WHAT'S NEW IN THIS SEASON?

**Limited Abilities Ranked Seasons**

Starting with Ranked Season 10, and based on a popular request from our community, we’re shaking up the Ranked experience with the introduction of season-specific ability pools.

This change is designed to add variety to the meta, encourage new strategies, and deliver a more balanced playing field.

In-game, you’ll see this reflected on the Ranked page: any disabled abilities will appear grayed out and marked with a red “X” in the ability selection menu, so you’ll always know what’s available before you queue up.

### Featured Abilities for Ranked Season 10

- Hug
- Banana
- Invisibility
- Slide
- Punch
- Slap
- Power Jump
- Chicken Bomb 

### NEW ABILITY

**Chicken Bomb**
Introducing the Chicken Bomb, the unique social ability which lets players turn opponents into chickens for a limited time, creating the perfect storm of confusion, speed boosts, and LOL moments.

<u>How it works:</u>
When activated, your Stumbler throws a flask directly into the air. As it falls, it shatters on impact, creating an area of effect . Anyone caught inside this area (including the thrower) is temporarily transformed into a chicken, complete with increased movement speed and reduced jump height.

## SEASON MAP ROTATION

<u>Wood and  Bronze:</u>

- Graffiti Gravity
- Laser Dash
- Rush Hour
- Block Dash Remastered

<u>Silver:</u>

- Graffiti Gravity
- Laser Dash
- Rush Hour
- Block Dash Remastered
- Bot Bash

<u>Gold:</u>

- Graffiti Gravity
- Laser Dash
- Rush Hour
- Bot Bash
- Block Dash Legendary

<u>Platinum:</u>

- Graffiti Gravity
- Laser Dash
- Bot Bash
- Block Dash Legendary
- Laser Tracer
- Rush Hour Legendary

<u>Master and  Champion:</u>

- Graffiti Gravity
- Block Dash Legendary
- Laser Tracer
- Rush Hour Legendary
- Laser Dash Legendary

Ranked season 10 ends on Thursday, 5 June. Good luck everyone! We'll be cheering for you <3

attributes.title: New Ability: CHICKEN BOMB!
attributes.overview: The Chicken Bomb is a social ability that lets your Stumbler throw a mysterious flask into the air. Once it lands and shatters on the ground, it triggers an area of effect that transforms anyone caught inside - yes, even you - into a chicken for a short time
attributes.content:
Get ready to ruffle some feathers in Stumble Guys with the brand-new Chicken Bomb ability!

We’re always looking for new ways to keep you on your toes (or wings), and this latest ability brings a special twist to your favorite races. Introducing CHICKEN BOMB!!!

## What Is the Chicken Bomb?
The Chicken Bomb is a social ability that lets your Stumbler throw a mysterious flask into the air. Once it lands and shatters on the ground, it triggers an area of effect that transforms anyone caught inside - yes, even you - into a chicken for a short time.

**Yep. A chicken.**

What Happens When You're Chicken-ified?
Once transformed, your Stumbler:

- Gains increased movement speed

- Has reduced jump height

- And, well... looks like a chicken.


## Pro Tips for Using the Chicken Bomb

- Throw strategically: Aim for crowded spots to maximize the mayhem.

- Mind the splash zone: You’ll turn into a chicken too if you’re inside the effect!

- Combo chaos: Use it with other abilities or on narrow platforms to really mess with the flow.

So go ahead - embrace the feathers, troll the lobby, and cluck your way to glory. See you in the arena… if you’re fast enough to catch us.

attributes.title: 0.86 Patch Notes
attributes.overview: The latest Stumble Guys update introduces thrilling content like high-tech race levels, laser-dodging gauntlets, and the hilarious Stumblewood battle royale. Players will also enjoy a redesigned Shop and sleeker main menu for improved navigation. Whether you’re a speed demon or chaos king, this update delivers fresh fun and competitive edge.
attributes.content:
Speed demons and laser leapers, rejoice - we’re rolling out electrifying new maps and more. Dash through high-tech slides and sizzling lasers in a brand-new race level, or test your reflexes in the latest Legendary Laser Tracer gauntlet. Plus, it’s survival of the silliest in the all-new Stumblewood battle royale. 

And to top it all off, we’re giving the game a fresh coat of paint. The Shop has been updated, and the main menu has been upgraded, putting everything right at your fingertips. Sleek, sharp, and ready for action - just like you. Let’s stumble into this new era, hero or villain cape in tow!

## NEW LEVELS

**Laser Slide**

- Slide & Sprint Fusion: This level combines fast-paced slide segments with on-foot laser sections, delivering nonstop action from start to finish.
- Multiple Routes & Pro-moves: Discover alternate paths and skips.
- Randomized Laser Layouts: No two races are the same—laser sections change every round to keep things fresh.

**Stumblewood Arena**

- No teams. No script. Just chaos.
- Free For All Combat: No teams. Every stumbler is a target.
- Storm Mechanic: A dangerous storm slowly closes in, shrinking the safe zone and forcing stumblers into intense final showdowns.
- No Weapon Wheel: Weapons are picked up directly in the world, so explore and adapt fast.

**Laser Tracer Legendary**

More lasers. Less mercy. The iconic Laser Tracer is back, and the lasers have been cranked up over 9000! 

- Laser Walls: Massive green laser walls sweep across the map with only one gap to squeeze through. Miss it? You're out.
- Laser Pulse Rings: Laser rings drop from above, activate in bursts, and expand outward from the center.

![unnamed.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_20841ff189.png)
![unnamed (1).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_1_1f720d2fdb.png)

## NEW TEAM MAPS
- Block Dash Legendary
- Laser Dash
- Laser Dash Legendary
- Rush Hour Legendary 

## MENU UPGRADE

![unnamed (2).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_2_fa00e6b4ac.png)

Buttons now pop with more vibrant animations, and the entire interface has been updated with a cleaner, more modern design. 

Whether you’re a longtime player or just joining the stumble, we hope this fresh coat of paint makes your journey through the menus feel as fun and playful as the rest of the game.

## SHOP UPDATES

New Shop User Interface
We’re excited to unveil a major redesign to the in-game Shop, a change that’s not just visual, but functional too.
First, we’re moving away from side scrolling and introducing a new vertical scroll layout. This change makes the Shop easier to navigate and more intuitive to explore. You can now scroll up and down to view all available content in a streamlined format.

![unnamed (3).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_3_c46efd9f24.png)

We’re also introducing section selectors (you’ll see these as quick-access buttons on the left side of the screen), which allow you to instantly jump through sections. 

But the most exciting change? We’ve completely revamped how cosmetics are displayed. You’ll now be able to view skins in full 3D, admire their details, and get a better sense of what you’re unlocking. 

On supported devices, you can toggle between the new 3D previews and the original 2D icon displays in your settings. For lower-end devices, 2D will be shown by default to ensure smooth performance—though you can switch to 3D if your device can handle it. We've optimized the experience across platforms to give everyone the best balance between performance and visual clarity.

![unnamed (4).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_4_3aa6d44037.png)

<u>New Shop Features</u>

- Multiple Box Purchase: just like with Wheel Offers, you can now buy up to 10 reward boxes at once. The total price will adjust automatically depending on how many you choose to open.

- Complete with Gems Option: if you're short on a specific currency (like event tokens), you’ll now be able to cover the difference using gems in some cases.


## NEW RANKED FEATURE

**Limited Abilities Ranked Seasons**

Starting with Ranked Season 10, and based on a popular request from our community, we’re shaking up the Ranked experience with the introduction of season-specific ability pools.
This change is designed to add variety to the meta, encourage new strategies, and deliver a more balanced playing field.

In-game, you’ll see this reflected on the Ranked page: any disabled abilities will appear grayed out and marked with a red “X” in the ability selection menu, so you’ll always know what’s available before you queue up.


![unnamed (5).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_5_0e3a28d5d8.png)





**Featured Abilities for Ranked Season 10**

- Hug
- Banana
- Invisibility
- Slide
- Punch
- Slap
- Power Jump
- Chicken Bomb (NEW ABILITY)

## NEW ABILITY

**Chicken Bomb**

Introducing the Chicken Bomb, the unique social ability which lets players turn opponents into chickens for a limited time, creating the perfect storm of confusion, speed boosts, and LOL moments.

How it works:
When activated, your Stumbler throws a flask directly into the air. As it falls, it shatters on impact, creating an area of effect . Anyone caught inside this area (including the thrower) is temporarily transformed into a chicken, complete with increased movement speed and reduced jump height.
![unnamed (6).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_6_c3a01804bb.png)

## SCHEDULED ROLLOUT & TESTING PERIOD

We’re rolling out our shiny new Shop and Main Menu interface in phases to gather feedback and keep things running smoothly. Here’s what to expect:

Phase 1: May 1–6

You’ll be randomly placed into one of four groups:


???? Old Shop & ???? Old Main Menu


???? Old Shop & ???? New Main Menu


???? New Shop & ???? Old Main Menu


???? New Shop & ???? New Main Menu


Phase 2: May 6 onward

We’ll gradually roll the new UIs out to everyone


How long?

From May 1st until everyone has the new shop and interface, depending on how testing goes. 


If things look different when you log in, that’s by design! Thanks for helping us make Stumble Guys even better. 


## NEW COSMETICS

**Emotes**
- Cute Odachi [Common]
- Nail Polish [Common]
- Saluting Herobara [Uncommon]
- Sus [Common]
- Triggered [Uncommon]

**Footsteps**
- Australia Flag [Epic]
- Cyberio's Circuit [Epic]
- Jarred Brains [Rare]
- Lizard Steps [Uncommon]
- Morocco Flag [Epic]
- Quark Energy [Legendary]
- Momentum [Legendary]
- Fangs [Rare]

**Stumblers**
- Herobara [Epic] - Free (RV)
- Brainpeel [Mythic]
- Broken Fist [Uncommon]
- Captain Justice [Epic]
- Claw [Epic]
- Cyberio [Legendary]
- Dark Ray [Epic]
- Dash [Legendary]
- Flaming Bones [Special]
- Iron Stumbleton [Epic]
- Mutated Neo [Epic]
- Odachi [Uncommon]
- Old Fart [Mythic]
- Quark [Special]
- Super Guy Prime [Special]
- Masked Hood [Rare]
- Picklus Supreme [Legendary]

**Taunt Animations**
- By the Power of Pickle [Legendary]
- Fartbomb [Epic]
- Helicopter [Rare]
- Laser Eyes [Legendary]

**Victory Animations**
- I am speed [Legendary]
- Quark Explosion [Mythic]
- Dramatic Kick [Uncommon]
- Superhero Landing [Epic]


## BUG FIXES

We’ve squashed a bunch of pesky bugs in this update to make your Stumble Guys sessions smoother and more fun. Here’s everything that got fixed in version 0.86!

**Gameplay & Level Fixes**
- Fixed a rare issue where Stumblers could get stuck floating mid-air when jumping over the vapor vents in Stumble & Seek.
- Adjusted TNT boxes in the Hero Exam level that were slippery.
- Resolved a flickering visual bug for the Stumbler at Checkpoint 5 in Chronos' Trial.
- Fixed a bug where hexagonal tiles in Pac-Man Power didn’t turn red or disappear as expected when stepped on..
- Resolved an issue in The Other Side where players couldn’t join Custom Parties when Challenge Maps and Late Join - - - Debug were both enabled.

**WebGL & UI**
- Fixed a major issue on WebGL where levels would appear completely invisible when shadows were turned off.
- Resolved a WebGL issue where the camera couldn’t rotate fully in fullscreen mode.
- Fixed a bug where FPS dropped when switching between Battle Pass and Home screen (WebGL only).
- The mouse scroll now works properly when browsing Workshop Levels in Steam/WebGL builds.
- Fixed a display issue that was showing wrong information about completed missions.

**Customization & Localization**
Fixed a bug where Abilities and Emotes sometimes failed to appear while playing.
Real-time localization now works correctly for the Controller and Keyboard Bindings menus.
Corrected some translations issues with Epic Bundle offers across all supported languages.

**Banana Bonanza Event Fixes **
- We’ve made several quality-of-life updates to enhance your experience during events and make rewards easier to track and claim:
- Smarter Event Notifications
- When you’ve earned enough event currency to open a reward box, you’ll now see a notification right in the lobby. Tapping it will take you directly to the Event screen—no more guesswork!
- New Event Icon Behavior
- The event icon in the lobby will now transform into a Box whenever a reward is ready to be claimed. This replaces the standard statue icon, making it easier to spot and even easier to collect your prizes.
- Clear End-of-Event Messaging
- Once you’ve collected all available Grand Prizes, the UI will now clearly indicate that you’ve completed the event. No more wondering if there’s one last reward hiding in the background!

attributes.title: Step into the Ring with Sahrul Rajuan’s New Skin in Stumble Guys!
attributes.overview: Get ready to show off your pro-level swagger — Sahrul Rajuan has officially entered the arena. His boxer-themed skin isn’t just a fashion statement, it’s a symbol of competitive spirit and champion energy. Inspired by the legendary looks of past punch-focused pros like Boxer Amin, this sleek and agile outfit lets you float like a butterfly, stumble like a champ, and knock out the competition in style.
attributes.content:
# Step into the Ring with Sahrul Rajuan’s New Skin in Stumble Guys!

Get ready to show off your pro-level swagger — Sahrul Rajuan has officially entered the arena. His boxer-themed skin isn’t just a fashion statement, it’s a symbol of competitive spirit and champion energy. Inspired by the legendary looks of past punch-focused pros like **Boxer Amin,** this sleek and agile outfit lets you float like a butterfly, stumble like a champ, and knock out the competition in style.

But that’s not all—this bundle packs a punch with the exclusive **SSR footsteps** and the **Nossa! emote,** perfect for taunting your way to the top. Whether you’re outclassing opponents in Block Dash or just vibing in the lobby, this combo shows you mean business.

So… ready to dominate the arena? Gear up, flex those reflexes, and prove you’ve got what it takes to go the distance!

### What is the Sahrul Rajuan Skin, and Sahrul Rajuan Choice Event About?

**Q: Tell us more about your skin!**

A: The skin I created represents a pro player, as most pro players in the past used skins that are closely associated with the punch ability! This skin is inspired by boxer skins, which have many variations such as Boxer Floyd, Boxer Amin, and others. Most pro players love this skin. Since I enjoy playing competitively on the Block Dash map, I decided to create this skin.

**Q: Tell us more about your event!**

A: The event I created is a special event for all Block Dash fans across all variants. I have set up three matches in one competition, featuring the following maps:
- Block Dash Remastered
- Block Dash Legendary
- Block Dash Classic

All these maps are available in my event

**Q: Describe your reaction when you first saw yourself featured in the game.**

A: I was very surprised, even for a moment I couldn't believe that I could be featured in the game. This is the biggest achievement in my life, where I can be featured in a game as big as Stumble Guys.

### Tell us More About Sahrul’s Fans!

**Q: How has your community supported you throughout your journey as a creator?**

A: They have fully supported me. At first, I was nobody! But with their support, I managed to achieve some of my dreams.

**Q: What’s one thing fans might not know about you?**

A: One thing fans might not know about me is that I started my journey with very little confidence, but over time, I grew stronger thanks to their support and encouragement.

### Since You’re the Pro… Can You Share with Us Some Tips & Tricks on How to Succeed in Stumble Guys?

**Q: Which map do you find the most challenging, and why?**

A: So far, the most challenging map is Block Dash because it has a very unique gameplay. When there is one or two different players from before, the gameplay will also be different from the previous match.

**Q: Do you have a secret tip or trick that helps you win more games?**

A: A special tip is to play often and learn from mistakes. If you can improve your skills, you will become much better than before.

**Q: If you could design a new map for Stumble Guys, what would it be like?**

A: Maybe I will create a very large Block Dash map, possibly accommodating 64 players in a single match! That would be an incredible experience.

### Content Creation & Future Plans

**Q: What’s been the biggest challenge in creating content for Stumble Guys, and how do you overcome it?**

A: The biggest challenge in creating content for Stumble Guys has been staying consistent while keeping my ideas fresh and engaging. Sometimes, it’s hard to come up with new concepts that excite both me and my audience. I overcome this by constantly analyzing trends, listening to feedback from my community, and challenging myself to improve my gameplay and editing skills.

**Q: If you had unlimited resources, what would your dream Stumble Guys content project be?**

A: I will create more competitive matches by forming clans or guilds. This would greatly help the community grow and stay active. With the support of clans or guilds, the competitive scene in the game can improve, offering exciting gameplay for the community. This way, it will revive and rebuild the long-lost community.

**Q: Do you have any big surprises or upcoming projects that you can tease for your fans?**

A: Maybe that's still a secret. Just wait and see! :D

### Let’s Get to Know More About Sahrul!

**Q: If you could have any superpower while playing Stumble Guys, what would it be?**

A: Of course, the super punch ability! I want to create gameplay with artistic beauty by eliminating opponents in my own unique style.

**Q: If Stumble Guys hosted a creator showdown, which creators would you want on your team?**

A: Of course, I would choose creators from Brazil because I really idolize all of them! Pedro Gamer, Davi Gamer Play, Gxstavo7. Maybe it would be a dream come true to play with them!

**Q: If you could describe Stumble Guys in three words, what would they be?**

A: The Best Game!

attributes.title: Become a Stumble Guys Creator and Earn Rewards!
attributes.overview:
Become a Stumble Guys Creator and Earn Rewards!

Are you a content creator who loves chaos, fun, and a little friendly competition? Then we’ve got great news for you: the Stumble Guys Creator Program is your chance to team up with us, grow your community, and earn exclusive rewards!
attributes.content:
# Become a Stumble Guys Creator and Earn Rewards!

Are you a content creator who loves chaos, fun, and a little friendly competition? Then we’ve got great news for you: the **Stumble Guys Creator Program** is your chance to team up with us, grow your community, and earn exclusive rewards!

Whether you're a streamer or video creator, the Stumble Guys Creator Program is open to all players who are passionate about creating content and sharing their love for Stumble Guys.

### What Is the Stumble Guys Creator Program?

The Stumble Guys Creator Program is a way for us to support the amazing community of content creators who bring the game to life every day. When you join, you get a chance to contribute to the development of the game you love, and be a part of a vibrant community of other Stumble Guys content creators. Creators also enjoy many dedicated program benefits, including the opportunity to get access to a **creator code, which lets you earn 5% revenue whenever a player uses it** to make a store purchase!

### Creator Program Benefits

By joining the program, you’ll get access to:

- **A Unique Creator Code:** Let your fans support you by using your code in the shop. Earn a percentage of the in-game purchases made using your code.*
- **Early Access & Sneak Peeks:** Get the inside scoop on new updates, skins, and events before anyone else in our closed betas.
- **Exclusive In–Game Items**: All creators who join get creator-only skins, and other benefits like monthly gem rewards and cosmetics!
- **Giveaways & Special Events:** Join closed doors events like giveaways, tournaments, and contests.
- **A Close Knit Community:** Be a part of a vibrant community of like-minded content creators, and expand your social network!
- **QR Code Feature (NEW!):** Easily share your Creator Code with your audience using a personalized QR code, making it easier than ever for fans to support you in-game.

*For creators who meet Tier 3 / Stumble GOAT requirements

### Real Creators, Real Impact

Since the program inception, we’ve helped many creators grow their channels and following with dedicated resources. Creators like **JonBTC, Khortex, Mangyellow**, and many others have gotten their very **own in-game skins and cosmetics**—designed in collaboration with our team.

We’re always on the lookout for standout creators to spotlight. That could be you!

![image (13).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/image_13_3ebb717fe6.png)

### Who Can Join?

The program is open globally and supports creators across platforms including YouTube, Twitch, TikTok, Instagram, and more. Please note, however, that you will have to be at least 18 years of age – or above 16 years old with parental consent – to join the program.

Creators are required to:

1. Have at least:

- 5,000 subscribers on Twitch / Kick / Trovo OR

- 6,000 subscribers on YouTube OR

- 8,000 followers on TikTok

2. Post regularly and engage with their audience

3. Make fun, family-friendly content, and bring good vibes to the Stumbleverse!

### How to Join
Ready to take the leap? Here’s how to get started:

1. ##### **Visit the Application Form** **<u>[HERE](https://bit.ly/42b04C3)</u>**

2. **Fill Out the Form:** Tell us about your channel(s), the content you make and why you want to join.

3. **Wait for Review:** We review applications regularly and will reach out if you’re selected.

If you’re accepted, you’ll receive access to exclusive resources to help you grow!

### Let’s Stumble Together

The Stumble Guys Creator Program is more than just a rewards system—it’s a growing community of creators who help shape the future of the game.

Whether you’re doing skin showcases, epic fails, or tournament livestreams, we’re here to support your journey.

So what are you waiting for? Apply today, get your code, and start stumbling your way to greatness!

### JOIN THE CREATOR PROGRAM NOW! **<u>[APPLY HERE!](https://bit.ly/42b04C3)</u>**

attributes.title: 0.85 PATCH NOTES - It’s Concretely Madness In Here!
attributes.overview: 0.85 PATCH NOTES - The city never sleeps, and neither do the battles for control! Are you ready for update 0.85?
attributes.content:
## 0.85 PATCH NOTES - It’s Concretely Madness In Here! 

#### The city never sleeps, and neither do the battles for control! Are you ready for update 0.85?

Mr. Stumble and his crew are caught in the chaos of the urban jungle, dodging danger on the new elimination level Graffiti Gravity while different gang factions invade the streets. Will you claim your territory or get flushed out?

Join the chaos in 0.85 now!

### NEW LEVEL

**Graffiti Gravity**

Gangs have taken over Stumble Guys, and are causing chaos! Stumble around, under and even over falling obstacles, and watch as the floor crumbles from under you.

Stay nimble, and watch out for the different items falling from the sky! Obstacles may have different signalling signs, so keep your eyes peeled 

- The Big Blocks will cause the floor to break away from under them after the floor can't handle the weight anymore. You definitely don't want one of these to land on you either!

- The Drill Blocks - as the name suggests - will drill through the floor and slowly descend. Again, much like the big block, you definitely don't want one of these to land on you either.

- Finally... Paint Balloons? These giant balloons filled with paint pack a punch and will send any stumbler too close into the air, but if they hit the floor, you can expect them to destroy the floor instantly.

Use the blocks to your advantage, and survive for as long as you can! How long will you be able to survive Graffiti Gravity?


### COSMETICS

**Emotes**

- Anger Strike [Uncommon]
- Broken Egg [Common]
- Cursing [Common]
- Fire [Common]
- Injured [Common]
- Sad Anon [Uncommon]

**Footsteps**

- Color Spray [Epic]
- Dark Energy [Legendary]
- Pigeons [Epic]
- Skateboards [Rare]
- Stumble Tags [Rare]

**Stumblers**

- Banana of Liberty [Legendary]
- CEO of Glitch [Special]
- Desert Aegis [Legendary]
- Sir Egg [Rare]
- Ember Strike [Mythic]
- Graffiti Guy [Special]
- Magno [Special]
- Anon [Legendary]
- Tech Blade [Epic]
- Pink Punk [Epic]
- Tagoon [Rare]
- Cyber Foxy [Legendary]
- Skater Gal [Uncommon]

**Taunt Animations**

- Seesaw [Epic]
- Smoke Bomb [Legendary]
- Warming Up [Rare]

**Victory Animations**

- Hardflip [Legendary]
- Spinning Kick [Uncommon]
- The Crown [Mythic]


### BUG FIXES 

We've tackled a range of bugs and glitches to improve your Stumble Guys experience!

- Fixed an issue where scrolling speed was too slow when using the mouse wheel in the profile section on WebGL and Steam.
- Fixed a bug where Custom Party join request messages displayed player names in the wrong color and font.
- Fixed a bug in Laser Dash Legendary where the bottom ring of stationary lasers at the edge of the map started moving toward the platform, eliminating players upon contact.
- Fixed an issue where some ad banners appeared blank in specific levels on Android.
- Resolved an issue where the Beast Lightning Ability effect appears corrupted in Tornado Temple.
- Resolved an issue where players could not disable some Abilities in Custom Party if they were not owned by the user.
- Fixed an issue where static emotes failed to display in some maps.
- Fixed an issue where all bots die too early on the Sharkmuda Triangle map.
- Fixed an issue that prevented players from joining an Event.
- Resolved an issue where using the Speed Gel Ability near Factory Fiasco waves altered crate behavior.
- Fixed an issue with controller binding settings on mobile devices in the Ability menu.
- Fixed an issue where the Stumble Pass would unexpectedly restart.
- Numerous other minor fixes and adjustments have been made across various levels and gameplay mechanics to enhance overall game stability and player experience.

attributes.title: It’s Now Easier and More Fun Than Ever to Support Your Favorite Creators with QR Codes
attributes.overview: Support your favorite Stumble Guys content creators easily with QR codes! Now, instead of manually entering Creator Codes, just scan the QR code and show your love. A portion of your purchase goes directly to the creator linked to the code. Currently available on mobile, this feature makes supporting creators more seamless and fun. Don’t forget to re-scan the code when it expires and keep the support going!
attributes.content:
Hey Stumblers!

Do you have a favorite Stumble Guys content creator? You can support them more easily than ever before with **QR codes**, saving the hassle of manually entering their creator codes in-shop. Just scan their Creator QR Codes and show your love while you play!

**What are Creator Codes?**

Creator Codes are unique codes given to our top content creators. When you enter a Creator Code in the in-game shop, a small percentage of your purchase goes directly to the creator linked to that code. So, every time you make a purchase using a Creator Code, the creator earns a portion of the sales!


**How to Use a QR Creator Code**

To start supporting a creator, scan their QR code with your mobile phone
Depending on the device that youYou might be redirected to your browser or to the Play / Appstore. Simply click on open, or update / install Stumble Guys if you’ve yet to do so.
Going alphabetically, and using “Abra” as an example, this is how the user flow might look on your end:
![Screenshot 2025-03-14 at 14.44.46.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2025_03_14_at_14_44_46_abead40fc5.png)
![Screenshot 2025-03-14 at 14.44.57.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2025_03_14_at_14_44_57_128cea7e12.png)

**What Platforms Support QR Creator Codes?**

For now, these QR Creator Codes are available only on mobile.

Supporting creators are now easier(and more fun) than ever before! Use Creator QR Codes for a more seamless experience, and don’t forget to re-scan after it expires. Show your favorite creators some love today in Stumble Guys!

attributes.title: Kevko's Exclusive Content Creator Bundle is HERE!
attributes.overview: Kevko’s Exclusive Bundle has just dropped in the Stumble Guys Shop, loaded with everything you need to flaunt your skills and style! Only available from March 13 to April 2
attributes.content:
Stumblers, it’s time to celebrate! Kevko’s Exclusive Bundle has just dropped in the Stumble Guys Shop, loaded with everything you need to flaunt your skills and style!

But don’t wait – this bundle is only available from March 13 to April 2, so grab it before it’s gone!

**<u>[GO TO THE SHOP!](https://bit.ly/STGstore)</u>**

Keep reading to dive into Kevko’s favorite Stumble Guys moments and get some pro tips on succeeding as a Content Creator!


- **Can you briefly introduce yourself to our players?**

Hey, my name is Kevko. I’m a 20-year-old French YouTuber who has made over 500 videos on Stumble Guys. I love the game.

- **How long have you been a content creator/streamer?**

I started creating content about 2 years ago on Stumble Guys and joined the creator program a couple of months after starting my YouTube channel.

- **What is your biggest accomplishment in Stumble Guys as a player?**

At first, it was to get the creator skin, and now having my own skin is amazing!

- **What do you like the most about Stumble Guys?**

It’s fun to play with my subscribers, and the game offers a lot of different modes.

- **What is your favourite skin/emote/etc?**

I like the Banana skin!

- **Do you have advice you want to give to new players?**

Try to have emotes in the game as quickly as possible.

- **Favourite IP introduced into the game?**

Clearly MrBeast, it was amazing!

- **Can you share what initially drew you to create content specifically for Stumble Guys?**

I liked the game, so I started my YouTube channel with 0 subscribers, focusing on this game.

- **Could you describe one or two of your favorite pieces of content that you’ve made for 
Stumble Guys and what made them special?**

I think the funniest content is when I play with other content creators and make funny games like hide and seek or impostor games.

- **What advice would you give to someone who wants to start creating content for Stumble Guys?**

Be consistent and never give up.

- **Why did you pick these items for your curated bundle?**

These are my favorites.

- **Where is the bundle available and for how long?**

In the Stumble Guys item shop from March 13th to April 2nd!

- **The link to your main channel?** 

[**<u>LINK</u>**](https://youtube.com/@kevkoyt)

- **What is your creator code?**

Kevko

And there you have it, Stumblers - straight from the legend himself! Don’t miss out on Kevko's Exclusive Bundle - it's only available until April 2nd, so grab it while you can and show off your best stumbles!

**<u>[GO TO THE SHOP!](https://bit.ly/STGstore)</u>**

![cc_bundles_kevko_web_5sku_202503.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/cc_bundles_kevko_web_5sku_202503_dcde031eba.png)
![cc_bundles_kevko_web_10sku_202503.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/cc_bundles_kevko_web_10sku_202503_f58e4bf7e2.png)
