attributes.title: NEW STUMBLE PASS - Blades and Blasts
attributes.overview: Whether you choose to be a sharpshooting cowboy or a stealthy ninja, this season's Stumble Pass is bringing the heat to everyone with exclusive skins, emotes, and more.
attributes.content:
# Blades & Blasts: The New Stumble Pass Has Arrived!

Are you ready to unleash your inner warrior? The latest Stumble Pass is here, packed with adrenaline-pumping action, legendary warriors, and enough firepower to shake up the Stumbleverse! Whether you choose to be a sharpshooting cowboy or a stealthy ninja, this season's Stumble Pass is bringing the heat to everyone with exclusive skins, emotes, and more.

## What’s Inside the Stumble Pass?

The Blades & Blasts Stumble Pass is packed with must-have items that will turn heads and give you the ultimate stumble swagger, including:

- **Epic, Legendary, Mythic & Special Skins** – Transform into a skilled Cluck-San or a high-noon Shiny Carson to stand out on the Stumblewood set.

- **Exclusive Prize Boxes** – Unveil the mystery of what's inside our exclusive Studio Boxes!

- **Footsteps** – Leave a mark wherever you go with Cactuses or TumbleWeeds

- **Tons of Rewards** – Unlock an array of Ability Tokens, Gems, and Bonus Items to keep your inventory stacked!

**AND SO MUCH MORE!**

Check it out and pick your team! Will you choose Cowboys...or Ninjas????

attributes.title: STUMBLEWOOD - Stumble Guys’ first-ever third-person shooter experience!
attributes.overview: Welcome to Stumblewood! Get ready for Stumble Guys’ first-ever third-person shooter experience! where only one team can claim victory.
attributes.content:
Lights, Camera, Showdown! The stage is set for an action-packed blockbuster! 
A film is being shot In Stumblewood, and two rival clans are locked in an intense battle. You are part of the cast. 

Your actions will shape the ending—will your team emerge victorious, or will you be left on the cutting room floor? As you fight your way through the set, take a moment to explore the sprawling studio, filled with nods to classic films and hidden details. But stay alert—because the tourist train is out of control, and it doesn’t stop for anyone!

Get ready for Stumble Guys’ first-ever third-person shooter experience! where only one team can claim victory. It all comes down to eliminations, strategy, and quick reflexes!

The set is a sprawling, interactive battlefield where cover is key—use props, structures, and strategic positioning to outmaneuver your enemies. Instead of diving, you’ll master the roll mechanic, which lets you dodge incoming shots, reposition quickly, and even turn the tide of battle with well-timed moves.

**Game Mode & Victory Conditions**

Stumblewood is a team-based elimination mode where the squad with the most eliminations when time runs out takes the win. If your team reaches the elimination goal first, victory is yours! But if the timer expires, the team with the higher count claims the crown. And if there's a tie? Extra time kicks in for a final, high-stakes showdown!

![844.webp](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/844_0e23fb961c.webp)


**Unique Gameplay Elements**

<u>Health and Shield</u>
- Each player spawns with 100/100 health points and 50/50 armor points.

<u>Roll</u> 
- A roll is replacing the dive in this level, so you’ll find your character rolling instead of diving when double jumping.
- It plays a crucial role in combat, it will help you to cover distances quickly and take cover.
- Rolling also grants temporary invulnerability, so it can be used as a dodge.
- To maintain balance, rolling is limited to three uses, which recharge over time.

<u>Pick ups</u>
- Health and shield spawners are available in the level.

<u>Invulnerability</u>
- Every time you respawn, you receive a few seconds of invulnerability.

<u>The Train</u>
- A unique feature of this level is a moving train that periodically divides the battlefield. Apart from being useful as a moving cover, you can jump onto some of its carriages or even climb to the top.

<u>Player Stats</u>
- An information panel in the top-left corner provides extra details. Here, you can track your personal eliminations, respawns, and current position in the match, ensuring you always stay informed during the battle.

![844.webp](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/844_0e23fb961c.webp)

<u>Weapon Selector</u>
- You can choose your preferred weapon at the start of the level and change it every time you respawn.

![084weapon.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/084weapon_8e8c43fede.png)

attributes.title: 0.84 Patch Notes - Looney Tunes is BACK!
attributes.overview: Get ready for an action-packed update! The 0.84 Patch brings thrilling new challenges, fresh mechanics, and a dose of cartoon chaos. From high-stakes industrial disasters to intense team battles, this update has something for everyone.
attributes.content:
# 0.84 PATCH NOTES

Get ready for an action-packed update! The 0.84 Patch brings thrilling new challenges, fresh mechanics, and a dose of cartoon chaos. From high-stakes industrial disasters to intense team battles, this update has something for everyone.

One moment, you’ll find yourself flung into an unpredictable industrial disaster, dodging hazards as the ground shifts beneath you. Then next, you’ll be caught in the middle of an intense face-off where precision, teamwork, and quick reflexes will determine victory. 

We are bringing new mechanics, environmental twists, and opportunities for pro plays! 

Whether you're dodging obstacles on a runaway conveyor belt or engaging in an intense team shootout, this update has something for everyone. So, sharpen your skills, rally your squad, and brace yourself for mayhem—because things are about to get wild!

Finally, this update brings back Looney Tunes, this time with a wacky over-the-top collaboration, delivering cartoon chaos like never before!

Are you ready to dive into the madness? Let’s break it down!


## NEW LEVELS

This patch brings two exciting new levels—first, Stumblewood, an intense showdown where precision and teamwork are key, and later, Factory Fiasco, where Looney Tunes mayhem returns to the Stumbleverse!

### StumbleWood
Lights, Camera, Showdown! The stage is set for an action-packed blockbuster! 
A film is being shot In Stumblewood, and two rival clans are locked in an intense battle. You are part of the cast. 

Your actions will shape the ending—will your team emerge victorious, or will you be left on the cutting room floor? As you fight your way through the set, take a moment to explore the sprawling studio, filled with nods to classic films and hidden details. But stay alert—because the tourist train is out of control, and it doesn’t stop for anyone!

Get ready for Stumble Guys’ first-ever third-person shooter experience! where only one team can claim victory. It all comes down to eliminations, strategy, and quick reflexes!

The set is a sprawling, interactive battlefield where cover is key—use props, structures, and strategic positioning to outmaneuver your enemies. Instead of diving, you’ll master the roll mechanic, which lets you dodge incoming shots, reposition quickly, and even turn the tide of battle with well-timed moves.

**Game Mode & Victory Conditions**

Stumblewood is a team-based elimination mode where the squad with the most eliminations when time runs out takes the win. If your team reaches the elimination goal first, victory is yours! But if the timer expires, the team with the higher count claims the crown. And if there's a tie? Extra time kicks in for a final, high-stakes showdown!

![844.webp](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/844_0e23fb961c.webp)


**Unique Gameplay Elements**

<u>Health and Shield</u>
- Each player spawns with 100/100 health points and 50/50 armor points.

<u>Roll</u> 
- A roll is replacing the dive in this level, so you’ll find your character rolling instead of diving when double jumping.
- It plays a crucial role in combat, it will help you to cover distances quickly and take cover.
- Rolling also grants temporary invulnerability, so it can be used as a dodge.
- To maintain balance, rolling is limited to three uses, which recharge over time.

<u>Pick ups</u>
- Health and shield spawners are available in the level.

<u>Invulnerability</u>
- Every time you respawn, you receive a few seconds of invulnerability.

<u>The Train</u>
- A unique feature of this level is a moving train that periodically divides the battlefield. Apart from being useful as a moving cover, you can jump onto some of its carriages or even climb to the top.

<u>Player Stats</u>
- An information panel in the top-left corner provides extra details. Here, you can track your personal eliminations, respawns, and current position in the match, ensuring you always stay informed during the battle.

![844.webp](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/844_0e23fb961c.webp)

<u>Weapon Selector</u>
- You can choose your preferred weapon at the start of the level and change it every time you respawn.

![084weapon.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/084weapon_8e8c43fede.png)


### Factory Fiasco
Step into the most chaotic assembly line ever created, where the only thing being packaged is absolute mayhem! This high-speed industrial nightmare throws you onto a massive, out-of-control conveyor belt, sending you hurdling through a gauntlet of unpredictable hazards.

It is a non-stop scramble to dodge obstacles, leap over gaps, and avoid getting tossed into the abyss. But don’t get too comfortable—the terrain itself isn’t playing fair! Sections of the conveyor will suddenly drop, forcing you to make split-second decisions. Will you land on another belt, or will you use scattered crates as floating islands to stay in the game?

As the challenge ramps up, expect trickier obstacle combinations, and even fewer safe spaces to land. If you want to survive, you’ll need quick reflexes, clever movement, and a sharp eye for skill-based shortcuts.

Think you can handle the madness? There’s only one way to find out—step onto the belt and brace for impact!

## LEVEL REMOVALS

As part of our ongoing updates, some levels will be phased out this March to make way for new content and experiences. The following maps will no longer be available:

- Elimination Base
- Blaster Base Zero
- Scaffold Stumble

While these levels are stepping out of the rotation, there’s plenty of exciting new content on the way.

## NEW FEATURE  (only for Steam)

<u>Service Storefront for Steam</u>

Making purchases in Stumble Guys on Steam is now easier than ever with the introduction of the Service Storefront for Steam! This update enhances accessibility, ensuring a smoother and more seamless shopping experience for all players.

<u>How It Works</u>
- Players can now browse and purchase items more efficiently through the new Steam-integrated storefront.
- Payments are processed directly through Steam, offering a secure and familiar transaction experience.
![084steam.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/084steam_15f9f221e0.png)

## COSMETICS

### Emotes
- Bugs Shooting [Uncommon]
- Cowboy [Common]
- Handcuffs [Common]
- Howdy [Uncommon]
- Mysterious Doge [Uncommon]
- Vengeful Cat [Common]

### Footsteps
- Bizon Skulls [Rare]
- Purple Circuit [Legendary]
- Cactuses [Rare]
- Golden Arrows [Legendary]
- Cherry Blossom [Epic]
- Tumbleweeds [Epic]

### Stumblers
- Lone Alien [Epic]
- Antler King [Special]
- Black Shogun Master [Legendary]
- Shiburai [Rare]
- El Cacto [Epic]
- Liqui [Special]
- Loud Barrel [Epic]
- Grim [Legendary]
- Last Ronin [Rare]
- Shadow Meow [Epic]
- Ryujin [Mythic]
- Cluck-san [Epic]
- Shiny Carson [Legendary]
- Yoroi [Mythic]
- Venerable Gell [Mythic]
- Ninja Daffy [Legendary]
- Taz [Special]
- Yosemite Sam [Epic]
- Cowboy Bugs [Legendary]
- Western Sylvester [Epic]
- Silent but Deadly Coyote [Legendary]

### Taunt Animations
- Bad Archer [Rare]
- Duel [Uncommon]
- Wanted [Epic]

### Victory Animations
- Hold'em [Uncommon]
- Coyotte's Dream [Mythic]
- Fake Defeat[Epic]
- Fire Blades [Legendary]
- Brickbreaker [Uncommon]

## BUG FIXES 

We've tackled a range of bugs and glitches to improve your Stumble Guys experience! Here’s what’s been fixed in Update 0.84

<u>General Fixes & Stability Improvements</u>
- Fixed an issue where the Help & Support option in the settings menu stopped working after navigating away from the menu.
- Resolved a bug that caused the screen to freeze when opening two options at the same time.
- Fixed an issue where players were not receiving friends online push notifications.
- Skin thumbnails in the customize menu now correctly match the selected cosmetic skins.
- Fixed an issue in the shop where the mouse scroll function was not working properly when navigating map categories in Custom Party mode.
- Fixed an issue where players got stuck on the loading screen after the "Waiting for Players" prompt in Ranked Mode.
- Changing device orientation while watching ads no longer causes a widescreen distortion.

<u>Gameplay & Level Fixes</u>

- Fixed a levitation bug on the roof of the Tornado Temple map.
- Hexagonal tiles in Blaster Base Zero now correctly disappear after being stepped on.
- Fixed a missing collision near the Punch obstacle in Lost Temple.
- Players can no longer pass through the edge of the surface near the second rolling asset in Jungle Roll.
- Lower lasers on the platform sides in Laser Dash Legendary now correctly eliminate players.
- The laser beam in Abduction Avenue now properly eliminates characters moving along the edges.
- Removed an invisible platform at Checkpoint 8 in Stumble Up 2.
- Fixed visual glitches with the rail tracks appearing underneath the platform edge in Special Delivery.
- Fixed pink graphics appearing on edges and under the ground in Stumble Soccer.
- Resolved missing laser visual effects in Rush Hour Legendary.

<u>Abilities Fixes</u>

- Fixed an issue where max-level Hug failed to pull characters into its effect zone.
- Corrected an issue where characters performed incorrect falling animations after getting hit by a maxed-out Chop ability.

attributes.title: Meet Coral and Get His Bundle In Game!
attributes.overview: Coral's Exclusive Bundle has just landed in the Stumble Guys Shop, and it’s packed with everything you need to show off your skills and style!
attributes.content:
Stumblers, get ready to celebrate! Coral's Exclusive Bundle has just landed in the Stumble Guys Shop, and it’s packed with everything you need to show off your skills and style!

![Steps279_CcOffer_Icon.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Steps279_Cc_Offer_Icon_7e4a85ee55.png)
![skin1322_icon.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/skin1322_icon_d7e2303740.png)
![Emote493_CcOffer.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Emote493_Cc_Offer_64b10c3f10.png)

Don't wait - his bundle is only available from February 6th to February 27th to pick up from the Shop! 

**<u>[GO TO THE SHOP!](https://bit.ly/STGstore)</u>**

Keep reading to learn more about Coral, his favorite Stumble Guys moments, and tips on how to succeed as a Content Creator.


- **Can you briefly introduce yourself to our players?**
Hello! My name is Coral and I am a Stumble Guys YouTube Content Creator! I’m mostly known for my YouTube shorts but I also post daily long form videos covering new updates and opening new wheels and prizes boxes added to the item shop!

- **How long have you been a content creator/streamer?**
I’ve been a content creator since 2020 but I didn’t start making stumble guys content until 2023.

- **What is your biggest accomplishment in Stumble Guys as a player?**
Probably when I won 3 in-game tournaments in a row! I was playing really well and I haven’t done it again since then!

- **What do you like the most about Stumble Guys?**
I love all the different IP collaborations they do with all of their updates! I also like how they are constantly trying to improve the game, and add new features for the players to enjoy! You can tell the creators really care about the game!

- **What is your favourite skin/emote/etc?**
My favorite skin is The Free Spirit, and my favorite emote (ability) is Dice Throw.

- **What is a good memory you have from Stumble Guys in your life?**
Getting my own creator code in the game. And also receiving special Stumble Guys merch from Scopely!

- **Do you have advice you want to give to new players?**
Don’t give up! Just keep practicing and keep trying!

- **Favourite IP introduced into the game?**
SpongeBob SquarePants! I loved watching that show as a kid!

- **Can you share what initially drew you to create content specifically for Stumble Guys?**
I was introduced to the game by a friend, and immediately fell in love with it! The thing I liked most is how often new content was added to the game! It made each new update very exciting to make content for!

- **What does your content creation process look like for Stumble Guys? How do you plan and execute your ideas?**
Any time there is a new wheel or new prize box in stumble guys, I make a video on it immediately. Anything new that is added to the game such as new stumble passes, new tournament rewards, and new beta updates are all things I make videos on every day! And if I ever run out of new things to cover, I usually will do challenge videos like trying to get a special from the lucky wheel, or seeing how many skins I can get on a brand new account!

- **Could you describe one or two of your favorite pieces of content that you’ve made for Stumble Guys and what made them special?**
My favorite short I ever made was probably the short where I ask viewers to pick a stumble guys card from my hand, and then the character on that card is opened in a wheel. I loved all the comments wondering how I knew what card they picked! My favorite long form video I ever made was probably when I reacted to getting the Free Spirit skin for the very first time! I thought it was hilarious and it became a meme on my channel for a long time.

- **What are your future plans regarding content creation for Stumble Guys? Are there any new directions or concepts you’re excited to explore?**
I’m very excited about the addition of a ranked mode and new abilities in the 0.75 update! I think that will inspire many new content ideas for creators like myself!

- **What advice would you give to someone who wants to start creating content for Stumble Guys?**
Be consistent, and figure out what type of content you like to create the most. Don’t be discouraged if you don’t see success right away! Just have fun with it, and good things will come!

- **Where is the bundle available and for how long?**
In the Stumble Guys item shop from February 6th to the 27th!

- **The link to your main channel?** [**<u>LINK</u>**](https://www.youtube.com/corallll)

- **What is your creator code?**
CORAL

And there you have it, Stumblers - straight from the legend himself! Don’t miss out on Coral's Exclusive Bundle - it's only available until February 27th, so grab it while you can and show off your best stumbles!

**<u>[GO TO THE SHOP!](https://bit.ly/STGstore)</u>**

![STG-45822_Coral Event_Banner01_V2.png_i731anrak3.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/STG_45822_Coral_Event_Banner01_V2_png_i731anrak3_066a118da5.png)

attributes.title: New Level: Skyslide!
attributes.overview: Welcome to Skyslide, where the rules of gravity don’t apply, and the only way is down (really, really fast). Get ready to free fall, slide, and dive through a floating steampunk city in the most exhilarating race yet!
attributes.content:
## Skyslide: Race Through the Clouds!

Welcome to Skyslide, where the rules of gravity don’t apply, and the only way is down (really, really fast). Get ready to free fall, slide, and dive through a floating steampunk city in the most exhilarating race yet!

#### What’s New in Skyslide?

- Free Fall Frenzy: Plunge through huge vertical tubes, dodging obstacles and steering mid-air. The shifted camera angle makes the descent feel next level—if you’re afraid of heights, don’t look down!

- Dive Ability: Want more speed? Smash through breakable walls, cut corners, and even bump other Stumblers off their path. Use it wisely for the ultimate race advantage!

- Steampunk Sky High: This isn’t just a level - it’s a floating city filled with wild twists, gravity-defying landscapes, and slides that’ll make your head spin!

Only the quickest (and bravest) Stumblers will master the Skyslide. Will you fall with style...or just fall?

Race ya to the finish line!!!

attributes.title: Ranked Season 7 is Here!
attributes.overview: Are you ready for the new Ranked Season? How far will you go?
attributes.content:
## RANKED SEASON 7 IS HERE!

Are you ready for the new Ranked Season? How far will you go?  

#### WHAT'S NEW IN THIS SEASON?

- Race Levels in Ranked: For the first time ever, race levels are joining the Ranked lineup!   Test your speed, strategy, and agility as you compete against the best to climb the leaderboard. Will you cross the finish line first and prove you’re unstoppable?
- Rank Points Balancing: We've fine-tuned and tweaked the Rank Points system and the amounts you get or lose on match end to provide a more fair and rewarding competitive experience. These adjustments ensure that every match result and its points feels balanced, and your journey to the top reflects your true skill. 
- Champion Rewards: As an extra incentive, players who reach Champion rank this season will be rewarded with 70 Gems!   This is your chance to rise through the ranks and claim the glory (and the gems) that await you.

attributes.title: Ability Balance Changes
attributes.overview: In this update, we’ve focused on refining the gameplay experience by implementing specific balance changes based on your invaluable feedback. We’ve been actively listening to the community, analyzing your suggestions, and making adjustments to ensure a fair and engaging experience for everyone.
attributes.content:
## Ability Balance Changes

In this update, we’ve focused on refining the gameplay experience by implementing specific balance changes based on your invaluable feedback. We’ve been actively listening to the community, analyzing your suggestions, and making adjustments to ensure a fair and engaging experience for everyone. 

These changes aim to enhance both competitiveness and fun. We invite you to dive into the details and see how your input has helped shape the game’s evolution!

#### Global Changes

Increase global cooldown from 3 to 5 seconds. This will help slow down the rate at which abilities can be chained together.

As part of this change we have also extended the period at the start of a round before you can use an ability which means you should no longer be immediately hit with an ability before you can move.


#### Hug

For levels 3+ the scaling of the Speed stat is reduced exponentially.

Hug is an ability that allows players to grab another. It is designed to give players an edge when playing in small areas to try and get them eliminated. Whilst it is excelling in doing so, it was also allowing players to go faster than intended. We are nerfing the upgraded versions to avoid making it used for self mobility.

#### Slide (Kick)

For all levels the cooldown is reduced slightly. The slippery stat effect is reduced significantly.

Kick is one of the classic abilities in Stumble Guys. It has always been one of the most used abilities due to its ability to both attack and move around the maps especially in block dash where it allows players to break some of the lower blocks. However it was performing too well and we want it to be more balanced. In order to do so we are increasing its cooldown overall so players need to use it more carefully and not rely on being able to use it so often. In addition we are tuning down the side effect it had when it reached level 15 by decreasing the amount of time it leaves players stunned by the kick being slippery.

#### Dice Roll

For all levels the cooldown is reduced slightly and the duration is reduced 50%. For levels 3+ the speed is reduced exponentially.

Dice is a throwable ability that behaves differently from the others as it is shot in a straight line. We are tuning down most of its values to remove how effective it is at removing rivals in small maps such as blockdash and bot bash. We are increasing the cooldown of it, whilst also decreasing how long the dice remains in the map after being thrown and decreasing the force it is thrown at. These changes should keep Dice a powerful ability whilst not as powerful as it was and also reduce the frequency it could be used beforehand.

#### Bolt

For all levels the cooldown is reduced slightly and the force is reduced significantly.

Bolt is an interesting throwable ability because it is one of the few that takes away mobility whilst casting. We are happy with how the magnetism was behaving as an effect but due to its strong force it was doing too much as an attack option. Therefore we are reducing the force to try and make it more situational for certain maps and increasing its cooldown.


#### Invisibility

For all levels the cooldown is reduced slightly and the duration is reduced 50%.

With the increase of ability usage in the game, invisibility has been a preferred solution to avoid being attacked however this defensive ability was allowing for some unavoidable attacks making it an absolute threat. Therefore we are increasing the cooldown of the ability whilst also reducing the duration of the invisible state to ensure players will not be able to attack whilst invisible. We are making this change to make sure invisibility still remains a good defensive and mobile ability but remove its offense combination.

#### Shield

For all levels the cooldown is reduced slightly. For levels 2+ the duration is reduced slightly.

Similar to Invisibility, the shield is a very good defensive ability. However due to its cooldown and duration it was constantly in use for players that had it maxed and could quickly combine being shielded with an attack. Therefore we are also increasing the cooldown of the ability and reducing its duration so players need to time better their shield and not use it on cooldown.

#### Rake

For all levels the cooldown is reduced slightly and duration is reduced 35%. The confusion stat is reduced significantly.

Rake is a one of a kind throwable that allows players to throw it behind themselves and place it in strategic positions. However it was performing a bit too well due to its duration until it disappeared and the confusion side effect that was unlocked at level 15. We have increased the cooldown to make it in line with other throwables whilst also reducing the duration of the rake in gameplay and reduced the time players were affected by the confusion effect.

#### Chop

For all levels the cooldown is reduced slightly. The Force stat is no longer upgradeable. Instead you can now upgrade the new Squish stat.

Chop is a unique ability that at max level is able to squish opponents. However it was only performing differently to other abilities at max level and in doing the other effects it was worse than the rest. Therefore, we decided to use the uniqueness of the squish and make it one of the upgradable stats. We believe this ability will be more powerful than before so we are increasing the cooldown to balance its usage. From now on we will keep a close eye to see how the ability behaves but with the aim of making the unique condition of squishing opponents and reducing their jump ability one of the choices for owners to include in their ability repertoire and playstyle.


#### Slap

For all levels the cooldown is reduced slightly. The Angle is no longer upgradeable. Instead it is fixed at the max 90 degrees for all levels. It is replaced with the new Force stat which is upgradable.

Slap is an ability that was designed as the alternative to punch. The design idea behind slap is that it is weaker in terms of force compared to punch but it is easier to hit and can do so in a larger area. However, because of the small force it wasn't as impactful as we hoped, therefore we are making the uniqueness of its wide area a permanent aspect of the ability and changing the stat upgrade into the Force instead of Angle.

#### Punch

We reduced the angle of impact to make it hit in a straight line. For all levels except Max level the cooldown has been reduced slightly. 

Punch is a powerful ability. With its strong force it is able to eliminate players in most elimination maps and whilst we want punch to be powerful we don't want it to be dominant. Therefore, we are making it harder to hit, reducing the area it’s able to impact. This should make it harder for players to aim if the rival is moving around while making it easier to avoid getting punched yourself.

#### Bouncing Ball

For all levels the duration is reduced significantly. For levels 4+ the speed is reduced slightly. For max level the knockback is reduced slightly.

Volleyball is the king of movement abilities and whilst that meets the design intentions, it was doing it too well. Therefore we are reducing the max speed and also reducing the total duration of the transformation. This should still allow players to use it in certain occasions but not using it several times in one transformation therefore reducing its impact in game. We have also removed the ability that volleyball had at max level of pushing rivals to make sure that volleyball only performs well in its mobility characteristics and not used as an attack option. This change also aims to make it easier to block players using volleyball from getting in front of them.

#### Snowball

For all levels the cooldown is reduced slightly. The duplication stat is replaced with a new upgradeable slow stat.

Similarly to the Sticky Bomb , Snowball is a movement penalty throwable that wasn't quite able to have an impact on gameplay. We have changed the variable of being able to have a greater chance of throwing multiple snowballs into how strong the slow is once the snowball is landed successfully. The duration of being slowed is intended to be longer since it's a harder to hit ability than the sticky bomb.

#### Sticky Bomb

For all levels the cooldown is reduced slightly. The duration stat is no longer upgradable, instead it is a static 2. It is replaced with a new upgradable slow stat. The 

Sticky bomb is a zone control throwable that wasn't quite capable of competing with other abilities due to its stats. We have changed the duration of the slow into how powerful that slow is, we aim to make the movement penalty this ability main characteristic transforming it into a more viable option for players. The intention of this ability is to be an alternative to snowball making it have a shorter duration of slow but being able to affect a larger area.

#### Spin

Sword spin is similar to the Bolt ability in that it requires the casting player to remain in position. Whilst it takes a longer time and it might be riskier to use in certain occasions its power and area of reach compensate for it. However we found that the ability wasn't performing properly due to an issue where it wouldn´t hit in a 360 angle, we have fixed that issue to make sure it is still a viable option for players

attributes.title: 0.83 Patch Notes - Bringing The Heat!
attributes.overview: Hi Stumblers! The 0.83 Update is here, bringing the heat—literally!  A new fiery challenge awaits, testing your skills and keeping you on your toes (watch where you step).
attributes.content:
## 0.83 PATCH NOTES

Hi Stumblers! The 0.83 Update is here, bringing the heat—literally!  A new fiery challenge awaits, testing your skills and keeping you on your toes (watch where you step).

We’re also spicing up gameplay with a brand-new ability that adds a layer of strategy to every match. Plus, we’ve made some thoughtful balance changes based on your feedback to keep things fair and fun, especially in Ranked Mode!

Jump in and explore what’s new—your next victory might feel even sweeter!

##### **NEW LEVELS**

<u>Floor is Lava</u>

Learn everything about this new map and it's exclusive Level Abilities **<u>[here](https://www.stumbleguys.com/news/ability-balance-changes-)</u>**!  

<u>Skyslide</u>

Skyslide takes you to a breathtaking floating city where gravity is just another obstacle to overcome. This unique slide race combines thrilling vertical free-falls with high-speed slide sections, all set against a stunning steampunk backdrop. Navigate dizzying heights, use your wits, and master new abilities as you race to victory!

**Key Gameplay Mechanics:**
- Free Fall Mechanic: Drop through enormous vertical tubes, steering through hazards with mid-air directional controls. The shifted vertical camera intensifies the sensation of speed and height, creating an unforgettable descent.
- Dive Ability: Use this new move to speed up your fall, smash through breakable walls, and even knock rivals off course. Use it carefully to avoid obstacles or to find strategic shortcuts!


##### **NEW ABILITY**

<u>Hat Hop</u>

Get ready to take your gameplay to the next level—literally!  With the Hat Hop ability, you can toss a floating platform that sends stumblers soaring into the air. Whether you're aiming for a sneaky shortcut, recovering from a near-miss, or setting up some strategic chaos, this ability is all about timing and creativity. 

Who knew a simple hat could change everything?

**ABILITY BALANCE CHANGES **

We’ve fine-tuned gameplay in this update with key balance adjustments inspired by your feedback. These changes are designed to keep matches fair, competitive, and fun for everyone. More on that here.

##### **RANKED MODE UPDATE**

This season, we’re introducing exciting changes to elevate your Ranked experience!
Race Levels in Ranked: For the first time ever, race levels are joining the Ranked lineup! Test your speed, strategy, and agility as you compete against the best to climb the leaderboard. Will you cross the finish line first and prove you’re unstoppable?

- Rank Points Balancing: We've fine-tuned and tweaked the Rank Points system and the amounts you get or lose on match end to provide a more fair and rewarding competitive experience. These adjustments ensure that every match result and its points feels balanced, and your journey to the top reflects your true skill.
- Champion Rewards: As an extra incentive, players who reach Champion rank this season will be rewarded with 70 Gems! This is your chance to rise through the ranks and claim the glory (and the gems) that await you.


##### COSMETICS

<u>Emotes</u>

- noob [Uncommon]
- Blowkiss [Common]
- Burning Cash [Uncommon]
- Dollar Eyes [Common]
- Jackpot! [Uncommon]
- King [Uncommon]
- Masked Robber [Common]
- Grumpy Anger [Uncommon]
- Good Luck Smirk [Uncommon]

<u>Footsteps</u>
- Grey Dust [Legendary]
- Diamond Path [Mythic]
- Golden Bricks [Epic]
- Golden Moustaches [Rare]
- Jewels [Epic]
- Moles [Rare]
- Spades Flag [Uncommon]

<u>Stumblers</u>

- Big Buck [Epic]
- Camerabot Pro [Epic]
- Chrome Dan [Legendary]
- Heister Brexton [Legendary]
- Heister Nyra [Epic]
- Golden Dragon [Special]
- Goldmer [Legendary]
- Hot Cash [Special]
- Kingbara [Mythic]
- Glare [Special]
- Ruby Demon Ninja [Mythic]
- Sapphire Sunurai [Mythic]
- Shade [Legendary]
- Snake Yiu [Rare]
- Demolesher [Epic]
- Cheer Bear [Legendary]
- Tenderheart Bear [Epic]
- Funshine Bear [Mythic]
- Good Luck Bear [Epic]
- Grumpy Bear [Legendary]

_Note: The following Stumblers, originally announced for the 0.82 release, will become available in 0.83:_

- Al-Raheel [Legendary]
- Mosaic Knight [Special]
- Velira [Epic]
- Voidborn [Epic]
- Broomulus [Legendary]

<u>Taunt Animations</u>
- Juggling Gems [Legendary]
- King Sign [Epic]
- Ready for Fight [Rare]
- Snake Pose [Rare]

<u>Victory Animations</u>

- Burglar [Rare]
- Disco Moves [Rare]
- Escape Rope [Epic]
- Laser Dodge [Legendary]
- Unsafe Safe [Legendary]
- Rainbow Surfing [Legendary]


##### **BUG FIXES**

<u>Gameplay</u>

- Resolved a problem where players could pass through the surface near the finish line in Space Race on the broken asteroid section.
- Addressed an issue where the elimination screen appeared blurred after matches on the Abduction Avenue map.
- Corrected a bug where the Punch ability failed to function in the Stumbles and Dragons level during Events.
- Fixed a rare issue with the American Football emote where a white texture displayed incorrectly on the ball.

<u>Cosmetics</u>

- Resolved missing textures and animations for the Tidal Wave shadow in its victory animation.
- Fixed missing moving block effects for Tetris Arcade and Tetris Stumbler skins during team maps.
- Addressed missing facial features for certain skins when playing team maps.
- Resolved excessive shine and aura effects for Diamond Demon and Capt Diamondheart skins during gameplay.
- Corrected a floating character issue when previewing the Egyptian Dance animation.
- Fixed dull/hazy textures on the No Signal skin during gameplay.

<u>Levels</u>

- Fixed a visual bug causing a dark shadow to appear in the middle of Mr. Beast's Dangerous Traps.
- Corrected a crash issue for Block Dash Legendary that caused players to get stuck in the third round when selected on WebGL.

<u>Taunts and Animations</u>

- Resolved an issue where the rope asset from the Giddyup taunt animation was missing when using a transformer skin in the preview screen.

<u>UI and Menus</u>

- Fixed improper fitting of the Left Control text on UI buttons for Steam gameplay.
- Resolved a bug where the Account Suspended pop-up buttons for "Log In" and "Close" were non-functional.

<u>Victory Screen</u>

- Corrected a color darkening issue for My Hero Academia skins on the victory screen.
- Numerous other minor fixes and adjustments have been made across various levels and gameplay mechanics to enhance overall game stability and player experience.

attributes.title: Become an Official Stumble Guys Ambassador!
attributes.overview: The Stumble Guys Ambassador Program is your chance to step into the spotlight as an official representative of Stumbleverse. This Program empowers our most dedicated community members, giving them the opportunity to take on significant roles in shaping the Stumble Guys community. Ambassadors become trusted voices, helping the community grow and thrive.
attributes.content:
Do you love connecting with people, creating fun moments, and sharing your passion for Stumble Guys? Then step up and join the fun: The Stumble Guys Ambassador Program is here!

## What’s the Ambassador Program all about?

The Stumble Guys Ambassador Program is your chance to step into the spotlight as an official representative of Stumbleverse. This Program empowers our most dedicated community members, giving them the opportunity to take on significant roles in shaping the Stumble Guys community. Ambassadors become trusted voices, helping the community grow and thrive.

This voluntary, rewards-based program is open to players 18 and older who are passionate about connecting with others and enhancing the community. Ambassadors can choose from one to three roles:

- **Leader Ambassadors:** Build and manage regional communities where players speak a shared language, such as the actual Hispanic, Brazilian, German, or Indonesian Discord Servers. Please note: Content Creator or Clan communities will not be accepted for this role.
- **Host Ambassadors:** Organize engaging activities like tournaments, giveaways, and custom events.
- **Moderator Ambassadors:** Maintain safe and welcoming spaces on platforms like Discord and Reddit.

Ambassadors can take on one, two, or all roles based on their interests and availability, offering flexibility to fit their schedule.

## Why should you join?

These are some of the perks that you can enjoy as an official Stumble Guys Ambassador:

- In-game perks: All maps unlocked in Custom Party, 500 Friend List slots, a colored in-game name, and the Ambassador tag.
- Monthly rewards: Gems, the Stumble Pass unlocked!
- Recognition and support: Special community roles, direct communication with Stumble Guys Staff, and resources to bring your creative ideas to life.

Cool, huh?

## Who can apply?

To join the Stumble Guys Ambassador Program, you must:

- Be **18 or older** and **fluent in English**.
- You will need to be **at least level 10 in the Stumble Guys Discord Server.**
- Be an active presence on Stumble Guys platforms (Discord, Reddit, Twitch, or YouTube).
- Have a passion for Stumble Guys with deep knowledge of the game and community.
- Be a positive role model who fosters respect and inclusivity, with no history of disruptive behavior.
- Commit to monthly activities for your chosen role (moderating, hosting events, etc.).
- Collaborate constructively with the Stumble Guys Team, Ambassadors, Content Creators, and players.

Each role has specific requirements listed in the Application Form.

## How to get started

Ready to take the leap? Applying is simple - click **<u>[here](https://forms.gle/jKXd54gosAp2vVZp8)</u>** and tell us why you’d be an amazing Ambassador. Spots are limited, so don’t wait!

**THE AMBASSADOR APPLICATION FORM WILL REMAIN OPEN UNTIL JANUARY 31**

Take your time - there’s no need to rush! It’s better to carefully prepare your application than to submit it in a hurry and risk making a bad impression.

## Do you want to know more?

Head to our **<u>[Discord Server](https://discord.com/invite/stumbleguys)</u>** to read the FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions), participate in our upcoming Ask Me Anything session, or chat with other amazing Stumblers, Creators, and Staff!

You can also join the conversation on **<u>[Reddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/StumbleGuys/)</u>**.

Happy Stumbling!

attributes.title: Official Merch - Best of 2024!
attributes.overview: 2024 has been an exciting year for collectibles and toys! Here's a rundown of the official Stumble Guys products that made waves worldwide this year!
attributes.content:
Stumblers, 2024 has been an exciting year for collectibles and toys! Here's a rundown of the official Stumble Guys products that made waves worldwide this year!

Tell us on our **<u>[Discord](https://www.discord.gg/PvcTMUEAKK)</u>** which ones were your favorite!

**ACTION & MINI-ACTION FIGURES**

After much pondering, our favorites are the Action & Mini-Action figures – made to stumble just like in the game!

![unnamed (4).jpg](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_4_dd8bdcdc4b.jpg)


<u>Stumble Plushies</u>

We know that Super Banana was the most coveted plush ever (sorry someone had to say it!). But apart from going bananas we know you also loved to cuddle with your favorite characters, like Cereal Killer, Mr Stumble or Sprinkles! 

![unnamed (5).jpg](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_5_4bef379b63.jpg)


<u>Stumble Guys Mini Collectibles</u>

You know we all need a tiny Stumbler (or a whole collection) on our shelf to show off we’re TRUE Stumble Fans! The chrome ones like Dynamitron, Captain Goldheart or Diamond Banana are so cool they made us stumble. 

![unnamed (6).jpg](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_6_03a025ae17.jpg)


<u>Stumble Guys Trading Cards by Panini (including the Limited Edition!)</u>

Did you get all of them? Including the limited edition ones with the coolest effects? Or did someone trade you those for a sad Common Stumbler card? We hope not, because there is nothing more satisfying than having a full album filled with Stumble Guys cards!

![unnamed (7).jpg](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_7_876ca6564d.jpg)


**DIRAMIX MONSTERFLEX**

These stretchable Stumblers are the best to squish and stretch – especially after a tough round where you got eliminated… We love the Golden Banana and the Ruby Cupid with their special effects. 

![unnamed (7).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_7_c2ba266c7e.png)

## Available Now!

These official products have been launched globally through select retailers, including Walmart US, Amazon US, and local shops in various regions. Be sure to grab your favorites before they’re gone!
Stay tuned for more exciting Stumble Guys releases in the future, and keep stumbling in style!

attributes.title: Creator Codes Open to ALL Creators!
attributes.overview: To celebrate the end of 2024 and the start of 2025, we’re opening Creator Codes to all creators! From Dec 20 to Jan 31, you can start supporting any of these creators who their code activated, just down below.
attributes.content:
Hi Stumblers! To celebrate the end of 2024 and the start of 2025, we’re opening Creator Codes to all creators! From Dec 20 to Jan 31, you can start supporting any of these creators who their code activated, just down below.

Do you have a favorite Stumble Guys content creator? Did you know you can support them at no extra cost to you? Just use their Creator Code in-game and show your love while you play!


## What are Creator Codes?

Creator Codes are unique codes given to our top content creators. When you enter a Creator Code in the in-game shop, a small percentage of your purchase goes directly to the creator linked to that code. So, every time you make a purchase using a Creator Code, the creator earns a portion of the sales!

## How to Use a Creator Code

To start supporting a creator, go into the Stumble Guys in-game shop.

- Head to the Extras tab (all the way to the right of the shop).
- You should see the "Support A Creator" section, where you can simply click the "Enter Code" button.
- Once you click on the “Enter Code” button, simply type any Creator Code that you wish to use, and click “Enter”.
- You should then see a popup confirming that you are now using that Creator Code.
- You can now press “Enter Code” again to use another Creator Code.

## What Platforms Support Creator Codes?

Creator Codes are available across all platforms! You can enter them on Mobile, Steam, Web, and Console. Once you've applied a Creator Code on any of these platforms, any purchases made on our webstore using the same in-game name will also count towards the creator. This ensures the creator earns a small percentage of those sales too!

**Here’s a list of all the active Creator Codes you can start using today to support your favorite Stumble Guys content creators!**

attributes.title: Legendary Lava Land: A Prehistoric Playground!
attributes.overview: Stumblers, get ready to turn up the heat! Lava Land is back with a Legendary  twist. Bounce through vents, dodge dinosaur bones, and tackle new hazards all while escaping rising lava. This map will test your survival skills like never before!
attributes.content:
Stumblers, get ready to turn up the heat! Lava Land is back with a Legendary  twist. Bounce through vents, dodge dinosaur bones, and tackle new hazards all while escaping rising lava. This map will test your survival skills like never before!

## What’s New?

Legendary Lava Land introduces exciting new pillars to shake up gameplay:

- Trampoline Pillars: Bounce to safety—or chaos!
- Flipper Pillars: Toss you unpredictably. Stay alert.
- Rotating & Vine Pillars: Spin or trip for added challenge.
- Tornado & Ice Pillars: Swirling winds and slippery landings test your balance.
- Sticky & Crumbling Pillars: Slow you down or collapse underfoot.

## Tips to Survive

- Keep Moving: Avoid the rising lava by hopping between pillars.
- Learn Hazards: Master each pillar type to stay ahead.
- Jump Wisely: Timing is everything.
- Adapt: Be ready to switch strategies quickly.

Dynamic pillars, fresh challenges, and a prehistoric vibe make every round exciting. Can you handle the heat and become the ultimate Stumble champion? Jump in and find out!

attributes.title: Banana Bonanza: Collect, Unlock, and Win Big!
attributes.overview: In Banana Bonanza, players can collect Limited-Time Collectibles (LTCs) by participating in various challenges and events. These LTCs can then be used to unlock Banana Prize Boxes, each packed with surprises like rare cosmetics, in-game currencies, and the highly coveted Banana Statues.
attributes.content:
Get ready for a thrilling adventure with the latest addition to Stumble Guys: Banana Bonanza! This brand-new mechanic is here to add a whole new level of excitement to your gameplay. Dive into themed challenges, earn exclusive rewards, and unlock incredible prizes while enjoying your favorite game modes. Here's everything you need to know about Banana Bonanza:

## **How It Works**

In Banana Bonanza, players can collect **Limited-Time Collectibles (LTCs)** by participating in various challenges and events. These LTCs can then be used to unlock Banana Prize Boxes, each packed with surprises like rare cosmetics, in-game currencies, and the highly coveted Banana Statues.

## **The Goal**

The ultimate objective is to collect all 5 unique Banana Statues. Once you’ve gathered them, you’ll unlock the Grand Prize of your choice! But it doesn’t stop there—keep collecting Banana Statues to claim even more Grand Prizes and make your collection truly legendary.

## **How to Earn Sunglasses LTC**

Collect Sunglasses LTC through a variety of activities in Stumble Guys:

- Quick Play: Jump into quick matches and earn LTC as you compete.
- Ranked: Test your skills in Ranked matches to score big.
- Events & Tournaments: Join themed challenges and tournaments to boost your LTC stash.
- Missions: Complete daily and special missions for extra rewards.
- Shop Bundles: Exclusive bundles in the shop also include Sunglasses LTC!

## **Unlock Banana Prize Boxes**

Use your Sunglasses LTC to purchase Banana Prize Boxes! Each box contains:

- Cosmetics to make your character stand out.
- In-game currencies to keep you ahead of the game.
- Banana Statues—the key to unlocking the Grand Prizes.

## **The Grand Prizes**
Once you collect all 5 unique Banana Statues, you can choose your first Grand Prize. But the excitement doesn’t end there! Continue collecting more Banana Statues to claim additional Grand Prizes, making the Banana Bonanza event even more rewarding.

The Banana Bonanza event is your chance to unlock rare collectibles, discover exciting surprises, and take your Stumble Guys experience to the next level. Start collecting Sunglasses LTC, open Banana Prize Boxes, and claim your Grand Prizes today. Let the Banana Bonanza begin!

attributes.title: Stumble, Watch, Win: Your Ultimate Guide to Twitch Drops!
attributes.overview: Unlock exclusive in-game rewards with Twitch Drops! Watching your favorite Stumble Guys streams can now earn you amazing perks, but first, you’ll need to connect your Twitch and Scopely accounts. This guide walks you through every step of the process, ensuring you’re set up to start earning rewards while enjoying top-notch gameplay content. Let’s dive in!
attributes.content:
Unlock exclusive in-game rewards with Twitch Drops! Watching your favorite Stumble Guys streams can now earn you amazing perks, but first, you’ll need to connect your Twitch and Scopely accounts. This guide walks you through every step of the process, ensuring you’re set up to start earning rewards while enjoying top-notch gameplay content. Let’s dive in!

## What are Twitch Drops & how to link it to my account?

Twitch Drops are game rewards you earn by watching Twitch streams! Link your Twitch and Scopely accounts together and watch a Stumble Guys stream with the Drops Enabled tag to start earning Drops.

<u>STEP 1</u> - **<u>https://www.stumbleguys.com/twitch</u>**

The first step now allows you to validate your user name, to check if your user exists, if you are connected to the Scopely ID or not. 

You may encounter various scenarios depending on the status of your in-game account. Please refer to the details below:

a) The user does not exist because they haven't created an account in the game. A message will appear notifying the player that the user cannot be found and prompting them to create an account in the game.



b) If the user exists but is not connected to the Scopely ID, an animated popup will appear, guiding the player on how to link their account to the Scopely ID within the game. Once the user closes the popup, a message informs them that their username has been found but they need to link their game to proceed.



c) User connected to the Scopely ID in game


<u>STEP 2</u>

Login with your Scopely ID account (Ensure that you are connected on the page with the same Scopely account that you use in game!)



<u>STEP 3</u>

Login with twitch



**1. Watch Eligible Streams**

Find Streams: Look for the STG (Stumble Guys) streams with Drops enabled.

Watch the Stream: Make sure you have linked your Scopely account to your Twitch account as explained above before starting watching the stream for the required amount of time specified by the campaign.

**2. Check Your Progress**

Inventory Page: Go to your Twitch Inventory page by clicking on your profile picture in the top right corner, selecting "Drops" from the dropdown menu, or directly via the Twitch Inventory link: https://www.twitch.tv/drops/inventory

Progress Bars: Monitor the progress bars for ongoing campaigns to see how close you are to earning a Drop.

**3. Claim Rewards**

Notification: When you have met the requirements for a Drop, you will receive a notification on Twitch. This could be a pop-up notification in the stream or a notification in your Twitch account.

Claim Button: Go to the Twitch Inventory page where you will see the rewards you have earned. Click the "Claim" button next to the reward to add it to your inventory.


**4. Ensure Linked Accounts:**

Link Accounts: Make sure your Twitch account is linked to the relevant Scopely ID account you use on the game (as stated in step 1) This is required for the rewards to be transferred to the game.

Check Game Account: After claiming the reward on Twitch, check your game to ensure the item has been received. This might involve logging out and back into the game or checking specific in-game inventory sections.

<u>Troubleshooting:</u>

- Support: If you encounter any issues with claiming or receiving your Drops, check the Twitch Drop FAQ or contact Twitch Support for assistance.

- Game Support: If the issue is with receiving the reward in the game, contact the game's support team for help.

## FAQs:

**Why can't I link my Twitch account to Scopely?**

If you're unable to link your Twitch account to Scopely, it could be due to the following reasons:

- The Scopely account already has a Twitch account linked.
- The Twitch account is linked to another Scopely account.
- The Twitch account's email belongs to an existing Scopely account (different from the current one).


**An error was shown when clicked on ''Link Twitch'', why?**

If this was the case, just try clicking on it again, follow the steps, and the error should no longer appear.


**How long until I get my earned Drops in-game?**

Your Twitch Drops rewards will arrive instantly in-game after being claimed! You may need to restart your Stumble Guys client in order to make them appear, if you are already in-game.

**Where can I see the Streamers who have enabled the drops?**

At the moment of writing, these are streamers with enabled drops:

- **<u>[Kromka](https://www.twitch.tv/kromkachleba)</u>**
- **<u>[PAGO3](https://www.twitch.tv/pago3?lang=pl)</u>**
- **<u>[Nieuczesana](https://www.twitch.tv/nieuczesana)</u>**
- **<u>[Diables](https://www.twitch.tv/diables)</u>**
- **<u>[S7ormy](https://www.twitch.tv/s7ormytv)</u>**
- **<u>[ilrossopiùbelloditwitch](https://www.twitch.tv/ilrossopiubelloditwitch)</u>**
- **<u>[Il Masseo](https://www.twitch.tv/ilmasseo)</u>**

**Is there any restriction on who can enable Drops on their channels? Or any Content Creators can enable them?**

Any streamer/twitch accounts can enable drops:
https://dashboard.twitch.tv/drops

**On which platforms the rewards are available?**

Mobile (Android, iOS) , PlayStation (4 & 5), Xbox (One & Series) and Steam. Switch is not available for this campaign.

**I still have questions about Twitch Drops, where can I get more info?**

Learn more about Twitch Drops at the help page on Twitch's website

Twitch Drops make your gaming experience even more rewarding, so don’t miss out! Link your accounts, tune in to Stumble Guys streams, and claim your rewards effortlessly. Have more questions? Refer to the FAQs or contact support for assistance. Now, get ready to stumble, watch, and win!

attributes.title: 0.81 Patch Notes: Dominate or Die!
attributes.overview: It's time to gear up and dive into our final update of the year! As we prepare to close out an amazing year of stumbling fun, we're excited to bring you a thrilling new level: Rocket Doom. Grab your friends, lock in your aim, and jump into this fast-paced, rocket-fueled team battle where capturing flags is your ticket to victory!
attributes.content:
Hi Stumblers! Welcome to the Version 0.81!
It's time to gear up and dive into our final update of the year! As we prepare to close out an amazing year of stumbling fun, we're excited to bring you a thrilling new level: Rocket Doom. Grab your friends, lock in your aim, and jump into this fast-paced, rocket-fueled team battle where capturing flags is your ticket to victory!


**New Level**

<u>Rocket Doom</u>

Prepare for explosive fun in our thrilling new level, "Rocket Doom"!

Join forces in teams of 4 as you dive into a high-octane battle for supremacy. The objective is simple yet action-packed: capture flags and earn points while leaping through the air and firing rockets at your opponents. Strategy, teamwork, and precision are key to claiming victory!

- Dynamic Gameplay: Navigate an active battlefield, where quick reflexes and sharp aim make all the difference.
- Flag Capture Mechanics: Flags are scattered across the arena. Grab them to score points for your team, but be ready to defend your ground—your opponents will be gunning for you!
- Rocket-Powered Action: Use rocket launchers to disrupt your foes and protect your teammates. Master the art of timing your shots while evading enemy fire.
- Victory Condition: The first team to accumulate 200 points reigns supreme. Will your team rise to the challenge?

Rocket Doom is the ultimate test of coordination and firepower. Are you ready to blast your way to the top?



**Cosmetics** 

<u>Emotes</u>
- Coughing Meow [Uncommon]
- Disco Heck [Uncommon]
- Frozen Heart [Uncommon]
- Judging [Uncommon]
- To the Limit [Common]
- Speaking Head [Common]
- The G.O.A.T. [Uncommon]
- Cute Holo Paws [Common]

<u>Footsteps</u>
- Analogue Mountains [Mythic]
- Black Feathers [Rare]
- Brass Knuckles [Uncommon]
- Disco Lights [Legendary]
- Malaysia Flag [Epic]
- Neon Bones [Rare]
- Snowjet [Legendary]
- Turkey Flag [Epic]

<u>Stumblers</u>
- Bang Horo [Epic]
- Boring Mike [Epic]
- Bella [Rare]
- Ski Guy [Uncommon]
- Snowboard Gal [Rare]
- Disco Meow [Epic]
- DJ Heck Jr. [Special]
- Firestarter [Legendary]
- Frozen Battle Angel [Legendary]
- Plushy [Rare]
- Queen of Frost [Mythic]
- Ice Spirit [Epic]
- Shard [Special]
- Kyle [Uncommon]
- Buff G.O.A.T. [Mythic]
- Flamboyant Megalodon [Epic]
- Party Bones [Legendary]
- Stumble Greed [Legendary]
- Holo Paws [Mythic]
- Drift [Legendary]
- Neon Racer [Legendary]
- White Claw Ronin [Epic]
- Snow Berserker [Rare]

<u>Taunt Animations</u>
- Happy 2025! [Legendary]
- Analogue Sunset [Legendary]
- Mirror Check [Rare]
- Slippin' [Rare]

<u>Victory Animations</u>
- Cat Pose [Rare]
- Hat Juggling [Legendary]
- Swagger [Epic]
- Neon Clubs [Rare]
- Piano Footwork [Legendary]



**0.81 Bug fixes**

Patch 0.80 bug fixes focused on enhancing gameplay stability, performance, and user experience, as part of our ongoing effort to improve gameplay and ensure a more stable and enjoyable experience. Here’s a breakdown of the most notable fixes:

- Fixed a bug causing improper screen adjustments when flipping out devices on Android.
- Corrected a glitch where players weren't eliminated after being hit by lasers in the Beholder
- Boss's room in Stumbles and Dragons level.
- Resolved an issue with VFX for thunder strikes in Bot Bash.
- Resolved an issue where players were getting stuck on the ‘Waiting…’ screen upon attempting to create a Workshop Level.
- Fixed an issue with the Block Throw ability while using the Tetris skin.
- Corrected a qualification issue with the game host while playing Block Dash Teams.
- Fixed inconsistencies with special character display in Rate Us text on Android.
- Addressed an issue where players could not rotate with the spinning obstacle in Abduction Avenue.
- Resolved a bug causing characters to pass through the first rolling log obstacle in Jungle Roll.
- Fixed an issue where players fell out of the playable area after collisions with bombs in Race of Eternia.
- Adjusted uneven sound effects across the Customize, Home, and Waiting screens.
- Resolved an issue where Turkish and Vietnamese characters with accents reverted to the default font.
- Fixed a bug where the Helix skin lost its glow and color on the home screen.
- Corrected a glitch where a white background appears while spinning a Wheel.
- Resolved an error where white patches appear on the skin panels on the Lucky Wheel.
- Numerous other minor fixes and adjustments have been made across various levels and gameplay mechanics to enhance overall game stability and player experience.


**0.81 Known Issues**

Here’s a list of issues we’re actively working on. We appreciate your patience while we investigate and resolve them!

<u>Events and Gameplay</u>
- An error message appears after completing round 2 in the Block Dash Remastered event or custom parties.
- In Block Dash Rush, Steam players may experience crashes when playing with cross-platform players.
- The countdown timer sometimes gets stuck on screen, leaving the game frozen at the end of a round.
- Block Dash Rush boosters are not working as expected.


<u>Rewards and Progression</u>
- The reward screen may freeze when claiming rewards from event stumble boxes in Block Dash Remastered.
- The reward count displayed on the ShowDown Tournament Rewards screen may be incorrect.
- Some players are unable to collect enough Pass Tokens to unlock rewards on the Bonus Page.

<u>Purchases and Payments</u>
- Errors may appear when purchasing the Premium Stumble Pass on WebGL.
- Steam users might encounter issues with some in-app purchases.
- Players on WebGL may see an error pop-up when purchasing real money offers.

<u>Visual and UI Issues</u>

- Skins on the Battle Pass activation screen may appear pixelated on Steam.
- On iOS, the home screen layout can become misaligned after returning from ads.
- The rank icon is sometimes missing on the winning screen.
- Emote slots in the party lobby aren’t visible to other players.


<u>Login and Account</u>

- Logging out from Scopely, Facebook, or Apple IDs may result in an error for some users.
- WebGL users may encounter an “invalid_request” error when logging out.
- The age gate’s "Do not share/do not sell" option isn’t redirecting properly on Steam.


<u>Leaderboards and Social Features</u>
- Friends' records are not showing on the Friends Leaderboard after restarting the game.
- We’re committed to improving your experience and will keep you updated as we roll out fixes for these issues. Thanks for sticking with us!

attributes.title: Holiday Season in Stumble Guys!
attributes.overview:
Celebrate December in Stumble Guys: Rewards, Events, and Surprises Await!

December is here, and Stumble Guys is bringing the ultimate festive fun! This month is packed with exciting events, daily gifts, and exclusive rewards you won’t want to miss.
attributes.content:
# Holiday Season in Stumble Guys!

**Attention, Stumblers!**

December is here, and it’s set to be our most rewarding month yet! Get ready to be showered with gifts and surprises!

As we step into the last month of the year, we’re celebrating with the community by bringing rewards galore! Let’s dive into the fun!

First up, the **Advent Calendar!** Log in every day until December 25th to claim a free gift each day. (No spoilers, but let’s just say it’s worth it!)
__________

### **Festive Holiday Prize Boxes**

Get ready to unwrap the fun with **Holiday Prize Boxes,** packed with a variety of thrilling rewards! From rare items to **exclusive animations, taunts, and footsteps,** there’s something for everyone to enjoy. 

Whether you’re looking to show off with a new taunt, unlock unique animations, or leave your mark with amazing footsteps, these prize boxes are brimming with surprises. Don’t miss your chance to add these exciting collectibles to your Stumble Guys inventory this holiday season!

__________

### New Event coming mid-December - **Banana Bonanza!**

This fresh and dynamic event lets you earn even bigger rewards through special challenges. **Collect Statues, Claim Rewards, and Repeat!** We’re talking major rewards like the **Ice Warrior** and **Ice Queen skins, Snowjet Footsteps** and the frosty **Ice Throne Animation**—and loads more, including exclusive skins, footsteps, and emotes!

_____________

### **Milestone and Leaderboard Events**

Gear up for a season of thrilling challenges with **Milestone and Leaderboard Events** featuring some of your favorite levels, including:
- Block Dash Remastered
- Super Slide Teams
- Stumble Rumble Teams
- Battle Dash Teams
- Laser Tracer Teams

Amazing rewards await, like special **Skin Shards, Holiday Prize Boxes, Ability Tokens,** and other surprises. Keep an eye out for epic items like a legendary **Block Dash Grid Footstep** and more—you won’t want to miss the action!

______________________

### **Twitch Drops Alert!**

Starting **December 11th,** watch Stumble Guys content on Twitch to unlock exclusive rewards, including a special emote and a highly thematic skin! Don’t miss out!

December is going to be wild, and we can’t wait to see everyone in-game!

attributes.title: Meet Khortex and Grab His Bundle!
attributes.overview: Khortex’s impact on Stumble Guys has been nothing short of legendary, and now you can carry a piece of that legacy with his exclusive in-game Khortex bundles!
attributes.content:
Introducing **Khortex**, one of the original creators who helped shape the Stumble Guys community since 2021. Known for his unforgettable tricks and fire content, Khortex now takes center stage with his very own in-game Khortex bundles, featuring his iconic skin! This exclusive interview dives into his journey as a creator, his favorite Stumble Guys moments, and why this bundle is a must-have for fans who want to play in true OG style.

- **Can you briefly introduce yourself to our players?**
Khortex is one of the earliest Stumble Guys creators, starting his journey in 2021. Since discovering the game, he's been capturing his best moments through videos and live streaming. What he loves most about Stumble Guys is the opportunity to engage with his audience, creating a fun and entertaining experience for his fans.
- **How long have you been a content creator/streamer?**
4 years.
- **What is your biggest accomplishment in Stumble Guys as a player?**
Known for pulling off memorable tricks on various maps, which other players recognize him for. His biggest accomplishment, however, is having his own character in the game, something he’s incredibly grateful for.
- **What do you like the most about Stumble Guys?**
He enjoys the game’s competitive nature, but what stands out most is the fun and community spirit it fosters.
- **What is your favorite skin/emote/etc.?**
Emote: As an "OG" player, the punch emote is his signature choice.
Skin: Crimson Skull, a classic and longtime favorite.
- **What is a good memory you have from Stumble Guys in your life?**
While he has many great memories, the first tournament he won stands out as particularly memorable.
- **Do you have advice you want to give to new players?**
His advice: “There’s no one way to play Stumble Guys! Play your own way and do whatever you enjoy the most—that’s how the game should be played!”
- **Favorite IP introduced into the game?**
SpongeBob, 100%!
- **Can you share what initially drew you to create content specifically for Stumble Guys?**
Although the game wasn’t yet a major success, he saw its potential early on. Being one of the first content creators helped him grow his channel, and he’s very grateful for that foresight.
- **What does your content creation process look like for Stumble Guys? How do you plan and execute your ideas?**
He doesn’t typically use scripts, instead opting to share new game features or playing the game in unique ways when there’s no new content.
- **Could you describe one or two of your favorite pieces of content that you’ve made for Stumble Guys and what made them special?**
A standout moment was hosting a major community tournament to celebrate his 30th birthday. Thanks to support from Scopely, the event featured a large competition and free registration, making it special for him and the community.
- **What are your future plans regarding content creation for Stumble Guys? Are there any new directions or concepts you’re excited to explore?**
He’s keeping his future plans under wraps but hints that “news is coming soon!”
- **What advice would you give to someone who wants to start creating content for Stumble Guys?**
“Don’t wait, go for it! You don’t need to be the best; you just need to be different.”
- **Where is the bundle available and for how long?**
Khortex bundles are available NOW **<u>[in-game](https://bit.ly/STGstore)</u>** and in the **<u>[web store](https://www.stumbleguys.com/shop)</u>**
- The link to your main channel:
**<u>[Khortex on YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@khortex)</u>**
- What is your creator code?
KTX

Khortex’s impact on Stumble Guys has been nothing short of legendary, and now you can carry a piece of that legacy with his exclusive in-game Khortex bundles! Ready to stumble like Khortex? Let’s go!
