attributes.title: 0.80 Patch Notes: The Sky’s the Limit!
attributes.overview: Discover the thrilling new updates in Stumble Guys 0.80: The Sky's the Limit! Explore exciting maps like Legendary Lava Land and Skyslide, master new abilities like Shutdown, and dive into fresh gameplay features like Block Dash Rush Teams. Collect unique cosmetics, compete in Banana Bonanza challenges, and enjoy bug fixes for a smoother experience. Read all about the latest patch notes now
attributes.content:
## 0.80 Patch Notes
### The Sky’s the Limit

Get ready to soar, slide, and dash in the latest Stumble Guys update—where the fun reaches new heights (and depths)! In version 0.80, you’ll tackle three awesome new battlegrounds:

- Skyslide: A wild, gravity-defying race through the clouds!
- Legendary Lava Land: Dodge fiery obstacles and rising lava in this prehistoric challenge.
- Block Dash Rush Teams: Work with your squad in a turbo-charged version of Block Dash that’s all about teamwork and strategy.

It’s time to team up, race solo, and stumble your way to victory like never before! Are you ready to join the action?

<u>New Level</u>

**Lava Land Legendary**

Legendary Lava Land reimagines the classic with a prehistoric twist, transforming the fiery
caldera into a tactical playground for Stumblers. Set amidst the smoking vents and ancient
dinosaur bones of an active volcano, Legendary Lava Land amps up the original challenge
with dynamic new pillars and hazards that will keep even the most seasoned players on their
toes. Navigate around, bounce off, and avoid the new pillars, all while the molten lava rises
around you. Get ready to test your survival skills in this intensified arena!

This level introduces a variety of new hazard pillars that shake up gameplay and add fresh
strategies to this fiery challenge:
- Trampoline Pillars let you escape the lava with a bounce.
- Flipper Pillars can toss you in unpredictable directions, demanding careful footing.
- Rotating and Stumbling Vine Pillars add disorienting spins and tripping vines,
requiring precise landings.
- Tornado and Ice Pillars throw in swirling winds and slippery surfaces, pushing your
balance to the limit.
- Sticky and Crumbling Pillars create tricky situations, slowing movement and
collapsing underfoot.

<u>Skyslide</u>

Skyslide takes you to a breathtaking floating city where gravity is just another obstacle to
overcome. This unique slide race combines thrilling vertical free-falls with high-speed slide
sections, all set against a stunning steampunk backdrop. Navigate dizzying heights, use your
wits, and master new abilities as you race to victory!

Key Gameplay Mechanics

- Free Fall Mechanic: Drop through enormous vertical tubes, steering through hazards
with mid-air directional controls. The shifted vertical camera intensifies the sensation
of speed and height, creating an unforgettable descent.
- Dive Ability: Use this new move to speed up your fall, smash through breakable walls,
and even knock rivals off course. Use it carefully to avoid obstacles or to find strategic
shortcuts!

<u>New Gameplay Feature</u>

**Block Dash Rush Teams**

The high-speed thrill of Block Dash Rush just got a major upgrade with Team Mode! Race
across this neon-lit cyberpunk cityscape alongside your teammates as you dodge moving
blocks, breakable platforms, and deadly lasers. Block Dash Rush Teams brings a fresh twist to
the chaos—your team’s fate now rests on your collective performance, not just individual
speed.

By now we are sure you are familiar with Team mode on race levels, but just in case you
missed it, here is how it works:
- No Respawning Orbs: In team-based races, players don’t respawn, making every jump
and dodge critical.
- Point-Based System: Every finished position earns points for your team. The faster your
team members complete the race, the higher your team's overall score.
- Qualification Rules: To move to the next round, your team needs to rank in the top half
based on points. As players finish, points are added to your team's total, which can
alter standings in real-time.
- Dynamic Round Ending: Once enough teams have qualified and it’s no longer possible
for others to catch up, the round ends automatically.


<u>New Feature</u>

**Ability Showcase**

We’re excited to launch a brand-new feature called Ability Showcase, designed to help you
test out exciting abilities even if you haven’t unlocked them yet! In special Ability Showcase
Events, players can jump into gameplay with a featured Ability, experiencing its power and
unique advantages firsthand.

How It Works:
- Regardless of unlock status, the featured Ability will be available to all players during
an Ability Showcase Event.
- Use this Event as a “test run” to see how the Ability impacts your strategy, skills, and
gameplay style.
- Decide if this Ability is worth your investment and whether you want to work towards
unlocking it permanently.

<u>New Feature</u>

**Banana Bonanza**

With this new mechanic, players can now participate in themed challenges to earn exclusive
LTCs, which can be used to unlock Prize Boxes packed with rewards. Each Prize Box gives you
a chance to collect special Statues tied to the Event theme.

Gather all the unique statues, and you’ll unlock an exceptional Grand Prize of your choice!
This engaging new mechanic lets you pursue rare collectibles while enjoying the thrill of
uncovering cosmetics, currencies, and more surprises along the way. It is also a way to get a
more rewarding experience throughout a bunch of different game modes in Stumble Guys!

- Sunglasses LTC
Collect these limited-time sunglasses through Quick Play, Ranked, Events,
Tournaments, Missions, and exclusive bundles in the shop!
- Banana Prize Boxes
Use your collected Sunglasses LTC to purchase Banana Prize Boxes! Inside, you'll find
a mix of cosmetics, in-game currencies, and the chance to win one of the rare Banana
Statues needed for the Grand Prize.
- Grand Prizes
Collect all 5 Banana Statues to choose a Grand Prize! Keep collecting more Banana
Statues to claim additional Grand Prizes.

<u>New Ability</u>

**Shutdown**

The Shutdown ability brings a powerful, reactive edge to Stumble Guys, allowing players to
neutralize the effects of status-based abilities within a specific range. With Shutdown, players
can disrupt nearby opponents' boosts or defensive states, making it ideal for tactical use in both
defensive and aggressive plays. Activate it strategically to turn the tide by cancelling effects such
as Invisibility, Hug, Shield, and other temporary buffs, gaining the upper hand when it matters
most.

Ability Upgrade paths
- Cooldown: Reduces the cooldown time for Shutdown, allowing more frequent use to
counter threats quickly.
- Area of Effect: Expands the reach of the Shutdown ability, affecting a wider radius and
catching more opponents in its neutralizing effect.
- Speed: Temporarily boosts the player's movement speed after activation, enabling quick
repositioning or escapes in high-stakes situations.

Note: Available in the Ability Showcase Event (November 21 - November 25)

<u>Cosmetics</u>

**Emotes**

- Cringe [Common]
- Snowflake [Common]
- Steamy Ears [Common]
- Dark Plans [Uncommon]
- Drippin' [Uncommon]
- Saluting Nemo [Uncommon]
- Winking Claus [Uncommon]

**Footsteps**

- Goldjet [Legendary]
- Presents [Epic]
- Cogwheels [Rare]
- Frozen Dust [Rare]
- Gingerbread Shurikens [Rare]
- Dreidels [Uncommon]
- Gingerbread Guys [Uncommon]

**Stumblers**

- Aurore [Special]
- Glacy [Special]
- Goldface [Special]
- Captain Nemo [Mythic]
- Jetstream [Mythic]
- Rud01-PH [Mythic]
- Coalbuster [Legendary]
- Duke Stumbleton [Legendary]
- Frozen Zephyr [Legendary]
- Gingerbread Samurai [Legendary]
- Rudolph the Rizz-Nosed [Legendary]
- Super Zeppelin [Legendary]
- Gingerbread Banana Guy [Epic]
- Gingerbread Mr. Stumble [Epic]
- Gingerbread Sprinkles [Epic]
- Gus [Epic]
- Claus [Epic]
- Ms. Claus [Epic]
- Snowmer [Rare]
- Gearcracker [Rare]
- Kloe [Uncommon]
- Elisa [Uncommon]

**Taunt Animations**

- Freezing [Legendary]
- Intimidating Cane [Epic]
- Jingle Bells [Rare]
- Pirouette [Rare]

**Victory Animations**
- Molding Gold [Mythic]
- Calming Explosions [Legendary]
- Ice Throne [Legendary]
- Raining Presents [Legendary]
- Anchor Spin [Epic]
- Waikiki Christmas [Epic]

<u>Bug fixes</u>

Here are some of the fixes we have applied with the 0.80 release:

**Gameplay**

- Infinite Carousel: Resolved an issue where players encountered an infinite carousel
loop when selecting Battle Dash Teams after an elimination map in the first round.
- Battle Dash Teams: Fixed a bug where users could reach opponents’ platforms using
the Ball Ability.
- Block Dash Teams: Fixed an issue where player characters could become trapped
inside blocks after revival.
- Lava Rush Teams: Corrected visibility issues for Rotating Wooden Obstacles and
Floating Rocks in the Lava Rush Teams map.
- Super Waterpark: Resolved an issue causing characters to fall through open sloping
surfaces.
- Builds have been updated to fix a controller binding issue. Players were unable to use single bindings for Abilities and Emotes using a controller.

**Stumble Workshop**
- Fixed an issue causing the game to get stuck on the loading screen when creating
UGC levels.
● Map Publishing: Corrected a bug where featuring a workshop map in multiple sections
led to publishing errors.

**Stumble Pass**

- Pixelated Skins: Fixed pixelation issues affecting skins on the Stumble Pass screen.

**Events and Tournaments**

- Fixed a bug where users were presented with an error when attempting to collect
rewards after finishing a tournament.
- Resolved an issue where the game would get stuck on a "Currency Full!" popup if users
attempted to collect rewards with maximum tournament tickets.

**Audio**

- Spotify Compatibility: Fixed an issue where in-game audio prevented Spotify from
playing music simultaneously.

Version 0.80 is packed with exciting new maps, features, and challenges for every kind of player. Master new abilities, collect exclusive rewards, and team up with friends to claim victory. Jump in and start stumbling today!

attributes.title: Friendsgiving Discord Referral
attributes.overview: Welcome to our Friendsgiving Discord Referral Event! Invite your friends, have fun, and earn cool rewards. Invite people to our server, climb the leaderboard, and win awesome prizes.
attributes.content:
### **Friendsgiving Discord Referral Event**

Welcome to our Friendsgiving Discord Referral Event! Invite your friends, have fun, and earn cool rewards. Invite people to our server, climb the leaderboard, and win awesome prizes.

---

### Invite Your Friends

1. **Link Your Account**  
   First, link your in-game account in the `#link-account` channel. This is important to track your invites and qualify for rewards.

2. **Generate an Invite**  
   Once your account is linked, click the”Invite” button to generate an invite link. The link will be active for 7 days. Share it with your friends to get them to join.

3. **Share & Compete**  
   Share your invite link! The more people who join using your link, the higher you'll move up the leaderboard. Only the Top 50 players will win rewards. You can check and refresh the leaderboard to track your position. You can click the “Invite” button at any time to view how many people used your link.

---

### Prizes

The Top 50 members will win:
- 1,000 Ability Tokens each
- Gobble Gobble Skin
- **Content Creators CAN participate but they will not be considered to win these prizes for this Community event.** If you are a Content Creator please refer to the CC Discord for the potential prizes available to you.

---

Invite your friends, share the Friendsgiving spirit, and aim for the top! Good luck!

Generate your unique Invite link on Discord! Check out the rules here:
<u>https://discord.com/channels/763643320638898186/1306687591910740048/1306688962328264744</u>

attributes.title: Support Your Favorite Creator with Creator Codes
attributes.overview: Do you have a favorite Stumble Guys content creator? Did you know you can support them at no extra cost to you? Just use their Creator Code in-game and show your love while you play!
attributes.content:
Do you have a favorite Stumble Guys content creator? Did you know you can support them at no extra cost to you? Just use their Creator Code in-game and show your love while you play!

**What are Creator Codes?**
Creator Codes are unique codes given to our top content creators. When you enter a Creator Code in the in-game shop, a small percentage of your purchase goes directly to the creator linked to that code. So, every time you make a purchase using a Creator Code, the creator earns a portion of the sales!

**How to Use a Creator Code**
To start supporting a creator, go into the Stumble Guys in-game shop.

![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 17.53.45.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_17_53_45_67656ef16a.png)
Head to the Extras tab (all the way to the right of the shop).

![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 17.53.51.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_17_53_51_05bece5b1a.png)
You should see the "Support A Creator" section, where you can simply click the "Enter Code" button.

Once you click on the “Enter Code” button, simply type any Creator Code that you wish to use, and click “Enter”.
![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 17.53.58.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_17_53_58_f227b6959f.png)

You should then see a popup confirming that you are now using that Creator Code.
![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 17.54.03.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_17_54_03_c378fdfb57.png)

Creator Codes have a time limit for how long they remain active in the shop. Some creators' codes are valid for 14 days, while others last for 7 days.

Remember to keep heading back to your in-game shop to re-enter a Creator Code after it expires!

If at any point you wish to use another Creator Code, simply press the “Stop” button.
![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 17.54.09.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_17_54_09_f1aa746ad1.png)

Press “Yes” to confirm and you will see that the Creator Code is removed from your shop.
![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 17.54.16.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_17_54_16_ccacf209e7.png)

You can now press “Enter Code” again to use another Creator Code.

**What Platforms Support Creator Codes?**
Creator Codes are available across **all** platforms! You can enter them on Mobile, Steam, Web, and Console. Once you've applied a Creator Code on any of these platforms, any purchases made on our [webstore](https://www.stumbleguys.com/shop) using the same in-game name will also count towards the creator. This ensures the creator earns a small percentage of those sales too!

**List of All Creator Codes**

Here’s a list of all the active Creator Codes you can start using today to support your favorite Stumble Guys content creators!

Numbers

attributes.title: The Speed of Stumbling! - Console Update
attributes.overview:
Get ready for Version 0.78! This update brings new levels, a brand-new splash screen, a ton of new IP collaborations,  a whole bunch of new cool cosmetics, and more!. 
Get ready to race through exciting new challenges and show off fresh cosmetics in the latest update! With new additions to Block Dash and a variety of stunning cosmetic options, there’s plenty for every Stumbler to enjoy. Jump in and explore all the fun this patch has on the shelves for you!
attributes.content:
Get ready for Version 0.78! This update brings **new levels, a brand-new splash screen, a ton of new IP collaborations,  a whole bunch of new cool cosmetics,** and more!

Get ready to race through exciting new challenges and show off fresh cosmetics in the latest update! With new additions to Block Dash and a variety of stunning cosmetic options, there’s plenty for every Stumbler to enjoy. Jump in and explore all the fun this patch has on the shelves for you!
____________
**New Levels**

**IP Collaboration: Dungeons and Dragons**


<u>Stumbles and Dragons</u>

Join Mr. Stumble on this epic adventure as he gathers his party to confront the dungeon's trials. Lava, traps, Kobolds, Dragons, Giants, and Beholders await as each player is bestowed with a random ability to navigate the perilous labyrinth.

- Designed for up to 32 players, but the gameplay is still seamless with fewer participants
- The challenge escalates as the prismatic wall relentlessly advances, testing players' abilities and determination with each passing room
- There are 12 rooms in total
- No two ventures into the dungeon are the same, as players are bestowed with unique class abilities to aid them in outrunning a relentless prismatic wall that spells doom for those it touches

Will you be able to escape the clutches of this mischievous dungeon? 

![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 16.17.18.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_16_17_18_9597692989.png)

____________

**New Mechanic**

<u>Classes and Abilities</u>

In the new level players can experience playing as 1 of 4 different classes, each class will give the player a special action button allowing them to trigger a unique ability and changing how they approach and solve the puzzles in the level. The 4 classes are:

- **Fighter**
The Fighter class will give the player the ability to swing a magical 
axe breaking barrels, cutting chains and knocking down other players.  
Each time they swing the axe they will get a small speed boost in the direction they are facing.

- **Mage**
What self respecting Wizard doesn’t have a plan to quickly 
escape?  By triggering the Wizards ability the player will teleport 
through the ether to a location in a straight line ahead of them. 
The length of this teleport is always the same so make 
sure you are facing the right way and know where you will land.

- **Rogue**
All good Rogues need a quick way to get up high to find new 
paths and escape observation. By playing a Rogue you will 
get the ability for a special boosted jump allowing you to leap 
over opponents, bypass hazards and discover new routes.

- **Cleric**
The embodiment of serenity and calm, with unshakeable 
faith the Cleric can protect themselves from all 
hazards for a short period of time through their Holy shield.  
Trigger this ability to make yourself invulnerable to 
environmental, player and non-players hazards.

_____________

**New Level**

**IP Collaboration: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles**

<u>Turtle Tumble</u>

Slip, slide and tumble through the sewers as you race to get home to the Turtles Lair.  Avoid the Foot Clan who will try to block your progress and bump you off the path. Grab a slice of pizza on the way to boost your speed and take advantage of the shortcuts to beat the rest of your friends.

With this brand new level we are introducing some new hazards to avoid and power-ups to collect:
- Avoid Foot Clan ninjas, if you hit them they will send you off your path and slow you down.
- Pick up slides of Pizza to receive a speed boost.  
-- Each Pizza slice will speed you up helping you to go faster and jump further.

![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 16.18.16.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_16_18_16_826037625e.png)

_________

**New Level**

<u>Legendary Laser Dash</u>

Legendary Laser Dash is the second level of this type that we are implementing in the game, and as the name suggests, it is based on Laser Dash.

In this level players will not only face Block Dash and Legendary Block Dash waves. A new variety of unique lasers waves have been introduced, while at the same time some moving lasers will spawn all over the place, making it harder to find a safe spot in the gameplay area. 

As time advances so does the difficulty. The amount of lasers increases progressively, starting with time orange lasers (normal ones) appear on the ground, then the green lasers (slowest ones) on the sides start to move and finally the blue lasers on the sides (which are the fastest).
In the last minute, two green lasers will appear on the ground, as the last challenge.

It can host 32 players, but It is particularly recommended for 16, 8 players (2nd and 3rd rounds)

Can you find out what the Pro-Moves for Legendary Laser Dash are?

![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 16.18.24.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_16_18_24_11179825ae.png)

_________

**New Level**

<u>Rush Hour Legendary</u>

Dive into the upgraded version of the beloved "Rush Hour" map, now elevated to Legendary status! This third Legendary map in our lineup introduces fresh challenges and thrilling new obstacles.

New Features and Obstacles:
- Fire Hydrants: Positioned at the sides, shooting water streams to push players off balance.
- Breakable Platforms: Stand too long, and they explode and disappear.
- TNT Boxes: Activate on contact to eliminate other players or use them as temporary platforms.
- Laser Vehicles: A more dangerous variant of the original cars, adding extra risk.
- Dynamic Portal: The car-spawning portal moves forward, progressively reducing the gameplay area.

Also, a surprise final challenge awaits for those who survive until the last minute. Can you make it?

Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping experience in Rush Hour: Legendary Edition! 

![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 16.18.34.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_16_18_34_4e9d13ab77.png)

_________

**New Level**

**IP Collaboration: SpongeBob Square Pants**

<u>SpongeBob Dash</u>

SpongeBob Dash is a new version of Block Dash set in the SpongeBob Squarepants universe.
It features the familiar mechanics of Block Dash with some new additions.
- The level takes place aboard the Flying Dutchman’s ghost ship.
- Waves will spawn explosives that detonate upon collision with players.
- Some wooden planks on the floor are fragile and can be destroyed by explosions.
- A water current spawns periodically, alternating between pushing players to the left and right.

The Flying Dutchman himself stands at the helm, bringing with him a new set of toys to make players life a living hell
- Chest:
-- Closed Chest: The size of a regular block. Slightly pushes players.
-- Open Chest: Two blocks high. Players need to jump twice to pass over it.
- Barrel:
-- Rotating Barrel: Pushes players on contact.
-- Explosive Barrel: Detonates upon contact with players. The explosion destroys the floor.
- Bouncing Net: Causes players to stumble on contact.
- Lighting Wall: Kills players on contact.

Will you survive until the end?

![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 16.29.47.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_16_29_47_f857bfc2e2.png)
__________

**New Level**

<u>Stumble & Seek</u>

Dive into a thrilling game of hide and seek in the world of Stumble Guys. In this exhilarating new Map, players split into two teams: Hiders and Seekers. The twist? Hiders disguise themselves as everyday objects within the construction site, blending seamlessly into their surroundings to evade capture.

- Experience a single round of intense hide and seek where Seekers hunt down cleverly disguised Hiders.
- As a Hider, transform into various props like barrels, signs, or tools, and switch between forms to outsmart Seekers. Beware, you'll need to change shape periodically, which could blow your cover!
- Set in a bustling construction site, similar to Construction Climb, this map challenges you to spot the out-of-place or suspiciously moving props. 
- Keep your eyes peeled for clues like unexpected smoke signals that reveal the Hiders' positions.
- Every 45 seconds, Hiders face a forced transformation, marked by a dramatic smoke explosion, adding a layer of challenge to their stealth tactics.

Get ready to blend, disguise, and seek your way to victory in the Stumble & Seek Map. Whether you’re blending in or sniffing out, this game promises excitement and surprises at every turn!

![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 16.18.52.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_16_18_52_018ed9398c.png)

________

**New Level**

<u>Stumble Rumble</u>

A new take on elimination - introducing brawling!
Take part in this chaotic PVP experience in a dynamic arena that crumbles over time!  Arm yourself with weapons and knock your enemies out! 
But beware! You are also everyone else’s target! Watch out for those 3 precious lives, because when you run out you'll be eliminated from the round!

<u>Weapons</u>

**Boxing Glove** - The faithful punch and default ability. Great for hitting 
a bunch of times, but less impactful than the other weapons.

**Baseball Bat** - A more precise large hit, which can send enemies high 
into the sky. The cooldown is a little longer on this one though, 
so make your hit count!

**Hammer Spin** - Spin into a frenzy with the ability to knock multiple 
enemies at a time. This weapon will require some skill to use, as 
predicting enemy movements will be your goal here. Just watch out, 
and don't fall from the arena as you spin!

**Golden Glove** - This weapon is meant for eliminating. The presence of the 
golden glove strikes fear into opponents, with its high powered hit and 
charge. However, it is up to the wielder to remain cautious while using.

![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 16.19.03.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_16_19_03_83841b60cb.png)

________

**New Level**

<u>Stumble Up 2</u>

Are you ready to ascend once again? Introducing Stumble Up 2, the next installment of the beloved Stumble Up high-rise challenge!

In this sequel, the very fabric of Space-Time has been torn apart, unleashing complete chaos across the course. With new obstacles and surprises, it stays true to the vertical, fast-paced action that Stumblers all around the world have come to love.

Set in a vibrant, sci-fi-inspired environment, Stumble Up 2 is a race through a gravity-defying world. The course features floating platforms, suspended structures, and stunning intergalactic backdrops filled with neon lights and futuristic elements. From towering spires to floating spaceports, every section of this level feels like a leap into the unknown.

You'll need to navigate across floating beams, jumping from one gravity-defying structure to another, all while maintaining balance on shifting platforms. With a host of tricky pathways, this race will challenge even the most seasoned Stumblers.

Do you have what it takes to make it to the top?

![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 16.19.12.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_16_19_12_85b599fc9a.png)

_________

**New Level**

<u>Battle Dash Teams</u>

Get ready for an epic showdown in **Battle Dash Teams**, a brand-new team-based experience that brings a competitive twist to the classic Block Dash formula. In this unique mode, 8 players are divided into two teams, battling on separate fields to outlast both block dash waves and rival team attacks!

**Survive and Attack:** Use your skills to dodge waves of blocks while collecting **Sword Block Pickups to charge your team’s attack bar.** Once charged, unleash powerful attacks against the opposing team to disrupt their survival strategy!

Two Types of Pickups: Keep an eye out for **Silver and Gold Sword Blocks**—each with different point values— to quickly fill your attack bar and launch devastating effects on your rivals.

The intensity ramps up as the game progresses, starting with easier waves and gradually introducing more complex patterns and attack combinations. This one-round mode is designed to challenge even the most experienced players!

![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 16.19.18.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_16_19_18_26dd0f97b1.png)

Six Powerful Attacks: Collect enough pickups, and your team can unleash one of six randomized attacks to wreak havoc on the opposing field:

**Banana Rain:** Bananas fall from the sky, creating 
random chaos as players slip and stumble 
on the rival's platform.

**Twister:** A tornado zigzags across the enemy 
platform, bouncing players into the air—use it 
to disrupt their movement or even give yourself 
a tactical advantage.

**Explosive Robo-Chickens:** Does this need an explanation?
A cannon appears on the enemy’s side, launching explosive 
Robo-Chickens that detonate after a short time, 
pushing players around the field.

**Stellar Wind:** A strong wind gust sweeps 
players to the right, forcing them to fight 
against the current while dodging blocks.

**Laser Ring:** A massive ring of static lasers 
moves from front to back—touch a laser, 
and you're instantly sent into spectator mode!

**Tracer Beam:** A laser beam chases the 
closest player, stunning them if 
they get caught in its path.

Battle Dash Teams is not just about surviving—it's about outsmarting your opponents with teamwork, strategy, and the clever use of attacks. Will your team come out on top? Jump in and find out!

_____________

**New Level**

<u>Block Dash Rush</u>

Welcome to Block Dash Rush, the latest addition to the Block Dash family! This race map takes elements from the classic Block Dash elimination level and combines them with elements from Laser Dash (such as moving blocks, breakable platforms, and deadly lasers, etc.) to make a thrilling experience! 

Fans of Block Dash can now experience the chaos of dodging obstacles, but with a racing twist—where speed and precision are the keys to victory.

Set high above a neon-lit cyberpunk cityscape, Block Dash Rush reuses iconic obstacles from both Block Dash and Laser Dash—like moving blocks, breakable platforms, and lasers—creating an intense race to the finish line.

The difficulty starts off manageable, but escalates with every stretch, combining multiple challenges that will push players to their limits. Do you have what it takes to out-dash your competitors and claim bragging rights as the fastest Block Dasher?

![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 16.19.28.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_16_19_28_9df840e4bb.png)

____________

**Additional New Levels**

Additionally, in this update, we are introducing several exciting new levels to the rotation. Be ready to stumble into unique challenges and gameplay experiences across a variety of themes and mechanics. Here’s the full list of additional levels available:

- Crab’s Landing
- Monopoly Rush
- Don’t Be Jelly!
- Turbo Temple
- Space Drop
- Space Droooooop
- MrBeast’s Dangerous Traps
- Bucket Mayhem
- Ice & Fire Fumble
- Dart to Finish!
- Hot Wheels Yeti Run
- Team Block Dash

________

**New Gameplay Feature**

<u>Teams</u>

Wait, What?  
Yes, that’s right! NOW YOU CAN PLAY A VARIETY OF LEVELS  IN TEAMS!

**Elimination Levels**

In ELIMINATION LEVELS, if one of your teammates gets eliminated, fear not! The newly crafted orbs will allow you to respawn them back into the game to keep the battle going! Here is how it works:

- A maximum of two (2) respawn orbs will appear on the map.
- Each respawn orb appears in a random place of the map
- Each respawn happens in a random amount of time after the last one was collected with a maximum of 12 seconds.
- Collecting orbs will bring back players in the same order they have been eliminated, so they always come back in the same order they were eliminated (first out - first in)
- You can collect orbs even if all your teammates are alive in order to make it more difficult for your rival teams to survive.

**Race Levels**

For RACE LEVELS, there are no respawning orbs. Instead, your team’s qualification is determined by your collective team position in the race. The quicker your team finishes, the better your chances of advancing to the next round!

- **Points System:** Every position in the game earns your team points.
- **How to Qualify:** Your team needs to collect enough points to be in the top half. To move on to the next round, your team must be better than at least half of the teams competing.
- **Leaderboard Changes:** As players finish, points are added to teams' totals, which can change your team's rank in real-time. 
- **End of Round:** The game round ends when there aren’t enough points left for any team below the cutoff to catch up. This means once it’s impossible for other teams to qualify, the round automatically stops.

___________

**New Gameplay Feature**

<u>Endless Mode </u>

You asked for it, and we delivered! Welcome to the thrilling world of **Endless Mode Laser Tracer AND Rush Hour!** These revamped levels introduce a unique endless mechanic, meaning the challenge continues as long as players remain alive. Here's what you can expect from this exciting update:

- **Endless Survival:** The level doesn't stop until the last player is eliminated. Test your endurance and see how long you can outlast your opponents in this never-ending laser dodging frenzy.
- **Dynamic Skybox:** Experience the passage of time with a new dynamic skybox that changes as you play. Watch the sky evolve from dawn to dusk, adding a visually immersive element to your endless run.
- **Remodeled Map:** Both levels have been meticulously remodeled for a smoother and more enjoyable experience. Navigate the arena with improved aesthetics and fluidity.

![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 16.19.48.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_16_19_48_b452563259.png)

____________

**New Feature**

<u>Play Center</u>

With this update we’re introducing Play Center, a new hub that brings together different game experiences offered in Stumble Guys. Here, you’ll see new game modes daily, with sections for Featured Events, Discover Events, and Time Trials Events. Play Center is your one-stop shop for all your favorite Stumble Guys game modes!

Whenever a new event appears in the game, it will be hidden under covered tiles. Click on these tiles to reveal the event and earn XP for each tile you uncover.

![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 16.19.58.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_16_19_58_17a1445616.png)

Once uncovered, the Event Thumbnail will be revealed, which will provide you with key information to help you quickly grasp the essential details of the event
- Bottom Right: Current number of players participating in the event.
- Middle: Event name and your progress on a leaderboard or milestone.
- Top Left: Event timer and any reward multipliers.
- Top Right: Game mode and team size for team events.

The Play Center will display for you a variety of game modes, each providing a distinct experience:
- Original: 32 players, 3 rounds
- Showdown: 8 players, 1 round
- Duel: 2 players, 1 round
- Clash: 4 players, 3 rounds
- Turbo: 16 players, 3 rounds
- Blitz: 32 players, 1 round 

Game modes involving teams may have specific variations. 

Once you select a game mode, a Info Screen will Pop-up providing detailed information about the event, including:

- Tags: Key details like the game mode, available rewards, and more.
- Round Information: Shows the number of rounds and the maps you'll play.
- Progression/Leaderboard: Displays your progress or leaderboard status, with an option to view more or less detail.
- Play Buttons: Includes options to "Play" and "Play with Friends," making it easy to join and enjoy the event with others. This pop-up ensures you're fully informed and ready to engage with each event.

![Screenshot 2024-11-07 at 16.20.13.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Screenshot_2024_11_07_at_16_20_13_732f81f638.png)

__________

**Cosmetics**

Unleash your style with a brand-new collection of cosmetics! This update brings a wide variety of fresh options, including dazzling skins, vibrant footsteps, and powerful new special emotes. Whether you're looking to stand out or add an extra edge to your moves, there's something for every Stumbler in this exciting lineup.

**New Special Emote:**

<u>D20 Roll [SPECIAL]</u>
- Are you feeling lucky?  Roll for initiative! Take your lucky D20 for a spin with an all new emote, roll the dice and see what number appears! Bowl down your opponents as you try your luck. Will it be unlucky number 1? Or will you get a critical roll with a 20!

<u>Power Jump [SPECIAL]</u>
- Do you have trouble making that one jump?  Need a last minute boost when jumping? Say no more! This new Special Emote is for you!  
- With the power jump you will be able to jump higher and further by performing a boosted jump.
- The Power Jump enables you to reach greater heights than a standard jump allows.
- You can bridge wide gaps by either executing a regular jump followed by a Power Jump or vice versa. The choice is yours based on the situation.
- Unlike standard jumps that can propel you forward, the Power Jump solely increases your vertical height. So, if you execute only a Power Jump, your character will ascend without moving horizontally.
- If you've already gained horizontal velocity from a standard jump, the Power Jump will amplify your vertical leap without altering your horizontal movement.
- If you initiate with a Power Jump followed by a standard jump, you'll gain additional height. However, you can still introduce horizontal velocity when executing the standard jump.

- 66 NEW EMOTES including Common, Uncommon and Legendary rarities!
- 63 NEW FOOTSTEPS from all rarities!
- 46 NEW TAUNT ANIMATION (Rare, Epic and Legendary)
- 50 NEW VICTORY ANIMATIONS from all rarities!
- 240 NEW STUMBLERS, including:
-- 2 Common + 8 Uncommon
-- 29 Rare
-- 62 Epic
-- 66 Legendary
-- 49 Mythic
-- 24 Special

______

**Bug fixes**


These are some of the most relevant bug fixes in this release:

- **Loop in Map Selection:** Resolved issue where users could get stuck in an endless loop in the Map Selection Carousel in split-screen mode on Xbox.
- **Event IAM Navigation:** Fixed issue where the L-Stick functionality was lost upon accepting an Events IAM in the events lobby on PS4/PS5.
- **Crossplay Icon Display:** Corrected display of crossplay icons for friends across platforms.
- **Title Screen Crash:** Addressed a bug causing crashes on pressing any button at the title screen on multiple platforms.
- **Game Suspend Stability:** Resolved crashes occurring when resuming the game from a suspended state on Xbox and PlayStation consoles.
- **Missing Controller Prompts:** Fixed missing navigation prompts in the top left corner during Controller Bindings on Xbox and PlayStation.
- **Split-Screen HUD:** Corrected issue in split-screen mode where only the "stumble name" displayed rather than PSN ID and console icon.
- **Custom Party Join Error:** Fixed error preventing Custom Game party creation if a player was added to a local party.
- **Network Check Language Update:** Updated terminology in the ‘Network Check’ error message to correctly label PlayStation systems instead of generic “device.”
- **Shop Display Issue:** Resolved issue where discounts were not reflected correctly for promotional items in the Nintendo Switch shop.
- **Visual Artifacts in Shop:** Fixed artifacts displayed briefly after exiting the Shop’s "Offers" and "Gems" tabs on Nintendo Switch.
- **Button Conflict on Controller Bindings:** Resolved inconsistent behavior in Controller Bindings menu when assigning previously bound buttons to new functions.
- **Leaderboard Status Inaccuracy:** Corrected inaccurate display of friends’ online/offline status in parties and leaderboards.
- **Conflict Alerts for Emote Assignments:** Resolved issues with button conflict alerts in the Controller Bindings when attempting to assign emotes.
- **Trophy/Achievement Tracking:** Corrected issue where Battlepass refresh affected progress tracking for achievements on Xbox and PlayStation.
- **Emote Menu Resizing Issue:** Fixed visual stretch on the emote menu button in active gameplay after custom key binding on PlayStation consoles.
- **Infinite Loading on Region Change:** Fixed infinite loading that occurred when switching server regions following network disconnects.
- **Localized Text for Button Conflict Prompts:** Resolved missing translations in multiple languages for the “button conflict” alert in the Controller Bindings menu on PlayStation.
- **Artifact Screen Issue:** Addressed issue with brief blue screens on Nintendo Switch following the "Press any button" screen.
- **Key Bind Reset After Relaunch:** Fixed issue where custom key bindings reset after restarting the game on PS4/PS5.
- **Add Friend Button Label:** Corrected mislabeling of the “Add Friend” button in the Recently Played tab on PlayStation.
- **Null Reference Error in Collectibles:** Addressed rare null reference error in collectible tracking on various consoles.
- **Event Completion and Reward Issue:** Resolved cases where rewards were not granted upon event completion.
- **Frame Rate Drops on Select Maps:** Improved stability and FPS on Xbox One in multi-player modes for “Blaster Base,” “Hot Wheels Yeti Run,” and “Scaffold Stumble.”
- **Clear Button Display Issue:** Fixed placement issues for the Clear button in Controller Bindings on Xbox.
- **Unresponsive AI in Spectate Mode:** Resolved issue where AI would appear unresponsive during spectate mode on "Blaster Base."
- **UI Misalignment in Victory Screen:** Corrected overlapping elements in the victory screen on specific maps.
- **Key Binding Menu Issue:** Fixed cases where same button could be bound to multiple concurrent actions in the Controller Bindings.
- **Custom Game Join Error:** Corrected error message displayed when trying to join a crossplay party with a local user on Nintendo Switch.
- **Menu Transitions Freeze:** Addressed cases where resuming from the console’s sleep mode could cause the main menu to freeze on all platforms.

And many other fixes to enhance gameplay, stability, and user experience across all platforms.

attributes.title: Block Dash Remastered is HERE!
attributes.overview: Are you ready to take on the ultimate Block Dash experience? Block Dash Remastered is here, bringing a fresh new look and a thrilling update with brand-new wave patterns to challenge Stumblers of all skill levels! Whether you’re a Block Dash beginner or a seasoned pro, this remaster is packed with exciting updates that are sure to keep you on your toes. Let’s dive into everything you can expect!
attributes.content:
Are you ready to take on the ultimate Block Dash experience? Block Dash Remastered is here, bringing a fresh new look and a thrilling update with brand-new wave patterns to challenge Stumblers of all skill levels! Whether you’re a Block Dash beginner or a seasoned pro, this remaster is packed with exciting updates that are sure to keep you on your toes. Let’s dive into everything you can expect!
________
**Fresh Visuals to Amp Up the Action**

First up, you’ll notice that Block Dash has undergone a serious glow-up! The remastered version features stunning graphics, vibrant colors, and smoother animations, creating an immersive and dynamic experience. Every dash, dodge, and jump now feels more alive, with enhanced visuals that bring the world of Block Dash to life in ways you’ve never seen before.

**10 New Wave Patterns to Test Your Skills**

Block Dash Remastered introduces 10 unique wave patterns, each crafted to test your agility, timing, and adaptability. From simple sequences that will ease you into the action to high-speed, complex formations that demand lightning-fast reflexes, these waves are designed to keep every player challenged. The variety in patterns means that no two rounds are ever quite the same, making each run through Block Dash a fresh experience.

**Varied Difficulty for Every Stumbler**

In Block Dash Remastered, the difficulty ramps up with each wave, offering a steady increase in challenge as you progress. Whether you’re just starting out or a seasoned Block Dash pro, these new patterns will push you to your limits!

**Will You Master the Remaster?**

The updated Block Dash experience brings new energy to an already beloved level. It’s your chance to dodge, jump, and weave through a whole new set of obstacles in a visually stunning environment. Are you up to the challenge? With new waves, increased difficulty, and fresh visuals, Block Dash Remastered is ready to put your skills to the test.

**Classic Block Dash: Still Available for Fans**

For those who love the original Block Dash, don’t worry! The classic version will remain in the game, letting you switch back and enjoy the classic course whenever you like.

So, what are you waiting for? Jump in and experience the ultimate Block Dash adventure!

attributes.title: Battle Dash Teams is HERE!
attributes.overview: Get ready for Battle Dash Teams, the latest action-packed mode in Stumble Guys! This thrilling team-based twist on Block Dash pits 8 players in a head-to-head showdown, with each team fighting to survive and outsmart their rivals. Collect Sword Block Pickups to charge your attack bar and unleash powerful, randomized attacks like Banana Rain and Explosive Robo-Chickens on the opposing field. Dodge waves, strategize with your team, and adapt as the game progresses for an epic showdown! Jump into Battle Dash Teams now and lead your team to victory!
attributes.content:
**Battle Dash Teams: A New Era of Team-Based Mayhem in Stumble Guys!**

Ready for an epic showdown? Battle Dash Teams is here to bring a whole new level of intensity and strategy to the beloved Block Dash formula! Dive into this unique team-based mode where two teams of four face off, balancing survival and all-out attack. With powerful pickups, wild attacks, and ever-increasing chaos, only the most strategic team will prevail!

**How It Works: Survive, Attack, and Outsmart**

In Battle Dash Teams, two teams of four players are placed on separate fields. Each team must not only dodge waves of incoming blocks but also collect Sword Block Pickups that charge their attack bar. Once it’s fully charged, get ready to unleash a storm of attacks on your opponents, breaking up their strategy and giving your team the advantage!

**Two Types of Pickups: Silver and Gold**

Keep an eye out for both Silver and Gold Sword Blocks—each contributes different points toward filling your attack bar. Collecting the right combination of these blocks will ensure your attack bar fills up faster, allowing your team to release havoc-inducing moves on the opposition.

**The Heat Builds: Progressively Challenging Waves**

Don’t let your guard down! The game starts off manageable, but as it progresses, block waves become increasingly difficult to dodge, with faster patterns and trickier angles. By the time the final waves roll in, it’s a full-blown test of endurance and teamwork, demanding the best from every player.

**Six Game-Changing Attacks**

Build up your attack bar to unleash one of six randomized attacks on your opponents. Each attack is designed to disrupt the opposing team’s survival tactics, offering your side a tactical edge:
- Banana Rain: Bananas fall from the sky, creating random chaos as players slip and stumble on the rival's platform.
- Twister: A tornado zigzags across the enemy platform, bouncing players into the air—use it to disrupt their movement or even give yourself a tactical advantage.
- Explosive Robo-Chickens: Does this need an explanation? A cannon appears on the enemy’s side, launching explosive Robo-Chickens that detonate after a short time, pushing players around the field.
- Stellar Wind: A strong wind gust sweeps players to the right, forcing them to fight against the current while dodging blocks.
- Laser Ring: A massive ring of static lasers moves from front to back—touch a laser, and you're instantly sent into spectator mode!
- Tracer Beam: A laser beam chases the closest player, stunning them if they get caught in its path.

**Strategy and Teamwork Are Key**

Battle Dash Teams is more than just a survival game—it's a test of strategy and teamwork. With coordinated efforts, clever use of pickups, and timely attacks, you can disrupt your opponents and outlast the chaos.

Are you ready to dive in and lead your team to victory? The battle begins in Battle Dash Teams—jump in, team up, and let the games begin!

attributes.title: BUG FIXES - Stumble Update 0.79.5
attributes.overview: Our latest update resolves key gameplay issues for a smoother Stumble Guys experience. Fixes include smoother ability use, no more stuck players in Block Dash, improved frame rates, and corrections in Custom Matches and Block Dash Teams group sizes. We've also addressed content purchase, reward claims, and removed the 'Leaderboard' icon after season end. Enjoy the updates and stumble on!
attributes.content:
Hey Stumblers!
As promised, the team has been working hard to prioritize and fix some of the most important issues you’ve been reporting. We’ve just released a patch to address these bugs and improve stability.

**0.79.5 BUG FIXES** 
- Resolved the issue that prevented the player from jumping over the double block wall using the Bouncing Ball Ability.
- Fixed an issue where using the Punch Ability while dashing would break the character’s momentum.
- Fixed an issue where the Punch Ability allowed the player to jump over two line blocks.
- Fixed an issue that prevented players from clutching in Block Dash and its variants.
- Resolved the issue that was causing the player to get stuck between the double blocks in Block Dash.
- Resolved an issue that was causing frame rate drops and lag in certain levels.
- Fixed an issue where players would get stuck before entering a Custom Match.
- Fixed an issue where an additional member was added to the group of 4 in the 3rd round of Block Dash Teams.
- Fixed an issue that prevented players from receiving purchased content.
- Fixed an issue where players were unable to claim some rewards after requesting them.
- Resolved an issue where the 'Leaderboard' icon would still appear after the Season had ended.

attributes.title: Mr. Stumble's Nightland Escape - Let's Collect 1 Billion Stars Together!
attributes.overview: To make it through this spooky season, we need to collect 1 BILLION STARS all together in Stumble Guys!
attributes.content:
To make it through this spooky season, we need to collect **1 BILLION STARS** all together in Stumble Guys!

Upon reaching this milestone before the deadline, TWO extraordinary rewards await!
- At 500 Million Stars, everyone who contributes will receive 3 Prize Boxes! 
- If we hit 1 Billion Stars before the deadline, everyone who helped will unlock the Stumble Reaper Skin!  

In the spooky world of Stumble Guys, Mr. Stumble has misplaced his Stars across the Stumbleverse, and he needs your help to get them back before Halloween ends! 
So get your costumes ready and start collecting those Stars! Let’s show the Stumbleverse who the real Halloween heroes are.

- Play at least 1 game with Stars as game rewards to be eligible (Ranked Games, Normal Games, Daily Missions, Weekly Missions, and Events)

- View the progress on the [Website](https://www.stumbleguys.com/community). It will be updated every day!  

- Deadline to unlock the 1 Billion Star Prize: **4 November 2024**

- You will be able to collect the rewards directly in the game at the end of the event


Important note: Console players won't be able to participate in this event. We are so sorry about it! For future Milestone Events we'll try to involve console players, so all Stumblers can participate.

attributes.title: 0.79 Patch Notes - Welcome to the Nightland!
attributes.overview: Welcome to Patch 0.79! This update is packed with exciting gameplay experiences, including two new versions of our beloved Block Dash! We know how much you love this classic, and we’ve taken it to the next level with remastered visuals and an all-new team-based mode that will test your skills and strategy like never before.
attributes.content:
Welcome to Patch 0.79! This update is packed with exciting gameplay experiences, including two new versions of our beloved Block Dash! We know how much you love this classic, and we’ve taken it to the next level with remastered visuals and an all-new team-based mode that will test your skills and strategy like never before.

In this patch, we’re celebrating Block Dash with fresh twists and thrilling new ways to challenge yourself and your team. Whether you're a solo player looking to master the obstacles or part of a team fighting for survival, this update is sure to keep you on your toes.

**NEW LEVELS **
<u> Block Dash Remastered</u>

Block Dash has had an exciting upgrade! This remastered version not only gives the level a fresh new look but also introduces new wave patterns designed to challenge both newcomers and seasoned players alike.

- Fresh Visuals: Dash through a visually enhanced course with stunning new graphics, vibrant colors, and smoother animations that bring the world of Block Dash to life like never before.
- New Wave Patterns: Prepare for 10 all-new wave formations, each designed to test your agility, timing, and adaptability. These waves range from simple block sequences to complex, high-speed patterns that require precision and quick thinking.
- Varied Difficulty: With waves of increasing difficulty, this remastered version keeps players on their toes as the challenge ramps up round by round. Whether you’re just starting out or a seasoned Block Dash pro, these new patterns will push you to your limits!

Get ready to dodge, jump, and weave through the blocks in this remastered Block Dash experience. Will you become the master or the remaster? 

Note: The classic Block Dash level will remain in the game as well for you to enjoy the classic version whenever you want.

<u>Battle Dash Teams</u>

Get ready for an epic showdown in Battle Dash Teams, a brand-new team-based experience that brings a competitive twist to the classic Block Dash formula. In this unique mode, 8 players are divided into two teams, battling on separate fields to outlast both block dash waves and rival team attacks!

Survive and Attack: Use your skills to dodge waves of blocks while collecting Sword Block Pickups to charge your team’s attack bar. Once charged, unleash powerful attacks against the opposing team to disrupt their survival strategy!

Two Types of Pickups: Keep an eye out for Silver and Gold Sword Blocks—each with different point values— to quickly fill your attack bar and launch devastating effects on your rivals.

The intensity ramps up as the game progresses, starting with easier waves and gradually introducing more complex patterns and attack combinations. This one-round mode is designed to challenge even the most experienced players!

**Six Powerful Attacks**: Collect enough pickups, and your team can unleash one of six randomized attacks to wreak havoc on the opposing field:
- Banana Rain: Bananas fall from the sky, creating random chaos as players slip and stumble on the rival's platform.
- Twister: A tornado zigzags across the enemy platform, bouncing players into the air—use it to disrupt their movement or even give yourself a tactical advantage.
- Explosive Robo-Chickens: Does this need an explanation? A cannon appears on the enemy’s side, launching explosive Robo-Chickens that detonate after a short time, pushing players around the field.
- Stellar Wind: A strong wind gust sweeps players to the right, forcing them to fight against the current while dodging blocks.
- Laser Ring: A massive ring of static lasers moves from front to back—touch a laser, and you're instantly sent into spectator mode!
- Tracer Beam: A laser beam chases the closest player, stunning them if they get caught in its path.

Battle Dash Teams is not just about surviving—it's about outsmarting your opponents with teamwork, strategy, and the clever use of attacks. Will your team come out on top? Jump in and find out!

**STUMBLE PASS **
<u>Bonus Page</u>

Once all the standard rewards are claimed, players will unlock an extra bonus page where they can continue spending Stumble Pass Tokens on high-value rewards. This page remains locked until all prior rewards are collected, adding an extra layer of excitement for completionists.

 Important Note! Not all players will see this feature in their Stumble Passes, as we are currently testing this update in select regions. If you’re one of the lucky players who have access to the Bonus Page, we’d love to hear your feedback!
 
**NIGHTLAND SEASON**
The new Nightland Season promises to be loaded with rewards and multiple ways to earn them!

There are two main ways to earn rewards:
- Collect LTC Chickens early in the season by participating in special events, completing missions, and progressing through the Battle Pass. These LTCs can be used to spin exclusive wheels in the shop, which will feature Halloween-themed content. Additional LTC can be earned by watching ads or purchasing with Gems.
- Nightland Boxes: These reward boxes contain new cosmetic skins, ability tokens, and other cosmetics. They can be earned through featured events, tournaments, missions, and by advancing in the Battle Pass. A new prize box is available each week, aligned with the season’s major events.


**COSMETICS**
<u>Emotes</u>
- Bad Dreams [Common]
- Cooked [Common]
- Djinni Wink [Uncommon]
- Ghosted [Common]
- Kawaiimp [Common]
- Moai [Uncommon]
- Resting Fairy Face [Common]
- Sad Nightmare [Uncommon]

<u>Footsteps</u>
- Corruption [Legendary]
- Creepy Hands [Epic]
- Paranormal Energy [Epic]
- Scratches [Rare]
- Tarot [Uncommon]
- Thorny Orchids [Rare]
- Yellow Ducks [Uncommon]

<u>Stumblers</u>
- Mr. Fresh [Mythic]
- Cigi [Special]
- Coco [Rare]
- Corrupted Caelion [Legendary]
- Corrupted Luminara [Legendary]
- Corrupted Florian [Epic]
- Fluff [Epic]
- Impy [Epic]
- Demogorchid [Legendary]
- DJ Mummy [Legendary]
- Jackie [Epic]
- Fire Djinni [Mythic]
- Granny Gloom [Mythic]
- Giga Jack [Epic]
- Esme' the Fortune Teller [Uncommon]
- Charming Jen [Special]
- Joss [Rare]
- Nightmare [Special]
- Nightmare Shaman [Rare]
- Pink Diamond Banana [Special]
- Ringmaster Leonidas [Epic]
- JestR-9 [Epic]
- Shower Gal [Uncommon]
- Dan Danger [Mythic]
- White Death [Legendary]

<u>Taunt Animations</u>
- Clown Sign [Epic]
- Imp Dance [Rare]
- Kiss of Death [Legendary]
- Nightmare Pal [Mythic]
- Taming Lions [Epic]
- Towel Slap [Epic]

<u>Victory Animations</u>
- Crystal Ball [Rare]
- Dark Fire Show [Legendary]
- Enchanting DJ Set [Legendary]
- Guitar Slam [Epic]

**BUG FIXES **
Patch 0.79 bugs fixes focused on enhancing gameplay stability, performance, and user experience, as part of our ongoing effort to improve gameplay and ensure a more stable and enjoyable experience. Here’s a breakdown of the most notable fixes:

<u>Gameplay</u>
- Fixed an issue where the game would become unresponsive if the user backgrounded the app or switched tabs after completing round one in normal gameplay.
- Resolved a crash that occurred when entering the Stumble Rumble Tournament on iOS devices sometimes.
- Fixed a crash that occurred when navigating through the lobby sections sometimes.
- Resolved an issue where users encountered an error pop-up while matchmaking in Ranked Mode in some cases..
- The ‘Play’ button in Normal Party has been fixed and is now functional.
- Addressed an issue where players would get stuck on the reward screen after completing a ranked match, ensuring rewards are now correctly claimed.

<u>User Interface and Party</u>
- Fixed an issue where the WebGL game would get stuck on the Assets Download screen while attempting to log in via Scopely ID.
- Resolved issues where Ranked Mode matchmaking would fail, ensuring players can now successfully enter ranked gameplay in WebGL.
- Fixed an issue where the game would not execute multiplayer steps correctly in Custom Party setups, allowing smoother transitions into gameplay in WebGL.
- Resolved issues related to XP being gained after completing a Custom Party match, aligning with intended gameplay mechanics in WebGL.
- Resolved a DataDog error triggered when an ability slot was left empty, preventing further issues.
- Fixed an issue where the game became unresponsive after players pressed the left button in Party Mode.
- Fixed an issue where players were unable to merge parties through the suitability merging system.

attributes.title: The Nightland Season is Bursting with Wild Rewards!
attributes.overview: Get ready to dive into the Stumble Guys Nightland Season, packed with thrilling rewards and spooky surprises! This season introduces two exciting ways to earn rewards: LTC Chickens and Nightland Boxes. Collect LTC Chickens through special events, missions, and the Battle Pass to spin exclusive Halloween-themed wheels in the shop. Don't miss out on Nightland Boxes, filled with brand-new cosmetic skins, ability tokens, and other cosmetics. Unlock these by joining featured events, completing missions, and advancing through the Battle Pass. Stay tuned for a weekly prize box tied to the season’s key events!
attributes.content:
The Nightland Season is Bursting with Wild Rewards!

This new season is shaping up to be one of the most exciting yet, packed with an abundance of rewards that are sure to keep you on your toes! 

We’re thrilled to bring you not one but two amazing ways to earn rewards throughout the Nightland season!

First up, you’ll be able to collect LTC Chickens early in the season by playing special events, completing missions, and advancing through the Battle Pass. These LTCs can be used to spin exclusive wheels in the shop, featuring spooky Halloween-themed content. If you're running low on LTC, don’t worry! You can also grab more in the shop by watching ads or purchasing with Gems throughout the season.

But that’s not all! We’re also introducing the brand new Nightland Boxes. These boxes are packed with exciting rewards, including 3 brand-new cosmetic skins, ability tokens, and other cosmetics. You can earn these boxes by participating in featured events, and tournaments, completing missions, and progressing in the Battle Pass. Expect a prize box each week, tied to the season’s main events!

We can’t wait for you to dive into all the fun and start unlocking these awesome rewards!

attributes.title: Exclusive Creator Content - Meet MangYellow and Grab His Bundle!
attributes.overview: Hey Stumblers! To celebrate the launch of exclusive MangYellow bundles, available for a limited time, we’re diving into the world of MangYellow! Grab his handpicked gear in-game and check out his top tips to becoming a Stumble Guys creator!
attributes.content:
Hey Stumblers! To celebrate the launch of exclusive MangYellow bundles, available for a limited time, we’re diving into the world of MangYellow! Grab his handpicked gear in-game and check out his top tips to becoming a Stumble Guys creator!

<u>Can you briefly introduce yourself to our players?</u>
- Hello everyone Stumble Guys lovers! I am one of Content Creator and my name is MangYellow.

<u>How long have you been a content creator/streamer?</u>
- I start to create Stumble Guys Content since 2021. Its been 3 years!

<u>What is your biggest accomplishment in Stumble Guys as a player?</u>
- My biggest accomplishment this year in Stumble Guys is able to finish Stumble UP 1 and 2. hehe.. But my accomplishment for real is being able to gather many players to play Stumble Guys together

<u>What do you like the most about Stumble Guys?</u>
- The thing I like most when playing stumble guys is probably playing block dash with my viewers

<u>What is your favourite skin/emote/etc?</u>
- Favorite things in stumble guys, of course the dynamitron skin, punch emote and map Block Dash

<u>What is a good memory you have from Stumble Guys in your life?</u>
- Beautiful memories of playing Stumble Guys is when I got my first special skin, which is Dynamitron

<u>Do you have advice you want to give to new players?</u>
- A suggestion for new players might be to watch your favorite streamer to find out tips and tricks then invite your friends to play together

<u>Favourite IP introduced into the game?</u>
- My favorite IP is probably the newest one, Transformers because the skins are cool and there are animated changes to the gameplay

<u>Can you share what initially drew you to create content specifically for Stumble Guys?</u>
- I'm interested in creating content because I see that the Stumble Guys game has high potential in terms of gameplay, multiplayer and also lots of skins and features on the game.

<u>What does your content creation process look like for Stumble Guys? How do you plan and execute your ideas?</u>
- To look for content ideas, I usually follow existing trends or find interesting things during live stream stumble guys

<u>Could you describe one or two of your favorite pieces of content that you’ve made for Stumble Guys and what made them special?</u>
- One special content is the compilation content where I got several special skins, because I managed to get a special skin from the wheel and of course because the audience reached more than 100 million

<u>What are your future plans regarding content creation for Stumble Guys? - - Are there any new directions or concepts you’re excited to explore?</u>
- Future plans for my content are to increase content and relate the stumble guys game to current trends

<u>What advice would you give to someone who wants to start creating content for Stumble Guys?</u>
- Suggestions for beginner content creators stumble guys, maybe you can do livestreams consistently and make short or long videos by following existing trends

<u>Why did you pick these items for your curated bundle?</u>
- I choose this bundle because it suits my character, who is identical to the color yellow

<u>Where is the bundle available and for how long?</u>
- My bundle will be available in the shop with many offer options on October 17th for 3 weeks

<u>The link to your main channel</u>
- This is my <u>[youtube channel](https://youtube.com/@mangyellow?si=vKLFawx5fkpR5JS2)</u>  you can stop by and play Stumble Guys with me

<u>What is your creator code?</u>
- And finally, don't forget to use my code in the shop 'MangYellow'

Don’t miss out on MangYellow’s exclusive bundles—available for a short time only! And remember, use his creator code ‘MangYellow’ for extra goodies. Time to stumble like a pro!

attributes.title: Exciting News: Stumble Guys Series 2 Toys by PMI Are Here!
attributes.overview: We’re excited to introduce the latest release—Series 2 of Stumble Guys toys by PMI! Packed with fan-favorite characters and fresh additions, this collection will bring even more fun from the Stumble Guys universe to your playtime.
attributes.content:
We’re excited to introduce the latest release—Series 2 of Stumble Guys toys by PMI! Packed with fan-favorite characters and fresh additions, this collection will bring even more fun from the Stumble Guys universe to your playtime.


**Plush Collection**
 The cuddly plush collection is back in three different sizes, featuring these playful characters:
 - Robot Guy – Ready to stumble his way into your heart with his techy style and soft plush texture.
 - Boxing Roo – This energetic kangaroo is always prepared for a friendly competition.
 - Superbanana – Bringing his signature smug smile and superhero spirit to your plush crew.
![_FMF5453 (2024-08-19T08_27_26.039).jpg](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/FMF_5453_2024_08_19_T08_27_26_039_1f35945955.jpg)

**Action Figures**
 Take the excitement up a notch with our new action figures! Series 2 brings these favorites:
 - Robot Guy – looks like Mr Stumble, but as a robot!
 - Dusk Dragon – Elegant and fierce, this dragon is here to leave a lasting impression.
 - Stabby Kate – Small but fierce, she’s always ready for an exciting challenge.
 - Boxing Roo – With his agile moves, Boxing Roo never shies away from a test of skills.
 - Golden Sensei – A stunning gold chrome exclusive for collectors, adding a touch of wisdom to the collection.
 
 
![_FMF5639 (2024-08-19T08_28_11.564).jpg](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/FMF_5639_2024_08_19_T08_28_11_564_d4b4821dca.jpg)
**Mini Action Figurines**
 The mini action figurines collection is small but packed with personality! Along with the Series 2 stars, we’ve added:
 - Stumble Love – Full of charm and happiness, always spreading good vibes.
 - Swamp Troll – A bit grouchy but oddly lovable.
 - Yang – Ready to strike the perfect balance of action and calm.
 - Stumble Invaders – These quirky characters bring a fun twist from outer space.
 - Hazmat NBC – Standing by to protect and entertain!
 And, don’t miss Ruby Cupid, dazzling in red chrome—the cutest addition to the collection!
![_FMF5581 (2024-08-19T08_27_50.367).jpg](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/FMF_5581_2024_08_19_T08_27_50_367_8167634968.jpg)

**Clip-On Plush and Keychains**
Bring your favorite Stumblers with you everywhere with clip-on plushes and figural keychains—perfect for any backpack or key set!


**Obstacle Sets**
We’re also introducing brand-new obstacle sets to Series 2! Recreate the challenges of classic Stumble Guys maps with mini action figurines and iconic obstacles like the hammer, slider, or trampoline. It's time to bring the fun of the game to life!


Be sure to keep an eye out for Series 2 at your favorite stores. With plushies, action figures, and accessories, there’s a little something for every Stumble Guys fan. Get ready to dive into a world of fun with this awesome new collection!

attributes.title: How to Support Your Favorite Stumble Guys Content Creators with Creator Codes
attributes.overview: Have questions about supporting Stumble Guys content creators? This FAQ will show you how to do it effortlessly!
attributes.content:
Hey Stumblers!

Do you have a favorite Stumble Guys content creator? Did you know you can support them at no extra cost to you? Just use their Creator Code in-game and show your love while you play!

## What are Creator Codes?
Creator Codes are unique codes given to our top content creators. When you enter a Creator Code in the in-game shop, a small percentage of your purchase goes directly to the creator linked to that code. So, every time you make a purchase using a Creator Code, the creator earns a portion of the sales!

## How to Use a Creator Code
To start supporting a creator, go into the Stumble Guys in-game shop.
![unnamed (4).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_4_50b875344b.png)

Head to the Extras tab (all the way to the right of the shop).
![unnamed (5).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_5_473092905d.png)

You should see the "Support A Creator" section, where you can simply click the "Enter Code" button.

Once you click on the “Enter Code” button, simply type any Creator Code that you wish to use, and click “Enter”.
![unnamed (6).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_6_402332b361.png)
You should then see a popup confirming that you are now using that Creator Code.
![unnamed (7).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_7_c85759b78e.png)
Creator Codes have a time limit for how long they remain active in the shop. Some creators' codes are valid for 14 days, while others last for 7 days.

Remember to keep heading back to your in-game shop to re-enter a Creator Code after it expires!

If at any point you wish to use another Creator Code, simply press the “Stop” button.
![unnamed (8).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_8_78d87a630f.png)
Press “Yes” to confirm and you will see that the Creator Code is removed from your shop.
![unnamed (9).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/unnamed_9_73ea783afd.png)
You can now press “Enter Code” again to use another Creator Code.

## What Platforms Support Creator Codes?
Creator Codes are available across all platforms! You can enter them on Mobile, Steam, Web, and Console. Once you've applied a Creator Code on any of these platforms, any purchases made on our webstore using the same in-game name will also count towards the creator. This ensures the creator earns a small percentage of those sales too!

attributes.title: YOUR Workshop Maps are Now Featured in Events!
attributes.overview: Get ready for player-made Workshop Maps in Events!
attributes.content:
# Play Workshop Maps in Events

Have you made a map in the Workshop? Do you have what it takes to be the greatest Architect? Build your map and [share it on our Discord](https://www.discord.gg/stumbleguys) for a chance to have it featured live in Events!

The following 3 maps were made by AMAZING Architects and voted to be the very FIRST player-made maps in Events! Find out when you can play them:

## October 10th-13th | Dusk Clock City
Created by: @duskboi.
![UGC1-DuskClockCity.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/UGC_1_Dusk_Clock_City_68852d0927.png)

Created by: @Voilabo
![UGC2-SnowySummit.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/UGC_2_Snowy_Summit_248f2677fa.png)

Created by: @depuu
![UGC3-De'Beast-Slide.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/UGC_3_De_Beast_Slide_9c90e46ab1.png)

A huge CONGRATULATIONS to all 3 of these amazing Architects! For reaching such a great achievement they have all earned the Featured Creator Badge. This can only be seen in the Workshop menu. Check out what it looks like:
![FeaturedCreatorIcon.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Featured_Creator_Icon_962cf0d4e2.png)

We are very excited to see all of the new and creative maps you create and we hope you enjoy these Workshop events! Let us know what you think by posting a comment to our [Discord.](https://www.discord.gg/stumbleguys)

attributes.title: Your Favorite Level With an Epic Twist - Block Dash Rush is Here!
attributes.overview: Stumblers! Get ready for the most chaotic race yet—Block Dash Rush is here! We took all the things you loved from Block Dash and Laser Dash and cranked up the intensity to bring you this action-packed race map.
attributes.content:
Stumblers! Get ready for the most chaotic race yet—Block Dash Rush is here! We took all the things you loved from Block Dash and Laser Dash and cranked up the intensity to bring you this action-packed race map.

Ever wondered what it’s like to dodge moving blocks, jump across breakable platforms, and swerve away from deadly lasers while racing against others? Well, now’s your chance to find out! Speed and precision are your best friends in this neon-lit cyberpunk playground, where every step could be the difference between victory and elimination.

Block Dash Rush isn’t just about surviving; it’s about outpacing your opponents. The challenges start simple, but don’t get too comfortable. As you get closer to the finish line, things heat up fast. The obstacles come at you quicker, and every mistake could cost you the win. But that’s what makes the thrill, right?

So, do you have what it takes to be the fastest Block Dasher? Time to suit up and prove it!

Good luck… you’re gonna need it!
