attributes.title: 0.78 Patch Notes - The Speed of Stumbling!
attributes.overview:
Get ready for Version 0.78! This update brings new levels, exciting features, balance changes, a brand-new splash screen, and much more!. 
Whether you're racing through a new Block Dash experience, mastering the new Ability, or climbing the Ranked ladder, there’s something for every Stumbler. Dive in and explore everything this patch has to offer!
attributes.content:
Get ready for Version 0.78! This update brings new levels, exciting features, balance changes, a brand-new splash screen, and much more!. 
Whether you're racing through a new Block Dash experience, mastering the new Ability, or climbing the Ranked ladder, there’s something for every Stumbler. Dive in and explore everything this patch has to offer!

_______

#### **NEW LEVELS**
<u>Block Dash Rush</u>

Welcome to Block Dash Rush, the latest addition to the Block Dash family! This race map takes elements from the classic Block Dash elimination level and combines them with elements from Laser Dash (such as moving blocks, breakable platforms, and deadly lasers, etc.) to make a thrilling experience! 

Fans of Block Dash can now experience the chaos of dodging obstacles, but with a racing twist—where speed and precision are the keys to victory.

Set high above a neon-lit cyberpunk cityscape, Block Dash Rush reuses iconic obstacles from both Block Dash and Laser Dash—like moving blocks, breakable platforms, and lasers—creating an intense race to the finish line.

The difficulty starts off manageable, but escalates with every stretch, combining multiple challenges that will push players to their limits. Do you have what it takes to out-dash your competitors and claim bragging rights as the fastest Block Dasher?

<u>Stumble Up 2</u>

Are you ready to ascend once again? Introducing Stumble Up 2, the next installment of the beloved Stumble Up high-rise challenge!

In this sequel, the very fabric of Space-Time has been torn apart, unleashing complete chaos across the course. With new obstacles and surprises, it stays true to the vertical, fast-paced action that Stumblers all around the world have come to love.

Set in a vibrant, sci-fi-inspired environment, Stumble Up 2 is a race through a gravity-defying world. The course features floating platforms, suspended structures, and stunning intergalactic backdrops filled with neon lights and futuristic elements. From towering spires to floating spaceports, every section of this level feels like a leap into the unknown.

You'll need to navigate across floating beams, jumping from one gravity-defying structure to another, all while maintaining balance on shifting platforms. With a host of tricky pathways, this race will challenge even the most seasoned Stumblers.

Do you have what it takes to make it to the top?

#### **NEW ABILITY**
<u>Speed Gel</u>
Introducing the Speed Gel and its handy portable deployer! Whether you're in a rush to secure victory or helping out some sluggish teammates, this Ability is perfect for boosting movement speed and causing mayhem along the way.

Gameplay:
- The Speed Gel allows players to coat the ground in a slick, fast-acting speed gel, creating accelerated paths through levels.
- Beyond simple speed boosts, the gel can be used strategically to trap opponents or create challenging routes.
- Encourage tactical teamwork by laying down gel to help teammates catch up, or combine Abilities for blistering speed bursts.

Visual Variants
- Extinguisher: A fire safety twist with a gel-spraying extinguisher.
- Fire Hose: Bring the force of a high-pressure hose to propel you across the map.
- Crocodile: Unleash your inner reptile with this fun, chompy gel deployer.
- Tooth Paste: Squeeze out a fresh, minty clean path with this toothy variant.


#### **NEW FEATURES**
<u>Workshop Levels in Events </u>

Our beloved Architect recently stepped up and had a serious conversation with the development team: “We’ve realized that the creativity of our players is simply too impressive to ignore” - he said. 

As a result, we’re excited to announce that Player-Created Maps from the Stumble Workshop will now be featured in official Events!

The Architect made it clear: Your creations are top-notch, and it's time they take center stage! Whether it’s daring obstacle courses, tricky traps, or ingenious Race Levels, any Map from the Workshop could be selected to feature in upcoming Events.

To kick things off, we’ll be showcasing some of the most iconic and played maps from the Workshop. But there’s no set criteria—if it’s fun, creative, and exciting, it could make the cut!

So, get building, Stumblers! You just might find your level playing a starring role in the next big Event.
New Feature 

<u>Changes to the Stumble Pass</u>

The Stumble Pass has received a fresh set of updates to improve player experience and offer even more exciting rewards. Here’s what’s new:

- **Bonus Page**
Once all the standard rewards are claimed, players will unlock an extra bonus page where they can continue spending Stumble Pass Tokens on high-value rewards. This page remains locked until all prior rewards are collected, adding an extra layer of excitement for completionists!

- **Redesigned Activation Screen**
The activation screen has been revamped for clarity, now featuring a more distinct design that clearly differentiates between the two activation methods.

- **Stumble Pass Special**
Players who don’t have enough gems can now choose between two convenient options—either buy gems via offers in the store or directly purchase the Stumble Pass Special right from the activation pop-up.

- **Standout Blocked Premium Rewards**
We’ve improved the visibility of blocked premium rewards by removing the shadow effect. This makes it easier to distinguish blocked rewards from those inside a level-locked group.

- **Reward Type Indicators **
Thanks to the new reward type indicators added to the cards, similar to those used in the Stumble Journey, players can now easily identify the type of each reward at a glance.

<u>Changes to the Ranked Mode</u>

The Ranked Mode continues to evolve, delivering a more competitive and streamlined experience for Stumblers aiming for the top. This update brings two important improvements to make the Ranking System clearer and more rewarding:
- **Champion Rank Banner Update**
Players in the Champion Rank will now see their Ranked Points (RP) displayed directly on the Champion Rank banner in the main Ranked screen, giving top-tier players immediate insight into their RP progress, helping them track their standing more easily.
- **RP Reward Ceremony Fix**
We’ve fixed an issue with the RP reward ceremony bar, where the bar would sometimes dip lower than expected when players received negative RP. Now, the ceremony will display the correct values, offering a smoother and more accurate representation of your RP gains or losses after each match.

These changes aim to refine the Ranked experience, ensuring that both the progression and feedback systems are more intuitive for players climbing the competitive ladder.

<u>Team Race Levels</u>

It’s time to gear up for another wave of Team Race Maps! This is the third batch, and we're bringing even more thrilling race maps into the team competition:
- Cannonball Chaos Teams
- Construction Climb Teams
- Abducted Avenue Teams
- Ice Caramba Teams
- Floor Flip Teams
- Stumble Trouble Teams
- Humble Stumble Teams
- Tornado Temple Teams
- Super Paint Slide Teams
- Super Lava Slide Teams
- Super Waterpark Teams
- Stumble Rumble Teams

We’ve gone over this a few times, but in case you missed it, here’s how it works:
- For team-based race levels, there are no respawning orbs. Instead, your team’s qualification is determined by your collective team position in the race. The quicker your team finishes, the better your chances of advancing to the next round!
- **Points System**: Every position in the game earns your team points.
- **How to Qualify**: Your team needs to collect enough points to be in the top half. To move on to the next round, your team must be better than at least half of the teams competing.
- **Leaderboard Changes**: As players finish, points are added to teams' totals, which can change your team's rank in real-time.
- **End of Round**: The game round ends when there aren’t enough points left for any team below the cutoff to catch up. This means once it’s impossible for other teams to qualify, the round automatically stops.

#### **BALANCE CHANGES**
This update brings key adjustments to two popular Abilities: Power Jump and Invisibility. These changes aim to enhance the strategic depth and fairness of gameplay, ensuring that Abilities feel both rewarding and balanced.

**Power Jump**
The Power Jump Ability has seen a significant tweak. Previously, landing from a Power Jump would reset the jump cooldown, allowing for back-to-back jumps in quick succession. With this update, that side effect has been removed. 
Now, when you land from a Power Jump, the jump cooldown will remain in effect as normal, preventing rapid chaining of jumps.

**Invisibility**
The Invisibility Ability now functions a little differently. While being invisible still grants a sneaky advantage, using another Ability while invisible will immediately break your invisibility. This ensures that players can no longer chain Abilities while remaining undetected.

#### **COSMETICS**
<u>Emotes</u>
- Dreamcatcher
- Good Night!
- Guess I'll Die
- Hypnotised
- Welcome to Candyland!
- Zzzz...

<u>Footsteps</u>
- Asleep
- Dream Energy
- Glowing Forest
- Lollipops
- Path of Dreams
- Purple Fire

<u>Stumblers</u>
- Diesel Jack
- Sweet Sue
- Candybot
- Candice
- Caelion
- Comet
- Lone Skull
- Zephyr
- Dream Dragon
- Luminara
- Paco the Dreamcaller
- Florian
- Lucido
- Candyland Bouncer
- Kyra
- Ryko
- Flux
- Roxy
- Satyr Fern
- Shroom
- Sleepy Mr. Stumble
- Sweetmaw
- King of Extinction
- Rex Skellington
- Dream Guide

<u>Taunt Animations</u>
- Ba Dum Tss
- Hypnotic
- Invisible Box
- Steel Baseball Bat

<u>Victory Animations</u>
- Big W
- Enchanted
- Heel Click
- Sleepy Dance
- The End is Here!

#### **BUG FIXES**
<u>Gameplay</u>
- Ability Hit Box Issue: Fixed an issue where an Ability hit box could appear in two places simultaneously after being pushed by a block upon hitting the ground.
- Invisibility Ability: Corrected the invisibility issue where players failed to become invisible when switching quickly between the Shield and Invisibility Abilities.
- Rake Ability Range: Fixed a bug where the Rake Ability was affecting players outside the intended range.

<u>Levels</u>
- Stumble & Seek – Gameplay Fixes: Addressed a bug where some seekers were getting stuck in the spawn position and unable to move during gameplay.
- Stumble & Seek – Custom Party: Fixed a bug allowing users to select the Stumble & Seek map for the second and third rounds in a Custom Party.
- Laser Tracer: Fixed a bug where players hit by the Lightning Bolt Ability in the Laser Tracer map were being launched unnaturally high into the air, allowing them to stand on an invisible platform due to a collision error.
- Block Dash: Fixed a bug where players could get stuck between double blocks.

<u>Events</u>
- Leaderboard Rewards: Fixed an issue where users failed to receive leaderboard rewards from some Events.
- Event Rewards Display: Fixed an issue where an incorrect icon was displayed on the winning screen in some Events.
- Event Timer Display: Resolved an issue where the Event timer went missing after completing some Events.

<u>Leaderboards</u>
Friends Leaderboard: Resolved an issue where best times were not displaying for Race Maps on the Friends Leaderboard.

<u>Platform & Live Issues</u>
- Content Update Stability: Fixed multiple issues related to full content updates being non-viable on iOS and Steam.
- Workshop Controller Fixes: Fixed an issue with controller buttons ‘O’ and ‘X’ failing to function correctly on the 'Exit' pop-up in the Workshop when playing on Steam or PlayStation.
- Shop – IAP Offer: Addressed a problem where players could purchase a one-time offer multiple times.
- The minimum version required to play live has been bumped to 0.75.5. Players on earlier versions will need to update to continue participating in live Events and gameplay.

<u>Other issues</u>
- Numerous other minor fixes and adjustments have been made across various levels and gameplay mechanics to enhance overall game stability and player experience.
______
The new levels and features in this patch are just the beginning. From mastering Stumble Up 2 to experimenting with Speed Gel strategies, your next great stumble is waiting. What will your next victory look like?

attributes.title: Exclusive Creator Content - Meet Jonbtc and Grab his bundle!
attributes.overview: Meet Jonbtc, a top Stumble Guys content creator who now has his own exclusive custom skin and cosmetics bundles in the game!
attributes.content:
Meet Jonbtc, a top Stumble Guys content creator who now has his own exclusive custom skin and cosmetics bundle in the game! Available for a limited time, it brings Jonbtc’s unique style to your gameplay. In this interview, he shares his journey and tips for players. Don’t miss out on grabbing the offers while they last!

**<u>¡La versión en español de este post se encuentra a continuación!</u>**

________

<u>Can you briefly introduce yourself to our players?</u>
Hello, I'm Jonbtc, a video game content creator, mainly of Stumble Guys!

<u>Since when have you been a content creator?</u>
Professionally, since 2018, about 6-7 years in the business.

<u>What is your biggest achievement in Stumble Guys as a player?</u>
As a player, reaching Champion rank, and as a creator, having the Jonbtc Skin in the game.

<u>What do you like most about Stumble Guys?</u>
The simplicity at first glance and yet the difficulty of the game. I've always supported games like this, and I fell in love with Stumble the moment I discovered it!

<u>What is your favorite skin/emote/etc?</u>
- Skin: Jonbtc
- Emote: Dice
- Taunt: Jonbtc Mewing

<u>What is your best memory of Stumble Guys?</u>
The trip to the offices :)

<u>Do you have any advice for new players?</u>
My  advice  would  be  to  enjoy  the  game  as  much  as  you  can  and  make  friends  in  it,  because  in Stumble Guys you can meet wonderful people!

<u>What initially led you to create content specifically for Stumble Guys?</u>
A video I saw on YouTube, by Tekendo, fascinated me about Stumble!

<u>What is your content creation process for Stumble Guys? How do you plan and execute your ideas?</u>
Thinking  24/7  about  new  content,  watching  channels  from  other  countries  and  other  video  games, and bringing original ideas that haven't been done yet.

<u>Could you describe one or two of your favorite content pieces you've created for Stumble Guys and what made them special?</u>
- [_The  first  time  using  my  skin,  it  was  very emotional_](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OglVQlbpsrU&t=710s)
- [_When I played non-stop for 24 hours_](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s-u1keN6kuo&t=680s)
- [_The prank on the kid's mom_](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G3SwyoGD_mg&t=439s)

<u>What are your future plans regarding content creation for Stumble Guys? Are there new directions or concepts you'd like to explore?</u>
I wish and would love for Stumble Guys to keep progressing, especially by releasing a lot of in-game content, so I can create content continuously. Everything coming up looks great!!

<u>What advice would you give to someone who wants to start creating content for Stumble Guys?</u>
Regardless  of  their  financial  situation,  consoles,  or  computer,  they  should  put  in  the  effort  and  be very  consistent.  Consistency  beats  talent,  and that's  how  I  started.  With  just  a  cheap  phone  and  a big dream :)

<u>Can  you  explain  the  creative  process  behind  your  custom  cosmetics?  What  is  the  idea  behind them?</u>
I  try  to  convey  the  simplicity  of  my  image,  without  anything  extravagant  or  flashy,  just  our  humble outfit, and my favorite Mr. Stumble plush. And above all, the fact of having Mr. Stumble in my hand, which no skin in the game had before, so I could keep playing with Mr. Stumble, although from now on, I'll always use my skin!

<u>Where is the bundle available, and for how long?</u>
It's available in Stumble Guys (Store) for a few weeks. So grab yours! You can't miss it!

<u>What is your creator code?</u>
JONBTC

__________

<u>¿Puede presentarse brevemente a nuestros jugadores?</u>
Buenas, yo soy Jonbtc, creador de contenido de videojuegos, principalmente de Stumble Guys!

<u>¿Desde cuándo eres creador de contenidos?</u>
Profesionalmente, desde 2018, 6-7 años aproximadamente en el mundillo.

<u>¿Cuál es tu mayor logro en Stumble Guys como jugador?</u>
Como jugador, haber llegado a rango Campeón y como creador la Skin Jonbtc en el juego.

<u>¿Qué es lo que más te gusta de Stumble Guys?</u>
La sencillez a primera vista del juego y a la vez dificultad del mismo. Siempre he apostado por juegos así, y de stumble me enamoré nada más descubrirlo!

<u>¿Cuál es tu skin/emote/etc favorito?</u>
- Skin: Jonbtc
- Emote: Dado
- Mewing: Jonbtc

<u>¿Cuál es el mejor recuerdo que tienes de Stumble Guys?</u>
El viaje a las oficinas :)

<u>¿Tienes algún consejo que dar a los nuevos jugadores?</u>
Mi consejo sería que disfruten del juego siempre que puedan y hagan amistades dentro de él, ya que en stumble guys se conoce gente maravillosa!

<u>¿Qué te llevó inicialmente a crear contenido específico para Stumble Guys?</u>
Un video que vi en Youtube, de Tekendo, me fascinó Stumble!

<u>¿Cómo es tu proceso de creación de contenidos para Stumble Guys? ¿Cómo planificas y ejecutas tus ideas?</u>
Pensando 24/7 en nuevo contenido, viendo canales de otros países y de otros videojuegos, y trayendo ideas originales que aún no se hayan hecho.

¿Podrías describir uno o dos de tus contenidos favoritos que hayas creado para Stumble Guys y qué los hizo especiales?
- [_La primera vez usando mi skin, fue muy emotivo_](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OglVQlbpsrU&t=710s)
- [_Cuando estuve 24 horas jugando sin parar_](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s-u1keN6kuo&t=680s)
- [_La broma a la mama del niño pro_](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G3SwyoGD_mg&t=439s)

<u>¿Cuáles son tus planes de futuro en cuanto a la creación de contenidos para Stumble Guys? ¿Hay nuevas direcciones o conceptos que te gustaría explorar?</u>
Deseo y me encantaría que Stumble Guys siga progresando y sobre todo, sacando mucho contenido ingame, para poder crear contenido continuamente. La verdad que tiene muy buena pinta todo lo que se viene!!

<u>¿Qué consejo le darías a alguien que quiere empezar a crear contenidos para Stumble Guys?</u>
Independientemente de su poder adquisitivo, de sus consolas, o ordenador que tenga, que le eche ganas y sea muy constante, la constancia vence al talento y así fue como inicié yo. Con tal solo un movil barato y un gran sueño :)

<u>Explícanos el proceso creativo de tus cosméticos personalizados... ¿Cuál es la idea que hay detrás de ellos?</u>
Tratar de transmitir la sencillez de mi imagen, sin nada exuberante, ni llamativo, solo nuestra vestimenta humilde, y peluche de mr.stumble favorito. Y sobretodo, el hecho de tener a Mr.Stumble en la mano, cosa que ninguna skin del juego lo tenia, para poder seguir jugando con Mr.Stumble, aunque a partir de ahora, usaremos siempre mi skin!

<u>¿Dónde está disponible el paquete y durante cuánto tiempo?</u>
El enlace a tu canal principal. Está disponible en Stumble Guys (Tienda) por unas semanas. Así que hazte con el tuyo! No
te lo puedes perder!

<u>¿Cuál es tu código de creador?</u>
JONBTC

attributes.title: Stumble Workshop Updates: New Placeables!
attributes.overview: We're thrilled to announce the arrival of 18 brand-new placeables in the Stumble Workshop, designed to supercharge your creativity and take your custom Maps to new heights. Whether you're aiming to craft the ultimate challenge or create a visually stunning environment, these additions offer endless possibilities for innovation and fun.
attributes.content:
Hello, Stumblers!

We're thrilled to announce the arrival of 18 brand-new placeables in the Stumble Workshop, designed to supercharge your creativity and take your custom Maps to new heights. Whether you're aiming to craft the ultimate challenge or create a visually stunning environment, these additions offer endless possibilities for innovation and fun.

**Elevate Your Maps with New Placeables**

With this update, the Stumble Workshop is getting a significant boost. The new placeables include a diverse range of obstacles, decorative elements, and interactive objects. Here's a sneak peek at what's coming your way:

**2 Exciting Toys:**

- **Water Spout:** This playful toy will push you around with bursts of water, adding a refreshing twist to your Maps.
- **Exploding Box:** Touch this box, and the countdown begins! Once it detonates, it will blast anything nearby—and yes, it can trigger other Exploding Boxes too.
___________
**12  Blocks (+ Variants):**

- These blocks are perfect for building challenging obstacles or creative structures, allowing you to shape the gameplay to your liking.

___________
**1  Object:**

- **Barrel:** This sturdy barrel can be used to create obstacles or add a dynamic element to your Maps, enhancing both the look and the gameplay experience.

___________
**2 Decorative Elements:**

- **Rubble Dumpster:** Add a gritty, urban feel to your Maps with this rugged dumpster, perfect for creating themed environments.
- **Arrow Sign:** Guide players through your course or add a directional element to your designs with this eye-catching sign.

___________
**Introducing the High-Rise Template**

But that's not all! We're also introducing a brand-new template called High-Rise. This template is a representation from our team of ways to show off the new placeables in action. It’s an excellent starting point for your creations, offering you the flexibility to modify it to fit your style or create something entirely new. Whether you’re a seasoned designer or just starting, this template will inspire you to explore new possibilities.

attributes.title: Ranked Season 2 is here + Ability Balances Changes!
attributes.overview:
Season 2 is here!! 
Play alone or team up with friends. Improve your skills and climb the ranks!
attributes.content:
Have you started the New Rank Season yet?
 
Season 2 is here!! 
Play alone or team up with friends. Improve your skills and climb the ranks!

End of the season: 26. September 2024

**Season Rewards:** 

![Season2Rewards.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Season2_Rewards_0556cf2263.png)

**SEASON 2 MAP ROTATION:**

![Season2MapRotation.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Season2_Map_Rotation_67a97b41fd.png)


__________

**ABILITY BALANCE CHANGES**

**Punch**
- Decreased upward velocity at max level. Players you punch will not go up in the air as high as before.

**Briefcase**
- The range is reduced to give you more control over your throw

**Lightning**
- The visual effects of the lightning bolt was too small. It has been increased so players know exactly where it hits
- Reduced impacted players
- Decreased magnetism range

**Shield**
- Repulsion strength reduced

**Bug fix**
- Shield, Invisibility and Ball had duration bug which has been fixed. Before these abilities were not displaying the correct duration values.

**NEW ABILITY**

_Introducing.. **Sticky Bomb!** It will be available in the Shop._
- A new throwable ability
- Sticks to opponents if it lands on them or when they run over it
- Detonates after a period of time, creating a large area of sticky terrain where momentum is slowed considerably
- At Tier 15, the bomb will home in on players within a radius of its landing position

attributes.title: Patch Notes 0.77 - Transformers, New Levels & More!
attributes.overview: The latest Stumble Guys update has landed, and it’s bringing something special to the table—a collaboration with the legendary Transformers franchise. As we anticipate the release of Transformers One, this update offers fans a chance to experience the world of Autobots and Decepticons in a whole new way!
attributes.content:
Hey Stumblers!

The latest Stumble Guys update has landed, and it’s bringing something special to the table—a collaboration with the legendary Transformers franchise. As we anticipate the release of Transformers One, this update offers fans a chance to experience the world of Autobots and Decepticons in a whole new way!

## **IP Collaboration**
<u>Transformers One</u>

The **Transformers** frenzy started in the 80s with a line of transforming toy robots. Since then, it has expanded into a vast multimedia franchise, including animated TV series, comic books, video games, and live-action films.

- **Toys:** The original line featured robots that could transform into vehicles, animals, and other objects. Popular characters include Optimus Prime and Megatron.
- **TV Series:** The first animated series, "The Transformers" (1984-1987), introduced the ongoing battle between the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons on Earth.
- **Comics:** Starting also in the 80s, there have been various publishers over the years interested in this franchise.
- **Movies:** It all started with the animated movie  "The Transformers: The Movie" (1986), which became a cult classic. Later, the live-action film series brought the franchise to a new generation, featuring cutting-edge CGI and large-scale action sequences.
- **Themes and Impact:** The Transformers franchise explores themes of heroism and war among others, appealing to both children and adults. It has become a significant cultural phenomenon, influencing various media and generating a dedicated fan base worldwide.

The collaboration on Stumble Guys is focused on the upcoming movie Transformers One (release September 20th).

## **New Level**

<u>Stumble Rumble</u>

A new take on elimination - introducing brawling!
Take part in this chaotic PVP experience in a dynamic arena that crumbles over time!  Arm yourself with weapons and knock your enemies out! 
But beware! You are also everyone else’s target! Watch out for those 3 precious lives, because when you run out you'll be eliminated from the round!

<u>Weapons</u>

- **Boxing Glove** - The faithful punch and default ability. Great for hitting 
a bunch of times, but less impactful than the other weapons.

- **Baseball Bat** - A more precise large hit, which can send enemies high 
into the sky. The cooldown is a little longer on this one though, 
so make your hit count!

- **Hammer Spin** - Spin into a frenzy with the ability to knock multiple 
enemies at a time. This weapon will require some skill to use, as 
predicting enemy movements will be your goal here. Just watch out, 
and don't fall from the arena as you spin!

- **Golden Glove** - This weapon is meant for eliminating. The presence of the 
golden glove strikes fear into opponents, with its high powered hit and 
charge. However, it is up to the wielder to remain cautious while using.

## **New Map Modes**

<u>Rush Hour Endless</u>

Get ready to dive into the exhilarating world of Rush Hour Endless! This revamped level now features a unique endless mechanic, keeping the action going as long as players remain alive. Here's more detail about this new feature:

**Endless Mode**
- The level continues until the last player is eliminated. 
- Test your endurance and see how long you can navigate the chaotic streets of Rush Hour in this never-ending challenge.

**Time Trial Feature**
- We've replaced the traditional timer with a 
more precise Leaderboard Timer, adding a new 
layer of competition. 
- Aim for personal bests and challenge 
your friends to beat your survival time.

**Dynamic Skybox**
- Experience the passage of time with a new dynamic skybox that evolves as you play. 
- Watch the sky transition from dawn to dusk, adding a visually immersive element to your endless run.

**Enhanced Visuals**
- The cars and buildings have been meticulously remodeled with higher quality models. 
- Enjoy a smoother and more visually stunning experience as you race through the city.
(Note: These enhancements have been applied to all Rush Hour maps.) 

Jump into Rush Hour Endless and push your limits in this continuous battle for survival!

<u>The Other Side Teams</u>

Yes, you heard it right! We've done it again! NOW INTRODUCING THE OTHER SIDE TEAMS!

Rally your friends and get ready for the ultimate showdown! Form teams in Events and Pairs in Custom Parties, and prepare to face off against other groups in a high-stakes battle for the crown!

But the excitement doesn’t end when a teammate is knocked out—use the newly introduced orbs to bring them back into the game and keep the battle raging! 

We know you are pretty familiar with the drill by now, but just in case:

- A maximum of two (2) respawn orbs will spawn randomly on the map.
- Each orb appears at a random location and a random time, with up to 12 seconds between spawns.
- Collecting an orb will revive players in the exact order they were eliminated, ensuring they return in sequence.
- Even if all your teammates are still in play, you can collect orbs to make survival tougher for rival teams!
Note: On the regular version of The Other Side, each player begins the level with 5 lives. In the team version there are no lives, only respawn orbs!

<u>Additional Team Race Levels</u>

In this update, we're rolling out additional Race Levels in the Teams version. Get ready to dive into the action on these newly added tracks:

- Over & Under 
- Paint Splash 
- Jungle Roll 
- Lava Rush 
- Stumble Cove 
- Abduction Avenue 
- Crab's Landing 
- Super Pivot Slide 
- Space Race 


As usual, for the race Levels there are no respawing orbs. Instead, qualification will be based on team position in the race. Here is a brief explanation of the qualification rules:

- **Point System:** Every position in the game earns your team points.
- **How to Qualify:** Your team needs to collect enough points to be in the top half. To move on to the next round, your team must be better than at least half of the teams competing.
- **Leaderboard Changes:** As players finish, points are added to teams' totals, which can change your team's rank in real-time. 
- **End of Round:** The game round ends when there aren’t enough points left for any team below the cutoff to catch up. This means that when it’s impossible for other teams to qualify, the round automatically ends.

## **New Ability**

<u>Sticky Bomb</u>

Introducing the Sticky Bomb Ability! You can guess it by its name:  a bomb that sticks to everything; walls, floors, obstacles and opponents!

From the moment it's thrown, its timer starts and when it goes off anyone in the proximity is in a sticky situation.

When the bomb explodes, it covers the surrounding area in sticky goo that reduces speed and jump height.

When fully upgraded, the bomb becomes sentient and starts homing in on anyone who gets too close!

How will you use the Sticky Bomb? Cover shortcuts in sticky goo, turn opponents into walking bombs, or position explosives on popular routes to add extra risk. The possibilities are endless!

We can't wait to see the creative strategies you develop to outwit your opponents and secure victory!

## **New Feature**

<u>Stumble Pass Enhancements</u>

We're excited to announce a new feature in the Stumble Pass that makes progressing even more rewarding! 

Introducing the "Skip Levels" button, a convenient option that allows you to instantly advance through the Stumble Pass by purchasing entire Levels. 

This feature is perfect for those looking to unlock exclusive rewards faster or catch up on missed progress.

With just a click, you can boost your Stumble Pass journey and claim those sought-after rewards without the grind. Whether you're short on time or simply eager to unlock everything the Stumble Pass has to offer, this new option gives you the flexibility to enjoy the game your way!

## **Stumble Workshop Updates**

<u>New Placeables</u> 

We're excited to introduce 18 brand-new placeables to the Stumble Workshop, giving you more tools to unleash your creativity. These additions include a variety of obstacles, decorative elements, and interactive objects that will elevate your custom Maps to the next Level. Whether you're designing a challenging course or crafting a visually stunning environment, these new placeables provide endless possibilities for innovation.

With this update, you'll have more control over the look and feel of your Maps. Experiment with different combinations, create unique gameplay scenarios, and share your creations with the community. We can't wait to see the amazing Maps you'll build with these new assets!

Also, a new template to play with called High-Rise is going to be available. It is a representation from our team of ways to show off the new placeables! You can edit it to make it look more like your own style, or anything else you want!

**IMPORTANT NOTE: The new content for the Stumble Workshop (the new placeables and the new template) will be available in the game at a later time (version 0.77.5).**


## **Cosmetics**

<u>Emotes</u>
- We Can Do It! [Uncommon]
- Roar! [Uncommon]
- Skull [Common]
- Sparkles [Common]
- Unicorn [Common]
- Shreddin' [Uncommon]
- Cool Pickle [Uncommon]
- Sad Mirko [Uncommon]

<u>Footsteps</u>
- Bones [Common]
- Crimson Lightning [Mythic]
- Final Judgment [Uncommon]
- Foam [Legendary]
- Mars [Rare]
- Quiet Battlefield [Epic]
- Ecuador Flag [Uncommon]
- Peru Flag [Uncommon]
- Sunflower Seeds [Uncommon]

<u>Stumblers</u>
- Queen of Crows [Mythic]
- Reena [Rare]
- Battlebara [Legendary]
- Clucktavius [Epic]
- Armored Stumble [Rare]
- Gladiatron [Legendary]
- Zogzog [Epic]

- Dark Champion [Special]
- Rosie [Uncommon]
- Bumblebee [Mythic]

- Silvershred [Epic]
- Rockin' Rai [Epic]
- Krok [Uncommon]
- Megatron [Mythic]

- Fyr [Epic]

- Sir Hugo [Rare]

- Sprinkles the Great [Legendary]
- LEASH [Special]
- Lady Moon [Mythic]
- Snuggles [Common]
- Pickle Guy [Legendary]
- Twilly [Rare]

<u>Taunt Animations</u>
Come at me [Rare]
Enraged [Legendary]
Slip [Rare]
Pillow Fight [Epic]

<u>Victory Animations</u>
- Hyper [Uncommon]
- Shieldwall [Mythic]
- Smooth Wiggle [Rare]
- Jumping Split [Epic]
- Hardbass [Rare]

## **Bug Fixes**

<u>Ranked Gameplay and Interface Improvements</u>

- **Loading Screen Issue:** Resolved a bug where users would get stuck on the loading screen after the 'waiting for players' screen in ranked games.
- **Matchmaking Screen Display:** Fixed an issue where the matchmaking screen would incorrectly appear on the home screen when quickly toggling between 'Play' and 'Play with Friends' in the ranked menu.
- **Ranked Season Labelling:** Corrected the incorrect naming of Season 1 in Ranked mode.
- **Party Lobby Redirection:** Addressed an issue where pressing 'Solo' and 'With Friends' simultaneously in the Ranked Season 1 menu led to an error in gameplay.

<u>Abilities and Gameplay Fixes</u>

- 'Chop' Ability: Adjusted the 'Chop' ability, which was not causing the desired stumble effect on players.
- Event Issues: Fixed an issue in the 'Bucket Mayhem' event where the incorrect winner was declared, and the Spatula was missing from the player's hand.

<u>Login and Server Stability</u>

- Login Issues: Fixed a server error occurring during some login attempts, improving server reliability and player access.
- Facebook Login: Resolved an issue where incorrect login status was displayed upon signing in via 'Facebook ID'.

<u>Event and Tournament Adjustments</u>

- Event Reward Display: Fixed an issue where milestone rewards were automatically claimed without player interaction.
- Seekers Team Display: Corrected an issue where Seekers were not properly displayed as a team on the winning screen in the 'Stumble & Seek' event.
- Tournaments Rewards: Addressed an issue where users were not receiving rewards from certain tournaments, and multiple error codes were displayed.

<u>Customization and Cosmetics Enhancements</u>

- VFX Alignment: Fixed misalignment of smoke effects in the 'Beast Firecracker' animation and the prop placement for the Champagne Shake animation.
- Character Animation: Resolved an issue where characters appeared to levitate in the air during certain victory animations.
- Skin Display Issues: Corrected various issues with skin displays, including the incorrect color of the Lava Phoenix skin in the 'Stumble Soccer' map and partial disappearance of the 'Smoke' skin.
Shop and Rewards Screen Fixes
- Shop UI: Resolved an issue where the rewards screen failed to appear, and the offer banner remained until revisiting the shop after an in-app purchase.
- Background Download UI: Fixed the misalignment of the "Use" button when interacting with an un-downloaded skin during a background download.

<u>General Gameplay Improvements</u>

- Hero Exam Level: Fixed issues with players getting stuck in debris or levitating after being hit by a robot arm.
- Map Icon Overlaps: Addressed overlaps between map icons and event descriptions in the events section.
- Collision Issues: Verified and fixed missing collision on the Icy Heights level and the spin hammer ramp in the Over & Under level.

<u>Performance and Stability Enhancements</u>

- Crash on iOS: Resolved a crash issue on iOS devices when interacting with the "Epic Shards" shop offer.
- Frame Drops: Improved performance to reduce frame drops observed in the Blaster Base map preview.

<u>General Bug Fixes and System Updates</u>

- Numerous other minor fixes and adjustments have been made across various levels and gameplay mechanics to enhance overall game stability and player experience.

This update is full of exciting new features, from the Transformers collaboration to fresh gameplay modes and enhancements. Whether you’re battling it out in the new Stumble Rumble arena or exploring the updated maps, there’s plenty to keep you engaged. Jump in, explore the new content, and enjoy the latest chapter in Stumble Guys!

attributes.title: Fan Favorite Event: You Voted and the Results are in!
attributes.overview:
Now, the moment has arrived! Starting today and running until August 29th, the top-voted community choices will be featured in-game for an ultimate summer celebration.
All things Block Dash-related were the most voted choices…, so we're here to deliver!
attributes.content:
Hello Stumblers,

As Mr. Stumble continues his epic summer adventures, we recently asked you to vote for your favorite summer maps, events, skins, and more. Your enthusiasm has been incredible, and we're so grateful for your participation!

Now, the moment has arrived! Starting today and running until August 29th, the top-voted community choices will be featured in-game for an ultimate summer celebration.
All things Block Dash-related were the most voted choices…, so we're here to deliver!

# Ready? Here's the program for this week:

**Events**
We're excited to launch a Fan Favorite event featuring the top-rated Dash maps! This milestone event is extra special, offering not just 2, but 3 exclusive cosmetic rewards:
- Dragon Slayer Skin
- Praise the Sun Victory Animation
- Water Gun Emote

We're also thrilled to launch another Stumble & Seek 2 milestone event which has clearly won a special place in your hearts! (with Gems as rewards) 
Both events will run from 22nd to 29th August.

**Tournaments**
Legendary Block Dash is coming your way from August 22 to August 29, and it’s one of the three epic tournaments of the season. Don’t miss your chance to rise to the top!

**Offers**
<u>Skins & Cosmetics</u> 
We’re collaborating with the team to bring you the top skins and cosmetics, all handpicked based on your feedback. These limited-time offers will be heavily discounted, so stay tuned!
<u>New Special Wheel</u> 
Get ready for the debut of the Buck Burner skin and more! 
Stay tuned to the store for additional exciting offers.

Ready for some fun? Don’t forget to join the **<u>[Global Discord Server](https://discord.com/invite/yT6Zpd6ucn)</u>**, where we’ll be hosting a special competition for all event participants!

attributes.title: Stumble Guys is Now Available on Nintendo Switch - Get Ready to Win on the Go!
attributes.overview: We’ve got some HUGE news that’s sure to make your day—Stumble Guys is officially available on Nintendo Switch! That’s right, Stumble Guys is now ready for you to play anytime, anywhere on your favorite handheld console.
attributes.content:
Hey, Stumblers!

We’ve got some HUGE news that’s sure to make your day - Stumble Guys is officially available on Nintendo Switch! That’s right, Stumble Guys is now ready for you to play anytime, anywhere on your favorite handheld console.

Stumble On The Go!
Whether you’re at home, on the bus, or chilling with friends, you can now take the chaotic fun of Stumble Guys with you wherever you go. Compete in tournaments, challenges and battle it out to be the last one standing, all from the palm of your hand. The Switch’s portability means the stumble never has to stop!

Ready to start stumbling on your Nintendo Switch? Head over to the [Nintendo eShop](https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/stumble-guys-switch/), search for Stumble Guys, and download it for **FREE**! 

We’re so excited to bring Stumble Guys to the Nintendo community and can’t wait to see all the stumbles, tumbles, and victories you’ll experience. Be sure to follow us on our social media channels for tips, updates, and community events - we’ve got tons of surprises in store!

Happy Stumbling!

attributes.title: Twitch Drops are Coming Soon - Follow us for Freebies!

We’ve got some exciting news—Twitch Drops are coming to Stumble Guys very soon! That’s right, you’ll soon be able to earn exclusive in-game rewards just by watching our streams on Twitch.

We’re dropping this feature very soon! So make sure to [follow us on Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/stumbleguys) now, and stay connected for all the latest updates. and stay tuned for updates. You won’t want to miss out!

attributes.title: Stumble Guys is Taking Over Gamescom 2024!
attributes.overview: Stumble Guys is heading to the biggest gaming event of the year—Gamescom 2024! Mark your calendars and set your alarms because from August 21 to August 25, we're bringing the fun, chaos, and non-stop action to Hall 9.1 in Cologne, Germany!
attributes.content:
Hey Stumblers!

Get ready to stumble, bumble, and tumble because Stumble Guys is heading to the biggest gaming event of the year - **Gamescom 2024**! Mark your calendars and set your alarms because from **August 21 to August 25**, we're bringing the fun, chaos, and non-stop action to **Hall 9.1 in Cologne, Germany!**

# What to Expect:
- **Live Gaming:** Try Stumble Guys on console & more!
- **Tournaments:** Think you have what it takes to be the ultimate Stumble Champion? Prove it in our tournaments and maybe walk away with some incredible **prizes!**
- **Meet & Greet:** Ever wanted to meet the team behind Stumble Guys? Now’s your chance! Get to know the creators, grab some exclusive gear, and maybe even meet Mr Stumble IRL!
**And so much more!!!!**

So rally your team, practice those jumps and dives, and get ready to stumble with the best of them. We can’t wait to see you there, Stumblers! Let’s make Gamescom 2024 the most unforgettable one yet!

See You in Cologne!

Stay tuned for more updates, and make sure to follow us on social media for sneak peeks and the latest news. Until then, keep on stumbling!

attributes.title: Stumble & Seek: Play Hide and Seek in Stumble Guys!
attributes.overview: Get ready to hide and seek like never before with the brand-new Stumble & Seek map in Stumble Guys! This isn’t your ordinary game of hide and seek—it's packed with twists, turns, and tons of fun.
attributes.content:
3...2...1...come out, come out wherever you are!!!
Get ready to hide and seek like never before with the brand-new Stumble & Seek map in Stumble Guys! This isn’t your ordinary game of hide and seek—it's packed with twists, turns, and tons of fun!

In this exciting map, players split into two teams: Hiders and Seekers. But here's the catch—Hiders don’t just hide; they become part of the environment! Transform into everyday construction site objects like barrels, signs, or even tools to blend in with your surroundings. The goal? Outwit the Seekers and avoid getting caught!

But don’t get too comfy in your disguise—every 45 seconds, Hiders face a forced transformation with a dramatic smoke explosion that could give away your position! You’ll need to stay on your toes, switching between props and finding new hiding spots to keep the Seekers guessing.

Seekers, on the other hand, need to keep their eyes peeled for any unusual activity. Look out for clues like unexpected smoke signals that reveal where those sneaky Hiders are hiding.

So, get ready to jump in, disguise yourself, and seek your way to victory! 3...2...1...let the games begin!

attributes.title: Split Screen is Now Available on PlayStation!
attributes.overview: Split Screen Mode has officially landed on PlayStation. Now, you can team up with your friends and play together on the same screen.
attributes.content:
Exciting news, Stumblers!

Split Screen mode has officially landed on PlayStation. Now, you can team up with your friends and play together on the same screen.

Picture this: you and your friends, side by side, racing through wild courses and as you stumble your way to victory (or not). It’s all the fun of Stumble Guys, now with double the action.

So, go ahead and update your game, invite friends over, and jump into the chaos! It's time to play together!!!

attributes.title: BabyYoda_TV and his Stumble Guys Skin!
attributes.overview: Your favorite Stumble Guys content creators are now crafting their own special bundles exclusively for their communities! Each bundle can include unique skins, emotes, and other cool in-game items designed by the creators you love.
attributes.content:
**•	Can you briefly introduce yourself to our players?**
    
My name is Luke AKA BabyYoda_TV I am an official Stumble Guys content creator that posts daily on YouTube and is very involved in the stumble guys scene.

**•	How long have you been a content creator/streamer?**
    
I have been a content creator for many games over the past four years and it all started over the pandemic when I had nothing better to do but play video games and share it with the Internet. However I have been full time as a YouTuber for two years now and stumble guys has helped me achieve that dream.

**•	What is your biggest accomplishment in Stumble Guys as a player?**
    
My biggest accomplishment as a stumble guys player was crossing the 1000 crowns mark. But I would not consider myself that good at the game I am more focused on the entertainment and production of videos for my YouTube channel. I feel more accomplished when I create an idea start to finish and see my visions come to life. Seeing instant positive feedback keeps me to further push my limits every day. 

**•	What do you like the most about Stumble Guys?**
    
My favorite thing about stumble guys is the accessibility of it. The fact that it's on every platform allows anyone in the world with a device to join in on what I create. I think my strong suit is being able to rally my community to create unique ideas. And stumble guys complements that extremely well. There's no other game on the market that allows you to have 32 players in the same game from anywhere in the world from any device and it's free. Not to mention stumble guys gets updates weekly and having direct developer support as a content creator makes my life so much easier.

**•	What is your favourite skin/emote/etc?**
    
Before my brand-new bundle got released my favorite skin was the golden sensei. I like how clean yet flashy it makes you feel and it pays homage to the OG days of this game. My favorite ability is punch closely followed up by the brick ability. My favorite footsteps is the Mach 10 which actually my bundle has a new and improved golden version which is now my favorite lol.

	**•	What is a good memory you have from Stumble Guys in your life?**
    
I have so many good memories of being a content creator for stumble guys. The first one that comes to mind was being the 1st official North American English content creator for the game. But that has been surpassed as my favorite memory with me now receiving the 1st custom creator bundle in stumble guys. Seeing myself in a video game next to characters like SpongeBob Mr. Beast and Pac-Man is unreal.

**•	Do you have advice you want to give to new players?**
    
My biggest advice for new stumble guys players is to just play for fun and overtime you will get the hang of it. The game is not that complicated and so the more you enjoy it the more you'll get better at it. However if you do not have any abilities I would prioritize getting punch, kick, volleyball, and invisibility.

**•	Favourite IP introduced into the game?**
    
My favorite IP in stumble guys has to be SpongeBob. Not only are there so many of my favorite characters from the show in the game, but there are also three unique collab maps, and abilities to go along with it.

**•	Can you share what initially drew you to create content specifically for Stumble Guys?**
    
What initially drew me to make content for stumble guys was the fact that I could play alongside my twitch chat. At the time I had about 50 people live watching me and 32 of them could all join in beside me. This combined with the virality of the game on TikTok really showed me what the potential of being a creator for this game could be.

**•	What does your content creation process look like for Stumble Guys? How do you plan and execute your ideas?**
    
My content creation process is all about consistency. It's easy to get caught up in the numbers of it all, but I am more focused on output. So every day I post a main channel video and a second channel video with sometimes also a short being posted. Which means I need to have a lot of ideas and so if I think of something I typically just do it. And based off the performance, replicate what works. So, in the morning I will write down my agenda on what I will film, then in the afternoon I will execute the ideas and at night I create my thumbnails and do it all again the next day. It's definitely not easy to create as much as I do but I have had seven different jobs in my life and I would pick this over a 9-5 job any day of the week.

**•	Could you describe one or two of your favorite pieces of content that you’ve made for Stumble Guys and what made them special?**
    
My first favorite piece of content I've made for stumble guys is when I 1v1ed 100 players. The reason this is my favorite is it took so long to create with 6 hours of recording and the fact that I won 66 and only lost 34 out of those 100. The second video that comes to mind is when I had the opportunity to play against Ludwig and his streaming friends in stumble guys for $20,000. Me and my team absolutely destroyed his and won the challenge. Also, Ludwig was a large reason I created content in the first place, so it was a win win.

**•	What are your future plans regarding content creation for Stumble Guys? Are there any new directions or concepts you’re excited to explore?**
    
If I'm being honest, I don't have any crazy future plans, I'm just going to continue what I'm already doing and continue to push myself.

**•	What advice would you give to someone who wants to start creating content for Stumble Guys?**
    
My biggest advice for new content creators for stumble guys is to just try it. It's easy to think I want to be a content creator, but it takes a lot of consistency and repetition, so everyone will suck when they first start. I have posted over 2400 videos in just 4 years. I had no idea how to video edit or create thumbnails when I started but if you do something enough every single day you will become better than most. Everyone thinks you need a nice camera and setup to be successful but the game is on your phone and anyone these days can be a content creator. The other key element is to make sure you're doing it for the right reasons. I did not think I would be where I'm at today and I started making content purely for fun. And so if you can have fun while making content and do it every day I think that's how you become a successful stumble guy's content creator.

**•	Why did you pick these items for your curated bundle?**
    
When I first got told I would receive a stumble guys bundle I didn't know where to start. But I decided to take elements of my main stumble guy skins that I've used in the past and formed it into the BabyYoda_TV skin. For the base model I wanted my skin to look like me. In every single one of my YouTube videos I wear a black shirt and my necklace that I bought when I hit 100,000 Subs on YouTube. So it worked out perfectly that I used the golden gloves skins chain. Next I was thinking about what shoes I would wear, not a lot of people know this but I am very into sneakers and so I wanted my shoes to match my chain with gold accents. As I mentioned before my favorite skin was the gold sensei so I wanted swords on my back just like that skin. The final touch was the sunglasses which match my skin perfectly. For the emote in my bundle I needed my cat George to also be in stumble guys so this was a perfect spot for him. And finally my footsteps are a golden version of the Mach 10 which is my favorite footsteps.

**•	Where is the bundle available and for how long?**
    
My bundle is available in the in game shop or on the stumble guys website from August 5th to the 11th.

**•	What is your creator code?**
    
My creator code is BabyYoda and you can use it in the shop to support me


**•	The link to your main channel**

You can find my channel [_**[HERE]**_](https://www.youtube.com/@BabyYodaTV)

![WEB OFFER_Baby Yoda CC Bundle 2.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/WEB_OFFER_Baby_Yoda_CC_Bundle_2_3dcdae2bad.png)
![WEB OFFER_Baby Yoda CC Bundle 1.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/WEB_OFFER_Baby_Yoda_CC_Bundle_1_6a1ee06fa4.png)

attributes.title: New Ranked Season and Ability Balance Changes
attributes.overview: We've made balance adjustments in our latest update to our Abilities like Karate Chop, Hug, Shield and more!
attributes.content:
**NEW ABILITY BALANCE CHANGES**

**Karate chop**
- The radius will be widened slightly to make it easier to hit players.

**Hug**
- We will be reducing the duration of the hug time to make it easier to break out of a hug.
- Additionally we have enabled the ability to break a hug through the use of other abilities.

**Shield**
- We will be reducing the force that the shield ability repels other players at higher levels.

**Invisibility**
- We will be adjusting the duration of the ability as well as its cooldown.

**Punch**
- We have heard and seen the feedback on the power of punch and will be reducing the force of the knock back as well as the upwards force at max level.

**Power jump**
- Max height reduced slightly across all tiers.

**Magnetism**
- Abilities that have a magnetism ability will have the force of the magnetism reduced as they get into higher levels.

**Cooldowns**
- We have looked at the frequency that abilities are being triggered and are looking to reduce this slightly as such we will be adjusting the cooldown of abilities, particularly at higher levels.
__________________

attributes.title: My Hero Academia - The Ultimate Hero Exam in Stumble Guys
attributes.overview: Stumblers! Gear up for an awesome adventure with our latest collaboration - My Hero Academia! Inspired by the thrilling world of MHA, we created the Hero Exam map which brings the challenge of hero training to life.
attributes.content:
Stumblers! Gear up for an awesome adventure with our latest collaboration - My Hero Academia! Inspired by the thrilling world of MHA, we created the Hero Exam map which brings the challenge of hero training to life. As you navigate the bustling mock city of Ground Beta, you’ll have the chance to select from one of five unique Quirks, each designed to give you distinct advantages in your quest to become the ultimate hero. From intense battles against rogue robots to the race against a towering giant robot, the Hero Exam is the perfect stage to prove your mettle.

The Hero Exam isn’t just about surviving the hazards of the city; it’s about mastering your chosen Quirk to outmaneuver and outsmart your competition. Each Quirk offers a unique blend of passive buffs and active skills that can turn the tide of any challenge. Whether you're utilizing the shockwave punch of One for All, the explosive jumps of Explosion, or the agile tongue grapple of Frog Form, your strategic use of these powers will be key to your success. And with the scaling difficulty of the Hero Exam Level, the more you master your Quirks, the greater the challenges you’ll face.

Prepare to REALLY find out what it means to be a hero. The Hero Exam map is not just a test of agility and quick thinking, but a celebration of courage and determination. Navigate through perils, harness your newfound powers, and rise above the competition. Are you ready to take on the Hero Exam and prove you have what it takes to stand among the greatest heroes?
