attributes.title: Patch Notes 0.76 - My Hero Academia is Here!
attributes.overview: Stumble Guys welcomes My Hero Academia! The story centers around a young guy named Izuku Midoriya (AKA Deku), who’s part of the unlucky few born without a Quirk. But this kid’s got a big dream—to become a hero just like his idol, All Might, who’s the number one hero and symbol of peace.
attributes.content:
Hey there, Stumblers! Get ready to dive into the ultimate mashup of challenges and fun as we bring you an exciting new collaboration with the beloved anime series, My Hero Academia! If you're a fan of superpowered battles and heroic journeys, you're in for a treat. This update is packed with new maps, quirky abilities, thrilling events, and so much more. 

## NEW COLLAB
<u>My Hero Academia</u>
An awesome anime and manga series that burst onto the scene in 2014. It's all about a world where almost everyone has superpowers, or "Quirks.”
The story centers around a young guy named Izuku Midoriya (AKA Deku), who's part of the unlucky few born without a Quirk. But this kid's got a big dream—to become a hero just like his idol, All Might, who's the number one hero and symbol of peace.
The series is a fantastic mix of intense battles, heartfelt moments, and a deep dive into what it really means to be a hero. 

## NEW COLLAB MAP + QUIRKS
<u>Hero Exam</u>
Prepare to prove your prowess and secure a spot at the prestigious Hero Academy. As you enter the bustling mock city of Ground Beta, you’ll select from one of five unique Quirks, each offering distinct advantages. The race is on to navigate the city’s hazards, battle rogue robots, and make your way to the towering giant robot menacing the skyline.
The Hero Exam Level features a difficulty that scales with your mastery of Quirks. Utilize your skills wisely and embark on your journey to become a hero. Navigate the perils, harness your powers, and rise above the competition at the Hero Exam!

<u>Quirks</u>
Some of the Quirks grant you with both a Passive buff and an Active skill. They are activated with the same button and will apply both effects on your Stumbler simultaneously. The Active skill will only take effect if the conditions are met (there are other stumblers in the area of effect, or there is a wall in the range of the quirk, etc).


**One for All**
- Passive buffs: Higher jump and faster run speed
- Active skill: Shockwave punch

**Explosion**
- Active skill: Explosion jump (up to 3 charges over time)

**Half Cold**
- Active skill: Ice ramp (up to 2 charges over time)

**Frog Form**
- Passive buffs: Higher jump
- Active skill: Tongue grapple

**Gigantification**
- Passive buffs: Larger size, higher jump, slower acceleration, 
- faster speed, stumble resistance
- Active skill: Flying kick

## NEW ORIGINAL MAP
<u>Stumble & Seek</u>
Dive into a thrilling game of hide and seek in the world of Stumble Guys. In this exhilarating new Map, players split into two teams: Hiders and Seekers. The twist? Hiders disguise themselves as everyday objects within the construction site, blending seamlessly into their surroundings to evade capture.
As a Hider, transform into various props like barrels, signs, or tools, and switch between forms to outsmart Seekers. Beware, you'll need to change shape periodically, which could blow your cover!
Keep your eyes peeled for clues like unexpected smoke signals that reveal the Hiders' positions.
Every 45 seconds, Hiders face a forced transformation, marked by a dramatic smoke explosion, adding a layer of challenge to their stealth tactics.
Get ready to blend, disguise, and seek your way to victory in the Stumble & Seek Map. Whether you’re blending in or sniffing out, this game promises excitement and surprises at every turn!

## NEW GAMEPLAY FEATURE
<u>Team Race Maps</u>
That’s right! You read it correctly! Now Teams are also on race Maps!

We will gradually introduce all of our Race Levels in the Teams version. For this update, the maps that are coming out are:
- Burrito Bonanza
- Cannon Climb
- Icy Heights
- Lost Temple
- Pivot Push
- Spin Go Round
- Super Slide
- Tile Fall

For the race maps there will be no respawing orbs. Instead, qualification will be based on team position in the race. Here is a brief explanation of the qualification rules:
- **Points System**: Every position in the game earns your team points.
- **How to Qualify:** Your team needs to collect enough points to be in the top half. To move on to the next round, your team must be better than at least half of the teams competing.
- **Leaderboard Changes:** As players finish, points are added to teams' totals, which can change your team's rank in real-time. 
- **End of Round:** The game round ends when there aren’t enough points left for any team below the cutoff to catch up. This means once it’s impossible for other teams to qualify, the round automatically stops.

## NEW EVENTS
A new look for Events arrives to provide different game experiences in Stumble Guys. Here you’ll see new game modes daily, with sections for discovering featured Events. This is the one-stop shop for all your favorite Stumble Guys gameplay! Click on the Events icon to start exploring!
Whenever a new event appears in the game, it will be hidden under covered tiles. Click on these tiles to reveal the event and earn XP for each tile you uncover.

Once uncovered, the Event Thumbnail will be revealed, which will provide you with key information to help you quickly grasp the essential details of the event
- **Bottom Right:** Current number of players participating in the event.
- **Middle:** Event name and your progress on a leaderboard or milestone.
- **Top Left:** Event timer and any reward multipliers.
- **Top Right:** Game mode and team size for team events.


A variety of game modes, each providing a distinct experience will become available:
- **Original:** 32 players, 3 rounds
- **Showdown:** 8 players, 1 round
- **Duel:** 2 players, 1 round
- **Clash:** 4 players, 3 rounds
- **Turbo:** 16 players, 3 rounds
- **Blitz:** 32 players, 1 round 
- 
Game modes involving teams may have specific variations. 
Once you select a game mode, an info Screen will pop-up providing detailed information about the event, including:

- **Tags:** Key details like the game mode, available rewards, and more.
- **Round Information:** Shows the number of rounds and the maps you'll play.
- **Progression/Leaderboard:** Displays your progress or leaderboard status, with an option to view more or less detail.
- **Play Buttons:** Includes options to "Play" and "Play with Friends," making it easy to join and enjoy the event with others. This pop-up ensures you're fully informed and ready to engage with each event.

**COSMETICS**
<u>Emotes</u>
- All Might Flexing
- All Might Thumbs Up
- Happy Uravity
- Determined Deku
- Angry Bakugo
- Facepalm
- In Clouds
- Queen of Spades
- King of Spades
- Smacked!

<u>Footsteps</u>
- Liquid Silver 
- All Might Dolls 
- Fire and Ice 
- Sharks 
- Carpet 
- Lights of Darkness 
- Lava Jet 
- Spades 
- Thorny Valley 

<u>Stumblers</u>
- All Might 
- Uravity 
- Shoto 
- Tomura 
- Deku 
- Bakugo 
- Stain 
- Froppy 
- MHA Fan 
- Blink 
- Rollie 
- Mr. Covered 
- Loena 
- Bates Baits 
- Quiet Barrel 
- Tidal Wraith 
- Cursed Ent 
- Witch House 
- Baba Yaga 
- Voric 
- Quartz 
- Incredible Gell 
- Nyra 
- Brexton 
- Toucan 
- Mr. Pigeon 
- Sammy the Sharppooper 
- Percy 
- Toro Loco 

<u>Taunt Animations</u>
- Zero Gravity 
- Balancing Surfboard 
- The Champion 

<u>Victory Animations</u>
- Howitzer Impact 
- Ice Wall 
- Surf Lesson 
- Hide and Seek 
- Prince Shake 
- Flying Blades 


## ABILITIES BALANCE CHANGES
- Karate chop
The radius will be widened slightly to make it easier to hit players
- Hug
We will be reducing the duration of the hug time to make it easier to break out of a hug.
**Additionally we have enabled the ability to break a hug through the use of other abilities**
- Shield
We will be reducing the force that the shield ability repels other players at higher levels.
- Invisibility
We will be adjusting the duration of the ability as well as it's cooldown
- Punch
We have heard and seen the feedback on the power of punch and will be reducing the force of the knock back as well as the upwards force at max level.
- Power jump
Max height reduced across all tiers slightly
- Magnetism
Abilities that have a magnetism ability will have the force of the magnetism reduced as they get into higher levels
- Cooldowns
We have looked at the frequency that abilities are being triggered and are looking to reduce this slightly as such we will be adjusting the cooldown of abilities particularly at higher levels

## BUG FIXES
- Construction Climb: Resolved an issue where AI bots were getting stuck in a line on the ground floor, improving bot navigation and gameplay fluidity.
- Gem Alignment: Corrected the alignment of multiple gems in the 'Stumble Pass 2.0' sections, ensuring a cleaner and more organized display.
- Party Invites: Fixed a bug where toast notifications were not displaying for party invites, ensuring players receive timely notifications.
- Event Progress Bar: Resolved an issue with the length of the progress bar for rewards stars, ensuring it accurately reflects the required points for events.
- Numerous other minor fixes and adjustments have been made across various levels and gameplay mechanics to enhance overall game stability and player experience.

And that’s a wrap, Stumblers! This update is packed tighter than All Might’s biceps with new content, gameplay features, and tweaks that will keep you on your toes and make your experience even better. Whether you’re racing through custom team maps, mastering your quirks in the Hero Exam, or blending into the background in Stumble & Seek, there’s something for everyone <3 See you in game, Stumblers!

attributes.title: You ask, we answer! - AMA Abilities Edition
attributes.overview: We’ve heard your many questions about Abilities, and we’re here to help! Chris, our Design Director who worked on the feature, is back with answers to clarify any doubts you might have! Let's go!
attributes.content:
Happy Friday Stumblers,

We’ve heard your many questions about Abilities, and we’re here to help! Chris, our Design Director who worked on the feature, is back with answers to clarify any doubts you might have! Let's go!


**- Are abilities here to stay? How long will the ability update last?**
- Yes abilities are here to stay.  We are closely monitoring the performance of abilities, how they are used, and how they interact in the game at different progression stages and will be doing regular balance updates for both specific abilities behaviours as well as globally in their use.
Additionally, we will be adding new abilities in the future.  The goal is to allow more people to gain abilities and to have each ability feel like it has an area it excels at so that people want to collect more and use different ones in different types of game modes and levels.

**- Will you balance / nerf the abilities? Will you do this before adding new abilities?**
- Right now we are monitoring the initial launch and we are focused on updating the balance of abilities.  We will continue to do this in all future seasons.
We are also looking at adding new abilities to introduce new play opportunities and will be launching them when they are ready.

**- How are you approaching the balance of new abilities? Is it data driven only or will community feedback be considered?**
- We take a multi-source approach to balancing of abilities.  We look at the data from the game as to which abilities people use and upgrade, also we run various simulations in our internal tool to help balance an ability.  Additionally we are always looking at the community feedback and factoring that in as part of our overall balance approach.

**- What will you do to keep the Abilities and Ranked Meta fresh & fun?**
- This is a twofold answer. First, for ranked, we will be looking at updating map pools and changing up rewards each season to keep the experience fresh. Second, we are looking at additional changes, such as format structures.
For abilities we will continually look at the balance of abilities as well as introduce new abilities which have specific purposes in the game to help keep the meta fresh.

**- Will you bring back how taunts used to work on spikes in Block dash? If no, can you do the same exact thing with an Ability?**
- We do not plan to bring back the momentum cancel effect from taunts as we found that this was being used as an exploit to avoid a game challenge rather than helping players develop skill.  To compensate from this we have added this property to specific abilities (and may add to others) so now you need to have the ability, upgrade it and time your action to avoid the obstacle and not just mash a single button.


**- Why are specific abilities only available in the Shop for purchase?**
- Some abilities will be initially only launched in the shop, these abilities are available for those who want to get them as an early access. Over time shop abilities will be rotated into the main pool and become available to unlock with Ability Keys.


**- Will all new stumble passes no longer have a "Special Emote" as before?**
- The current plan is to not add any abilities directly into the stumble pass instead we have replaced this with Ability keys as this acts as a primary source for the keys for everyone allowing them to unlock the ability they want (and save up)


**- Will console get abilities?**
- Console is currently several versions behind mobile, they will get abilities at some point.


**- How do I earn more Ability Keys & Tokens?**
- Ability keys can be earned by completing the Battle Pass.  If you complete the Battle Pass each season you will get ability keys and can either spend them immediately or save up for a higher rarity Ability.
Ability tokens come from the Battle Pass but also will appear as rewards in Ranked, Daily wheel and other sources.  By returning regularly and playing all areas of the game you can maximize your ability to get more Ability Tokens

**- Will there ever be a Ranked mode that has abilities disabled?**
- This is something that is under discussion, for now we want to see how things play out as the new system has just launched and many players are still getting and upgrading their Abilities.  We will be monitoring the use and behaviour in ranked and this will factor into both our balance and long term decisions.


**- Will you add a "try it before you buy it" feature for abilities?**
- Great suggestion, this is not something we have currently on our roadmap but can look into it


**- The most disliked effect is Magnetism. Will you nerf or remove it?**
- We are looking at this right now and we will be rebalancing it to some extent.  Whether it is removed entirely is not decided as yet.


**- Can you add the option to hide the Emote/Taunts UI button completely?**
- If you mean can we hide the Icon on the side of the screen this is something we can look at adding to settings.


**- Can you add the option to choose your current ability level if it is maxed? Some abilities like Punch are worse off when maxed out because the knockback is too strong and you cannot body push the opponent.**
- This is not something we are looking at doing rather this sort of feedback we will take into account as part of our balancing.


**- Will you be able to downgrade an ability if you no longer want it maxed?**
- For now we are not working on this, as the feature evolves and we get more data from players we may look at introducing a method to reset the progression.


**- Will there be a way to reset abilities and receive some Keys / Tokens back?**
- Per previous comment this is not something we are planning right now but is something we are open to looking into in the future once we have more data and have seen the feature evolve. Most likely it will just be a progression reset and not an unlock reset as we do want to make sure unlocking an ability is something people do tactically

**- Will there be any more updates regarding abilities?**
- Yes we will be continually updating abilities both the balance of existing and adding new ones.

**- Can we use weaker versions of ability’s in customs?**
- Right now this is not something we have planned to support


We hope this clarifies the new abilities and features! Please continue to share your feedback so we can keep improving.

Thank you, and have a great day!

attributes.title: Non-stop fun! Laser Tracer Endless is here!
attributes.overview: You asked for it, and we delivered! Welcome to the thrilling world of Laser Tracer Endless! This revamped level introduces a unique endless mechanic, meaning the challenge continues as long as players remain alive.
attributes.content:
You asked for it, and we delivered! Welcome to the thrilling world of Laser Tracer Endless! This revamped level introduces a unique endless mechanic, meaning the challenge continues as long as players remain alive. Here's what you can expect from this exciting update:

## Endless Survival: How Long Can You Last?
The level doesn't stop until the last player is eliminated. Test your endurance and see how long you can outlast your opponents in this never-ending laser dodging frenzy.

## Survival Timer: Beat Your Best Time!
A new timer tracks how long you can survive, adding an extra layer of competition. Aim for personal bests and challenge your friends to beat your survival time.

## Dynamic Skybox: Watch the Sky Change!
Experience the passage of time with a new dynamic skybox that changes as you play. Watch the sky evolve from dawn to dusk, adding a visually immersive element to your endless run.

## Remodeled Map: Smooth and Stylish
Our Laser Tracer map has been totally revamped! It’s now smoother and more enjoyable to navigate, with awesome new visuals that make the game even more fun to play. Check out the new look and feel of the arena as you dodge those lasers.

Dive into Laser Tracer Endless in Stumble Guys and see how long you can survive in this nonstop, laser-dodging fuuun! Push your limits, set new records, and have a blast!!!!

Feel free to share this post with your friends and let them know about the endless fun waiting for them in Laser Tracer Endless. Happy gaming, Stumblers!

attributes.title: NEW in Stumble Guys: Ranked & Abilities Explained
attributes.overview: Discover the exciting details of Stumble Guys' inaugural Ranked season. Learn about rank progression, rewards, matchmaking, and the new Abilities system that will elevate your gameplay.
attributes.content:
Hey Stumblers! Exciting news – our very first Ranked season, "Season Zero", is here! This season brings a brand-new Ranked Mode and awesome new Abilities to explore. Want to know how to climb the ranks and unlock cool rewards? Let’s dive in and discover everything you need to know to become a Stumble Guys pro!

# RANKED
<u>Progressing Through Ranks</u>

Progressing through the ranks is all about earning Rank Points (RP) through your performance in ranked matches. Here's a breakdown of how you can climb the ranks:

- **Position**: Your placement at the end of each match significantly impacts your RP. Higher positions yield more points, while lower positions–especially in higher ranks–may result in point  deductions.

- **Rank Structure**: Each rank consists of three tiers (I, II, III), starting from Wood and advancing through Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum, Master, and Champion. You earn RP by playing ranked matches, and each rank has specific thresholds for promotion.

- **Season Reset**: At the end of each ranked season all players' ranks are reset to the initial rank, Wood I. This guarantees that every new season starts on an even playing field, allowing all players to compete with a fresh start.

- **Season Boost**: Returning players from previous seasons get a Season Boost multiplier, which is based on your performance in the last season,  helping you climb back to your previous rank more quickly. The boost only applies until you reach your previous season’s rank.

For example, if in your previous season you attained Gold rank, when the season resets you will have an X boost multiplier that increases the RP you are awarded at match end until you reach the Gold rank again. 
Notes: 
- Season boost multiplier does not take effect when your position results in negative RPs
- Season boost multiplier stops as soon as you enter your previous season rank

![2024-06-21_16h41_13.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/2024_06_21_16h41_13_16756558d6.png)

<u>Leaderboards</u>
The leaderboard is global, allowing you to see where you stand against the best players around the world. It displays up to 1,000 of the top players, along with your global ranking. For players that reach the Champion rank, their position will be displayed in the Ranked lobby as well as the Rewards screen.

<u>Rewards</u>
Each Rank is divided into three tiers. Climbing up tier grants you rewards as shown in the graphic to the right. Rewards include: Stars, XP, and the new currency Ability Tokens. You will need this new currency to upgrade all new Abilities. More on that soon!

**Seasonal Changes**: Each new season brings exciting new opportunities for new kinds of rewards and amounts!This means that the specific rewards and amounts you can earn may change from one season to the next, keeping the competition fresh and exciting.
![image (1) (1).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/image_1_1_6980ea7e38.png)

<u>Matchmaking </u>
Matchmaking isn’t just based on Rank, Rank Points matter too. Players with a similar amount of Rank Points will be matched with each other, prioritizing and balancing for the players’ levels and of course, matchmaking time.

Ranked Matches are 1 round of 16 players, with a defined set of elimination maps in **Season Zero**, our first Ranked season. 

<u>Additional information</u>
**No rank demotion**: Once promoted to a rank, players cannot be demoted during the season. While players can move up and down the tiers within a rank, their RP will never drop below the minimum required for the highest rank they have achieved. This means that once you reach a new rank, you are secured at that level for the entire season, even if you lose matches.

**First Rank**: All players will remain unranked until they play their first ranked match. After this match, they are placed in Wood I and can start progressing through the ranks. After the season ends all ranks are reset to Wood I.

**Rank info in your profile:**  We have included a few new sections into the Player’s Profile screen, which indicate additional information related to Ranked:
- Current Season Rank: Current Rank Tier
- Best Season Rank: The highest Rank you've earned in any season (updated at the end of each season)
- Rank History: Displays the accumulation of your highest earned rank from every past season (updated at the end of each season) 

![Profile Ranked.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Profile_Ranked_e71e65b9c9.png)

# ABILITIES
Traditional Special Emotes have been transformed into Abilities! Just like Special Emotes, players can equip Abilities and use them during matches.

Normal Emotes and Taunts can now be equipped separately, so you can have four Emotes/Taunts and four abilities equipped at any given time.

As before, Abilities add a strategic layer to the gameplay, allowing players to choose skills that complement their playstyle in a specific map or experience and give them an edge in the competition.

<u>Unlocking and Progression</u>

Abilities are now unlocked with a dedicated currency called **Ability Keys**, which you can find in Stumble Journey, as well as Stumble Pass.

This means players will now have the freedom to collect Ability Keys with the goal of unlocking their preferred Ability.

Additionally, we have introduced a new progression that allows players to enhance their favorite Abilities. This progression enables you to reduce cooldown Time, increase the area of effect, boost impact force, and improve various other stats and characteristics associated with each Ability.

In order to upgrade your Abilities, you will need to collect the other new currency, **Ability Tokens**. This currency can be found throughout the game in Stumble Missions, Lucky Wheels, Stumble Pass, Stumble Journey, the Shop and from Ranked progression rewards.

![how to get currency (1).png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/how_to_get_currency_1_ccadbd1867.png)

Each Ability can be upgraded through 15 levels of enhancement. As you progress through these levels, your Abilities become more powerful and effective. This will give you a greater edge in matches!

Each time you level up one of your Abilities, you have the opportunity to improve one of its characteristics. You have full control over how you want your game to evolve!

<u>Additional Bonus Effects</u>

Some Abilities have an additional Bonus Effect when upgraded to the maximum level.

Check out the following table for more details:

![abilities.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/abilities_8e4e131f6b.png)

<u>Ability Styles</u>
When upgrading your Abilities to levels 5, 10, and 15, the upgrade grants you an extra visual style. Once unlocked, you are free to choose and equip the one you want to use. You have full customization!

![2024-06-28_12h23_07.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/2024_06_28_12h23_07_8daf6aeac2.png)

<u>Ability Gameplay</u>

Abilities now have their own dedicated buttons–separate from emotes–which also have four customizable buttons. This allows you to use four Abilities and four Emotes simultaneously, giving you more power and versatility in matches. You can now enhance your gameplay with powerful Abilities, while still expressing yourself with Emotes.

![Monosnap 0.75 Patch Notes - Google Docs 2024-07-02 10-23-10.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/Monosnap_0_75_Patch_Notes_Google_Docs_2024_07_02_10_23_10_ea0fdeb988.png)

<u>Special Emote Compatibility</u>

Wondering what will happen to your Special Emotes? Don’t worry, you won't lose them! Your Special Emotes will automatically convert to their corresponding Abilities, pre-upgraded to match the power level of the original Special Emote. From there, you can continue upgrading these Abilities at your own pace.

We have also combined several Special Emotes–which previously were just visual variations (like Fire Punch, Wet Kick, Golden Banana, etc.)-into a single Ability. If you already own any of these, you'll unlock the Ability with its progress maintained and gain access to the updated style variations without needing to unlock them again.

**Changes to Taunts and Abilities**

We have disabled the use of Taunts to restrict movement. This exploit allowed players to bypass Level mechanics, creating an unfair advantage in some Levels.

Instead, we have integrated this behavior into specific new Abilities, such as the Shield, which players can unlock and use in a more controlled way. This, and other mechanics, are now a part of the Ability system.

So, Stumblers, are you ready to take on Season Zero and make your mark on the global leaderboard? With new ranks to achieve, rewards to earn, and abilities to master, there's never been a better time to jump into the fray. Share your thoughts and strategies with us, and let's make this inaugural season unforgettable. See you next time!

attributes.title: Creator Bundles: SmoreKyle & Coral!
attributes.overview: Your favorite Stumble Guys content creators are now crafting their own special bundles exclusively for their communities! Each bundle can include unique skins, emotes, and other cool in-game items designed by the creators you love.
attributes.content:
**SMOREKYLE**

**Can you briefly introduce yourself to our players?**
- Hey! I'm Smorekyle, official content creator for Stumble Guys!

**How long have you been a content creator/streamer?**
- I've been streaming Stumble Guys for almost 2 years now

**What do you like the most about Stumble Guys?**
- That there is always new updates and fresh content no other game can consistently do that

**Do you have advice you want to give to new players?**
- Try not to fall off the map

**What advice would you give to someone who wants to start creating content for Stumble Guys?**
- Only start creating if you have fun doing it. Also make some friends to create content with

**Where is the bundle available and for how long?**
- Available in the shop between July 11th to July 14th!

**What is your creator code?**
SMOREKYLE

You can find my Channel [_<u>[HERE]</u>_]( https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCH26YyP8Ex-3hS2lxs-3F2w)

![web-offer_smorekyle-cc-bundle-copy_720.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/web_offer_smorekyle_cc_bundle_copy_720_3a0dcfbaf8.png)
_____________

**CORAL**

**Can you briefly introduce yourself to our players?**
- Hello! My name is Coral and I am a Stumble Guys YouTube Content Creator! I’m mostly known for my YouTube shorts but I also post daily long form videos covering new updates and opening new wheels and prizes boxes added to the item shop!

**How long have you been a content creator/streamer?**
- I’ve been a content creator since 2020 but I didn’t start making stumble guys content until 2023.

**What is your biggest accomplishment in Stumble Guys as a player?**
- Probably when I won 3 in-game tournaments in a row! I was playing really well and I haven’t done it again since then!

**What do you like the most about Stumble Guys?**
- I love all the different IP collaborations they do with all of their updates! I also like how they are constantly trying to improve the game, and add new features for the players to enjoy! You can tell the creators really care about the game!

**What is your favourite skin/emote/etc?**
- My favorite skin is The Free Spirit, and my favorite emote (ability) is Dice Throw.

**What is a good memory you have from Stumble Guys in your life?**
- Getting my own creator code in the game. And also receiving special Stumble Guys merch from Scopely!

**Do you have advice you want to give to new players?**
- Don’t give up! Just keep practicing and keep trying!

**Favourite IP introduced into the game?**
- SpongeBob SquarePants! I loved watching that show as a kid!

**Can you share what initially drew you to create content specifically for Stumble Guys?**
- I was introduced to the game by a friend, and immediately fell in love with it! The thing I liked most is how often new content was added to the game! It made each new update very exciting to make content for!

**What does your content creation process look like for Stumble Guys? How do you plan and execute your ideas?**
- Any time there is a new wheel or new prize box in stumble guys, I make a video on it immediately. Anything new that is added to the game such as new stumble passes, new tournament rewards, and new beta updates are all things I make videos on every day! 
And if I ever run out of new things to cover, I usually will do challenge videos like trying to get a special from the lucky wheel, or seeing how many skins I can get on a brand new account!

**Could you describe one or two of your favorite pieces of content that you’ve made for Stumble Guys and what made them special?**
- My favorite short I ever made was probably the short where I ask viewers to pick a stumble guys card from my hand, and then the character on that card is opened in a wheel. I loved all the comments wondering how I knew what card they picked! My favorite long form video I ever made was probably when I reacted to getting the Free Spirit skin for the very first time! I thought it was hilarious and it became a meme on my channel for a long time.

**What are your future plans regarding content creation for Stumble Guys? Are there any new directions or concepts you’re excited to explore?**
- I’m very excited about the addition of a ranked mode and new abilities in the 0.75 update! I think that will inspire many new content ideas for creators like myself!

**What advice would you give to someone who wants to start creating content for Stumble Guys?**
- Be consistent, and figure out what type of content you like to create the most. Don’t be discouraged if you don’t see success right away! Just have fun with it, and good things will come!

**Why did you pick these items for your curated bundle?**
- RIP Streamer is my favorite legendary skin in the game, and everyone loves the Griddy emote!

**Where is the bundle available and for how long?**
- In the Stumble Guys item shop from July 11th to the 14th!

**What is your creator code?**
- CORAL

You can find my Channel [_<u>[HERE]</u>_]( https://www.youtube.com/corallll)

![web_offer_coral_cc_bundle_720.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/web_offer_coral_cc_bundle_720_1f3f597ade.png)

attributes.title: Patch Notes 0.75 - HUGE New Features Are Coming!
attributes.overview: This release is packed with the highly anticipated Ranked Seasons and a complete revamp of our Special Emote system. We’ve listened closely to the community, and these additions are a direct result of your requests and suggestions.
attributes.content:
# 0.75 Player Patch Notes
## Stumbling up the Ranks!

Welcome to this exciting new update of Stumble Guys! We can't wait to share the thrilling features we have in store for you.

This release is packed with the highly anticipated Ranked Seasons and a complete revamp of our Special Emote system. We’ve listened closely to the community, and these additions are a direct result of your requests and suggestions. 

Get ready to dive into a more competitive and dynamic Stumble Guys experience, where the progression counts for real!  

Stay tuned as we break down all the details of what's new and how this update will CHANGE how you compete and progress in the game. 

Let’s Stumble into the fun together!

_NOTE: Please note that, as usual, much of the content listed below (such as Rankeds and Abilities) will not be available at the time of the release of version 0.75 but will be unlocked throughout Thursday, July 11._

![meme.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/meme_ca22debc5d.png)

**New Feature**

<u>Ranked</u>

Ready to put your skills to the ultimate test? Ranked is finally here! It's time to show the world what you're made of and climb the ranks from a humble beginner to a Champion Stumbler. Get set for fierce competition, epic rewards, and endless bragging rights. Let the Ranked games begin!

Find all the information about Ranked games in our next article
![image copy.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/image_copy_b6f2553d02.png)

**Big Feature Update**
In this update, we are introducing an exciting overhaul to Special Emotes, bringing a new level of strategy and progression to Stumble Guy.

Traditional Special Emotes have been transformed into Abilities! Just like Special Emotes, players can equip Abilities and use them during matches.

Normal Emotes and Taunts can now be equipped separately, so you can have four Emotes/Taunts and four abilities equipped at any given time.

As before, Abilities add a strategic layer to the gameplay, allowing players to choose skills that complement their playstyle in a specific map or experience and give them an edge in the competition.

Find all the information about the new Ability update in our next article.

**Changes to Taunts and Abilities**

We have disabled the use of Taunts to restrict movement. This exploit allowed players to bypass Llevel mechanics, creating an unfair advantage in some Levels.


Instead, we have integrated this behavior into specific new Abilities, such as the Shield, which players can unlock and use in a more controlled way. This, and other mechanics, are now a part of the Ability system.

**New Gameplay Feature**

<u>Laser Tracer Endless</u>

You asked for it, and we delivered! Welcome to the thrilling world of Laser Tracer Endless! This revamped Llevel introduces a unique endless mechanic, meaning the challenge continues as long as players remain alive. Here's what you can expect from this exciting update:

Endless Survival: The Llevel doesn't stop until the last player is eliminated. Test your endurance and see how long you can outlast your opponents in this never-ending laser dodging frenzy.
Survival Timer: A new timer tracks how long you can survive, adding an extra layer of competition. Aim for personal bests and challenge your friends to beat your survival time.
Dynamic Skybox: Experience the passage of time with a new dynamic skybox that changes as you play. Watch the sky evolve from dawn to dusk, adding a visually immersive element to your endless run.
Remodeled Map: The Laser Tracer Mmap has been meticulously remodeled for a smoother and more enjoyable experience. Navigate the arena with improved aesthetics and fluidity.

Dive into Laser Tracer Endless and push your limits in this continuous battle for survival!
![lacer tracer.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/lacer_tracer_7620a7d152.png)

**New Gameplay Feature**

<u>Bot Bash Teams</u>

We know how much our community loves team Maps, so we’re bringing you more! Get ready for Bot Bash Teams, where teamwork and strategy are key.

Gather your friends for an epic showdown! Form teams in Events and Custom Parties, and go head-to-head with other groups in a fierce battle for the crown. If a teammate gets knocked out, no worries! Use the new orbs to revive them and keep the momentum going strong.

By now, you’re probably familiar with the Teams feature, but here’s a quick refresher just in case you missed the previous updates:

- A maximum of two (2) respawn orbs will appear on the Map.
- Each respawn orb appears in a random place of the Map
- Each respawn happens in a random amount of time after the last one was collected with a maximum of 12 seconds.
- Collecting orbs will bring back players in the same order they have been eliminated, so they always come back in the same order they were eliminated (first out - first in)
- You can collect orbs even if all your teammates are alive in order to make it more difficult for your rival teams to survive.
![bot bash teams.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/bot_bash_teams_9cfbb06048.png)

<u>Cosmetics </u>
- Stumblers
- Firewing
- Warpwing
- Cyberturion
- Emperor Maximus
- Rayder
- Bionic Blaze
- Origami 
- Napoleon Bonaparte
- Musketeer Pierre
- Fisherman Tom
- Foxy
- Dixie
- Momo
- Wendy
- Stumblin' Rhymez
- Quantum Velocity

<u>Footsteps</u>
- Fireflies
- Garbage
- Volcanoes
- Warp Speed

<u>Emotes</u>
- Golden Metal 
- Ave!
- Fishing Pole 

<u>Taunt Animations</u>
- Ready, Set, Go! 
- Advance 
- Fencing 

**Bug fixes**

- Resolved a visual error in the Stumble Pass Level-Up screen which displayed Levels beyond the intended limit.
- Resolved an issue allowing players to move while using the Cartoon Fall Taunt during gameplay, maintaining intended gameplay mechanics.
- We have disabled the use of taunts to cancel movement. This exploit allowed players to bypass level mechanics, creating an unfair advantage in some Levels.
- Additional info in the Abilities section above.
- Numerous other minor fixes and adjustments have been made across various Levels and gameplay mechanics to enhance overall game stability and player experience.

attributes.content:
It's time to gather together as a community to reach the goal!

Upon reaching this milestone before the deadline, TWO extraordinary rewards await!
- 5 Prize Boxes if you collect **3 Billion Stars** 
- ONE EXCLUSIVE SKIN if you collect **5 Billion Stars**!!!

attributes.title: Rush Hour Teams - Beat The Traffic in our Newest Level!
attributes.overview: ally your buddies, form teams in Events and Custom Parties, and prepare for an adrenaline-fueled battle as you and your crew face off against other groups in RUSH HOUR TEAMS.
attributes.content:
Hey Stumblers!

You’ve loved the team dynamics, so we’re hitting the gas and bringing you more!!! Rally your buddies, form teams in Events and Custom Parties, and prepare for an adrenaline-fueled battle as you and your crew face off against other groups in RUSH HOUR TEAMS. It’s time to put the pedal to the metal and show who rules the road!

## Respawn Orbs: Your Roadside Assistance!
Got a teammate who’s been towed away? No problem! Our new respawn orbs are like a pit stop for your team, ready to get you back in the game. Here’s how these game-changing lifesavers work:

- Orb Limit: Only two (2) respawn orbs will appear on the map, so be ready to swerve and grab them!
- Random Spawn: Orbs pop up in random spots on the map – it’s like finding a shortcut in a traffic jam.
- Timing is Key: Each orb appears at a random time after the last one’s collected, with a max wait time of 12 seconds. Speed is of the essence!
- First Out, First In: Collecting orbs brings back your fallen teammates in the order they were eliminated. First one out is the first one back on the road!
- Strategic Moves: Even if all your teammates are cruising, grab those orbs to keep your rivals stuck in the breakdown lane.

## Team Dynamics Refresher
You’re already a pro at navigating team dynamics, but here’s a quick pit stop for a refresher:

- Work Together: Stick with your crew, strategize, and use those orbs to keep your team in the fast lane.
- Outsmart Rivals: Collect orbs even when you don’t need them to keep your rival team stalled.
- Stay Alert: With random orb spawns and timings, staying vigilant is your key to speeding ahead.


So, what are you waiting for? Grab your friends, hit the gas, and beat the traffic! Rush Hour Teams is here to turbocharge your stumbles!

Cheers,
The Stumble Guys Team

attributes.title: Ahoy Stumblers! Dive into Bikini Bottom in our Newest Map
attributes.overview: Prepare to dive into the latest thrilling adventure in the Stumble Guys universe with the brand-new map, SpongeBob Dash! Set aboard the eerie and enigmatic Flying Dutchman’s ghost ship, this map combines the beloved mechanics of Block Dash with exciting new twists inspired by the SpongeBob SquarePants franchise.
attributes.content:
Prepare to dive into the latest thrilling adventure in the Stumble Guys universe with the brand-new map, SpongeBob Dash! Set aboard the eerie and enigmatic Flying Dutchman’s ghost ship, this map combines the beloved mechanics of Block Dash with exciting new twists inspired by the SpongeBob SquarePants franchise. As you dash through the ship, you’ll encounter waves spawning explosive surprises that detonate upon collision, keeping you on your toes. Watch out for the fragile wooden planks that can be obliterated by these explosions, adding an extra layer of strategy to your run. To top it off, a tricky water current will periodically sweep through, pushing players to the left and right in an alternating pattern.

But the fun doesn’t stop there! The infamous Flying Dutchman himself is at the helm, ready to challenge you with an array of quirky and perilous obstacles. Encounter the mystifying **Closed Chest**, which nudges players, and its towering counterpart, the **Open Chest**, which requires skillful jumps to navigate. The **Rotating Barrel** is another obstacle designed to push players around, while the menacing **Explosive Barrel** detonates on contact, obliterating the floor beneath. For those who dare, the **Bouncing Net** will cause you to stumble, adding to the chaos and excitement.

And just when you thought it couldn't get any more thrilling, beware of the deadly Lighting Wall, which will end your run instantly upon contact. SpongeBob Dash promises an exhilarating experience for Stumble Guys players, blending the whimsical charm of SpongeBob SquarePants with the fast-paced, obstacle-dodging action you love. So, gather your friends, muster your courage, and set sail on the Flying Dutchman’s ghost ship for an unforgettable adventure in SpongeBob Dash!

attributes.title: Patch Notes 0.74 - SpongeBob SquarePants is Back!
attributes.overview: Dive back into the deep sea, Stumblers! We're thrilled to announce the return of our SpongeBob SquarePants collaboration in the Stumble Guys realm. Get ready to enjoy the most refreshing and fun new version of Block Dash, SpongeBob Dash, along with lots of mind-blowing cosmetics, team up with your friends and take victory in the new Rush Hour Teams mode, and brace yourselves for more fun and adventure in the Stumbleverse!
attributes.content:
## 0.74 Player Patch Notes
### Traffic Jam Under the Sea

Dive back into the deep sea, Stumblers! We're thrilled to announce the return of our SpongeBob SquarePants collaboration in the Stumble Guys realm. Get ready to enjoy the most refreshing and fun new version of Block Dash, SpongeBob Dash, along with lots of mind-blowing cosmetics, team up with your friends and take victory in the new Rush Hour Teams mode, and brace yourselves for more fun and adventure in the Stumbleverse!

**IP COLLABORATION**
<u>SpongeBob SquarePants</u>

The SpongeBob SquarePants franchise is a beloved animated series known for its humor and vibrant underwater world. Set in Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob, and his quirky friends embark on hilarious and entertaining adventures.

**NEW MAP**
<u>SpongeBob Dash</u>

SpongeBob Dash is a new version of Block Dash set in the SpongeBob SquarePants universe.
It features the familiar mechanics of Block Dash with some new additions.
The level takes place aboard the Flying Dutchman’s ghost ship.
Waves will spawn explosives that detonate upon collision with players.
Some wooden planks on the floor are fragile and can be destroyed by explosions.
A water current spawns periodically, alternating between pushing players to the left and right.

The Flying Dutchman himself takes the helm, introducing a new set of fun and challenging obstacles for players to conquer:

Chest:
- Closed Chest: The size of a regular block. Slightly pushes players.
- Open Chest: Two blocks high. Players need to jump twice to pass over it.
Barrel:
- Rotating Barrel: Pushes players on contact.
- Explosive Barrel: Detonates upon contact with players. The explosion destroys the floor.
- Bouncing Net: Causes players to stumble on contact.
- Lighting Wall: Kills players on contact.

Will you survive until the end?

![STG-37175_Spongebob ASO Screenshot_1920x1080_v6_4xytfvmhad.png](https://live-assets.web.stumbleguys.com/cms/STG_37175_Spongebob_ASO_Screenshot_1920x1080_v6_4xytfvmhad_dbc9574e6c.png)

**NEW GAMEPLAY FEATURE**
<u>Rush Hour Teams</u>

We hear you say you love it, so we keep on bringing’ em! Now it’s time for Rush Hour Teams!
Rally your friends for an epic face-off! Create teams in Events and Custom Parties, and clash with other groups in a fierce battle for the crown!
If a teammate gets knocked out, no problem! Use the new orbs to revive them and keep the fight going strong! Here's how:
We are pretty sure you are familiar with the TEAMS dynamics by now, but here is a refresher just in case:
- A maximum of two (2) respawn orbs will appear on the Map.
- Each respawn orb appears in a random place of the Map
- Each respawn happens in a random amount of time after the last one was collected with a maximum of 12 seconds.
- Collecting orbs will bring back players in the same order they have been eliminated (first out - first in)
- You can collect orbs even if all your teammates are alive to make it more difficult for your rival team to survive.


**COSMETICS**
<u>Emotes</u>
- Eruption
- Apply Cold Water 
- Soaked
- Water Gun
- Hot Face
- Based

<u>Footsteps</u>
- Coral Reef
- Pineapple
- Flowers

<u>Stumblers</u>
- Man Ray
- Squilliam Fancyson
- King Patrick
- Flow Fatale
- High Tide Cadet
- Sergeant Monsoon
- Beachfront Behemont
- Desert Ghost
- Cpt. Democracy
- Cosmic Phoenix
- Doomcaller Kainalu
- Laser Lee
- Lifeguard Lana
- Kah-Rah-Tay Sandy 
- Fancy SpongeBob
- SpongeGar 
- Dream Gary 
- Original Squidward
- Original SpongeBob

<u>Taunt Animations</u>
- Good Shot
- Throwing money
- Mic Drop

<u>Victory Animations</u>
- Geyser
- Laser Lasso
- In my Bubble
- Hula Dance 


**BUG FIXES**

- Resolved an issue preventing some users from purchasing the Deluxe Offer for the Battle Pass.
- Fixed an issue where Round 1 records were incorrectly saved on the Leaderboard.
- Resolved a problem where time records were not reflecting on the Leaderboard post-gameplay.
- Fixed the order of rarity for Special Emotes to show in the correct sequence.
- Corrected an error in Behold The Gold where players could pass through a side wall and get eliminated.
- Addressed animation errors affecting Special Emotes on the customize menu.
- Fixed a skin display issue in the Strength of Atlas animation in the customize screen.
- Improved graphics on the Showboat Wheel background image in the Shop.
- Resolved issues with non-Workshop Levels appearing when only "show Workshop maps" is enabled in Custom Party settings.
Numerous other minor fixes and adjustments have been made across various levels and gameplay mechanics to enhance overall game stability and player experience.

attributes.title: New Level - Laser Tracer Teams is Here!
attributes.overview: We’ve done it again! Laser Tracer Teams is now live, and it's time to rally your squad. Get ready to team up with your friends and dive into a legendary showdown! Whether you’re forming teams of 5 in Events or pairing up in Custom Parties, the competition is about to heat up. The battle for the crown just got more intense, and it’s all about strategy, teamwork, and quick reflexes.
attributes.content:
## **Laser Tracer Teams: It’s Time to Team Up!**

Yes, you heard it right! We’ve done it again! Laser Tracer Teams is now live, and it's time to rally your squad. Get ready to team up with your friends and dive into a legendary showdown! Whether you’re forming teams of 5 in Events or pairing up in Custom Parties, the competition is about to heat up. The battle for the crown just got more intense, and it’s all about strategy, teamwork, and quick reflexes.

But wait, there’s more! Even if one of your teammates gets knocked out, don’t fret. You can use the all-new Revive Orbs to bring them back into the game! Up to two respawn orbs will appear on the map at random locations. Each orb spawns at a random time after the last one was collected, with a maximum of 12 seconds. And guess what? Players come back in the same order they were eliminated – first out, first back in. So, keep an eye out for those orbs and bring your teammates back into the fray.

Collecting orbs isn't just about reviving your own team. Grab them even when all your teammates are alive to make it tougher for your rivals to survive. This new dynamic adds a thrilling twist to the game, making every moment count. So, what are you waiting for? Gather your crew, jump into Laser Tracer Teams, and show everyone why you’re the ultimate team players in Stumble Guys! Let the laser madness begin!

attributes.title: New Level - Rush Hour Legendary is Here!
attributes.overview: Brace yourselves  for the most exhilarating update to your favorite game map yet! The beloved Rush Hour Map has leveled up to legendary status, promising more excitement and tougher challenges than ever before. This is the third Legendary Map in our series, and it’s designed to test your skills and keep you on the edge of your seat. Are you ready to dive into the action?
attributes.content:
### Rush Hour Legendary: The Ultimate Challenge!

Brace yourselves  for the most exhilarating update to your favorite game map yet! The beloved Rush Hour Map has leveled up to legendary status, promising more excitement and tougher challenges than ever before. This is the third Legendary Map in our series, and it’s designed to test your skills and keep you on the edge of your seat. Are you ready to dive into the action?

#### New Features and Obstacles

The Rush Hour Legendary map introduces a slew of fresh obstacles that will challenge even the most seasoned players. Watch out for the Fire Hydrants! Positioned strategically at the sides, they shoot powerful streams of water that can knock you off balance if you’re not careful. And be wary of where you step, because the Breakable Platforms will explode and vanish if you stand on them too long. This dynamic element adds a thrilling layer of strategy as you navigate the map.

But that's not all! The addition of TNT Boxes brings explosive excitement—use them to eliminate other players or as temporary platforms to get ahead. And for those who thought the original cars were tough, the new Laser Vehicles are here to up the ante with added danger. Plus, the Dynamic Portal that spawns these cars now moves forward, gradually shrinking the gameplay area and intensifying the action. And if you can survive until the very end, a surprise final challenge awaits. Do you have what it takes to conquer the Rush Hour Legendary?

Get ready to experience a whole new level of fun and challenge. Gather your friends, gear up, and jump into the action-packed world of Rush Hour Legendary. Will you rise to the occasion and become a legend? There’s only one way to find out!

attributes.title: Patch Notes 0.73 - Two New Maps!
attributes.overview: Get ready to dive into the action-packed world of version 0.73! This update is bursting with thrilling new maps, intense team battles, and a ton of fresh cosmetics. Whether you're dodging laser beams with your squad or exploring the legendary Rush Hour, there's something for every player to enjoy. Let's jump in and see what's waiting for you in this stumbletastic update!
attributes.content:
Get ready to dive into the action-packed world of version 0.73! This update is bursting with thrilling new maps, intense team battles, and a ton of fresh cosmetics. Whether you're dodging laser beams with your squad or exploring the legendary Rush Hour, there's something for every player to enjoy. Let's jump in and see what's waiting for you in this stumbletastic update!

## What’s new in version 0.73

**TWO NEW MAPS** 
<u>Rush Hour Legendary</u>
Dive into the upgraded version of the beloved Rush Hour Map, now elevated to Legendary status! This third Legendary Map in our lineup introduces fresh challenges and thrilling new obstacles.

New Features and Obstacles:
- Fire Hydrants: Positioned at the sides, shooting water streams to push players off balance
- Breakable Platforms: Stand too long, and they explode and disappear
- TNT Boxes: Activate on contact to eliminate other players or use them as temporary platforms
- Laser Vehicles: A more dangerous variant of the original cars, adding extra risk
- Dynamic Portal: The car-spawning portal moves forward, progressively reducing the gameplay area

Also, a surprise final challenge awaits for those who survive until the last minute. Can you make it?

<u>Laser Tracer Teams</u>

Yes, that’s right! We did it again! NOW YOU CAN PLAY LASER TRACER... IN TEAMS!

Gather your friends for an epic showdown! Form teams of 5 in Events and pairs of 2 in Custom Parties, and compete against other groups in an intense battle for the crown!

Don't worry if one of your teammates is knocked out; you can use the Revive Orbs to bring them back into the game! Here's how it works:
- A maximum of two respawn orbs will appear on the Map
- Each respawn orb appears in a random place of the Map
- Each respawn happens in a random amount of time after the last one was collected with a maximum of 12 seconds
- Collecting orbs will bring back players in the same order they have been eliminated, so they always come back in the same order they were eliminated (first out - first in)
- You can collect orbs even if all your teammates are alive in order to make it more difficult for your rival teams to survive

**NEW COSMETICS COLLAB**
The Wasteland franchise is a post-apocalyptic series known for rich storytelling, and retro-futuristic aesthetic. Set in a world devastated by nuclear war, the story combines elements of science fiction, dark humor, and 1950s Americana. Some of the key elements that define this franchise are:

- Retro-Futuristic Aesthetic
- Post-Apocalyptic Setting
- Survival Themes & Resource Management
- Vault Dweller Adventures

**COSMETICS**
<u>New Feature</u>
- Selected Cosmetics are no longer stored on your device! Your style will be brought with you when you change devices.
- Are your cosmetics not being saved? First, ensure you have a stable connection to the internet, and then try again! If you lose connection while customizing your style it will not be saved.

<u>Emotes</u>
- This is fine
- Vault Boy
- Road Stop
- Cool Sun

<u>Footsteps</u>
- Nukes
- Bottle Caps
- Underwear
- Marvins's Flag
- Juneteenth
- Sun Eruptions

<u>Stumblers</u>
- PIP-BOY
- Brotherhood Paladin
- Super Mutant
- Deathclaw
- Bottle Cola
- Vault Dweller
- #1 Dad
- Dawnbringer
- Elrik the Sunwhisper
- Porky Pig
- Wile E. Coyote
- Lola
- Executener
- Helium Harold
- Puffy Paw

<u>Taunt Animations</u>
- Bronzed
- Nuka Balance
- Pop!

<u>Victory Animations</u>
- Fat Boy
- Praise the Sun
- Take Off!

**BUG FIXES **
- Resolved an issue preventing some users from purchasing the deluxe offer of the Stumble Pass.
- Corrected an error preventing players from accessing Workshop Maps through the featured screen in the workshop.
- Addressed an error occurring to some players when granting mission rewards, in which no rewards or the wrong rewards were given.
- Fixed an issue where the Nebula Wheel title disappeared when changing localization settings to some languages.
- Fixed a visual error in the Tornado Temple Level, where the Skeleton Skins moving animations showed some broken graphics across various locations.

From adrenaline-pumping gameplay on new maps to stunning new cosmetics, version 0.73 has it all. Grab your friends, gear up with the latest stumblers and emotes, and conquer the challenges that await. We can't wait to see you in the game, racing through the chaos and celebrating your victories. Happy stumbling!

We'll guide you through each class, discussing their strengths, weaknesses, and best play styles. By the end of this video, you’ll not only understand the basics of each class but also which one perfectly matches your gaming style.

attributes.title: How to choose your DnD class
attributes.overview:
Are you ready to dive into the adventurous world of Dungeons & Dragons? Confused about which class suits you best? Whether you're a brave warrior, a cunning rogue, or a wise mage, we've got you covered!

We'll guide you through each class, discussing their strengths, weaknesses, and best play styles. By the end of this video, you’ll not only understand the basics of each class but also which one perfectly matches your gaming style.
